Pole position is the first place on the starting grid, as awarded to the driver who recorded the fastest lap time in the qualifying session. Next to the Pole position, there is a 0-mark (instead of traditional 12) which stands for the countdown start point.
3 sub-dials are aligned vertically and are used when chronograph function is active to measure seconds, minutes and hours. The main second hand is running with 1/5 of a second intervals.

The chassis of Paddock Chronograph is made of a high-grade 316 Stainless Steel, the case is CNC machined and there are various polishing applied.



The dial consists of 6 layers, including a base layer, a 0,4mm real carbon fiber layer, sector marks on the chapter ring, three sub-dials, applied numerals, and the Pit Board.

We use Genuine Alcantara fabric for the straps of Paddock Chronograph. Alcantara is an expensive and innovative covering material, the result of a unique and proprietary technology. It offers an extraordinary combination of sensory, aesthetic and functional values, and an ethical and social awareness that defines a contemporary lifestyle. This fabric is widely used in the supercar industry as interior covering material.

Original Alcantara is manufactured only in Italy and we have direct contact with the manufacturer for purchasing the material for our straps.

Just like a modern race car Paddock Chronograph is powered by a Hybrid technology: a Meca-Quartz Movement from Seiko Group - TMI VK67 (Japan made premium chronograph series).
Meca-quartz technology is a combination of a battery-powered movement regulated by a quartz crystal to run main hands, and a Mechanical engine controlled with a set of gears, hammers, wheels, and levers to operate the chronograph function. The sweep main second hand is ticking in 1/5 sec increments - just like a hi-end mechanical chronograph.



Paddock Chronograph will be offered in 3 different case colors with various finishing: Black PVD, Grey matte, and Silver/Steel. Every watch comes with a standard Black Leather strap (integrated type) with contrast stitching.
Alcantara strap is available as an Upgrade and comes with 6 different stitching color options to match the livery of your favorite racing team or driver.
Please note that customs duties and taxes are buyers responsibility upon delivery. 



PaceMasters Watches was launched in 2017 by a small team of professional watchmakers, designers, car enthusiast and racing lovers.
We draw inspiration from motorsports and Formula 1 particularly.


Useful links:
Instagram
Facebook
Website

story:
The Proximity Button is a small magnetic badge that is worn by your loved one. It's a simple device that will allow you to worry less and relax more.


Connected to your iPhone or Android device, Proximity alerts you when the Button wearer wanders too far from your side. Proximity is a simple way to keep your loved ones out of harms way. 

If a loved one or someone you care for tends to walk off when you’re out and about (one minute they’re there, the next they’ve disappeared), Proximity could be just the answer. Whether your in the house or at a busy supermarket, the Proximity Button can alert you to your loved one walking off far quicker than if they weren't wearing it.

If you're outdoors in a big open space the Button will alert you at about 65 feet (20 metres). If you're inside, for example in a busy supermarket, the alarm will go off a lot quicker because walls and people will get in the way of the signal and block it far sooner – around 32 feet (10 metres).

'Any technological solutions that make the lives of carers easier, will mean less stress and more time spent on delivering quality care.' - The Guardian

'An affordable solution to guard against wandering' - Good News Network

'Proximity is an affordable way to protect people with dementia' - Inhabitat

'The upcoming Proximity Button, invented by the daughter of a dementia carer, is designed to be an effective and affordable way to keep loved ones safe without intrusive tracking.' - TechRadar

'A unique device to help people living with dementia' - Amazyble

'I’m excited about Proximity because it’s unlike other products out there' - Unforgettable

Crowdfunding is used by start-ups like us to raise the funds they need to get their product to market. 

There are two different types of crowdfunding: donation-based, where people give money out of goodwill; and reward crowdfunding, where donators contributions are exchanged for current or future products – the most popular type at this time.

Our crowdfunding campaign is both. You can either donate or purchase the Proximity Button. Each early adopter who contributes $65 (£40) will receive one Proximity Button to use with the free app. Two Buttons will cost you $99 (£68).

The 'perks' are to the right of this page and are how you buy your Button. If you purchase the Proximity Button or donate today, you will bring our product to market and get it to those who need it most.

The Proximity Button is a smart sensor that connects to your mobile device. The Button quickly sends alerts to your phone when your loved one wearing it wanders too far from you.


The Proximity Button is an elegant wearable sensor that is worn by your loved ones. It's delicate design means it can be easily placed on all types of clothing. The strong magnet fixture holds it securely in place and there's also a strap for added security.

The Button's simple magnetic design means it's extremely easy to put onto the person you're caring for. It's so small and light that it can even be attached safely to the collar of a shirt. The Button can also easily be placed on the back of a shirt, t-shirt, blouse or top should you be worried about a loved one noticing the Button and removing it.



We believe that everyone should have the ability to protect the people they care about the most. We approached the product and user experience of Proximity with the following principles in mind: 

Protecting your loved ones shouldn't be difficult.This is why we designed the Button and the Proximity app to be as easy to use as possible. We didn't want to pack it full of features that would over complicate it. Our sole aim with the Button is to warn carer's to wandering. If a loved one is wearing the Button and they leave your side, you will know about it far quicker than if they weren't wearing it. Simple.

Traditional devices to prevent wandering will come in the form of a bracelet or a pendant. We realised in our early-prototype phase that these would not be suitable for our customers. People with dementia and autism can often become upset by things that they aren't familiar with. The Button is so small and light that the wearer will barely notice it therefore avoiding the issue of upset and removal.

We want everyone to be able to keep their loved ones safer. Therefore we ensured our product remained affordable for all. The Button is not a tracking device and therefore doesn't rely on expensive technology. 

The app has been carefully designed to suit all ages. Connecting to your Button takes a matter of minutes with handy images to guide you through the setup.

We've also included a tutorial for that extra bit of help. 


Still worried about whether you're 'tech-savvy' enough to use our app?

Hear what a few other people have to say about it in our video below...



Autism

Almost half of children with an ASD attempt to elope from a safe environment. It’s reported that wandering is ranked one of the most stressful ASD behaviours by parents of wanderers. Terrifyingly, in 2009, 2010 and 2011, accidental drowning accounted for 91% of U.S. deaths reported in children with an ASD ages 14 and younger due to wandering/elopement.

Statistics like these truly demonstrate why there is such a need for more products on the market to help families struggling with this problem.

Dementia

Dementia now effects 44 million people worldwide and this number is going to double in the next 20 years. With no cure yet, it's vital that we find solutions in order to offer a better quality of life.

One of the biggest problems a carer of someone with dementia will face is wandering. More than 60% of those with dementia will wander and if they're not found within 24 hours up to half of individuals can end up seriously injured and in some instances have a fatal accident. 

Please watch our video below to hear firsthand from carers, just how terrifying wandering can be:

      

We want to help people like Paula and James protect their loved ones. We want to give them that much needed peace of mind.

Here is what customers of Proximity had to say about us:

"I'm a father with a child with Autism and he loves to wander off. My wife and I would get worried if we opened the front door...in case he would try to get out...I looked all over the internet to see what could be used to keep an close eye on him. One day I was on Indiegogo and saw your product and I said "this is exactly was I need for my son"  Thank you for your idea and I wish you all the success with the Proximity product."  - Ralph

"My mum would wander all the time. What really excites me is that it is unlike anything else out there... Proximity allows you to keep your loved ones safer at a much more affordable price point" - James

"What a great product - i really could have done with one of these when i was caring for my mum" - Paula

Watch our short animation to find out exactly how the Proximity Button works!


Watch our full animation on the Proximity story further down this page!

Inside the Button is a small piece of technology known as a beacon. Put simply, a beacon is a transmitter that sends out a Bluetooth signal to communicate to an app in your phone. The great thing about Bluetooth is that it doesn't rely on satellite connections, so works in all environments. The Proximity app prompts the user to switch their Bluetooth on when the app is launched.

The beacon in your Button is powered by a coin cell battery. The battery will last up to 6 months. We also recommend turning the Button off when it's not in use - to do this you simply press on the main body of the Button as pictured below. 

We now have a brilliant working prototype. Once we've reached our goal, we will have a fast production time. We aim to have your Button with you by September 2016. We will keep you updated throughout the process! 

Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign (select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page). Please note the Proximity app is free to download, you only have to purchase the Button.


Proximity was founded in 2014 by Natalie. Natalie's mum has cared for people with dementia for the past 15 years.

It's her experiences and stories that inspired Natalie to create a simple, affordable product that will keep people living with dementia safer. Natalie was later made aware of what an issue wandering is for autistic children and so began reaching out to this community too.

[Pictured above: Natalie's mum ,Caroline and Bob, who she cares for]



FAQs

Is the Proximity Button only for people with dementia and autism?

No, the Button’s use can be extended to anyone who needs protecting. It’s stylish and small design means it is suitable for all. If you need advice please don’t hesitate to contact us, we’d be happy to help.

Do I need a certain phone model to be able to use the Button?

Yes, unfortunately not all phones support low energy Bluetooth. In order for the product to work you must have one of the following phones.

How long will the Button battery last?

If you leave the Button on, we estimate that the battery will need changing every 6 months. To help conserve battery life we recommend turning it off when not in use – remember, this is not done through the app but by clicking the Button until you see a red light.

Will my phone’s battery life be affected by the use of Bluetooth?

Good news – the app uses low energy Bluetooth that requires very little power so you shouldn’t notice a difference in your phone’s battery life.

However, if you have an iPhone, the app has to use location services – this can reduce battery life so it’s a good idea to close the app when you aren’t using it.

Can I change the volume and sound for the alerts?

For both Android and iOS we recommend leaving your phone on loud and turning the volume up to the max.

For Android phones you can change the alarm sound in your settings.

On iOS you cannot change the alarm, but we’ve hand-picked a sound that is very noticeable.

Is the Button reliable?

Yes, the Button is reliable. However, like all technology it can have it’s hiccups. The Button is simply an aid – a person’s safety should not be placed entirely into its hands.

Is the Button water resistant?

The device is splash proof so won’t be damaged by the rain. But it isn’t waterproof, so avoid putting it through the washing machine.

What is low energy Bluetooth?

Bluetooth low energy (Bluetooth LE, BLE, marketed as Bluetooth Smart) is a wireless personal area network technology designed and marketed by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group aimed at novel applications in the healthcare, fitness, beacons, security, and home entertainment industries.

How long will I have to wait for my Button once I have pledged?

Based on our timing plan, we estimate we will ship our first batch of Buttons in September 2016.

Once we have all the funds and our campaign ends we will be able to go into production very quickly. The only thing that could slow this down is the product certification – this is a legal requirement needed before a product can be sold to the public.

Where are you shipping to?

We ship worldwide.

I’m having trouble making a payment. Who can help me?

We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please contact Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. One of their payments specialists will be able to assist you within 24 hours.

Why are payments being taken in US Dollars when you’re a British company?

Dementia and autism are global issues, US Dollars tends to be a familiar currency worldwide - we hope you don’t mind!

Why have you partnered with Indiegogo?

Partnering with Indiegogo allows us to start our production & get the Proximity Button to customers quicker than traditional methods.  As an international platform, we can reach customers and help people across Europe and the U.S.

Can I get a refund?

According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here.

How can I get in touch with your team?

Send us an email to natalie@proximitycare.co.uk or reach out to us on our social channels. We enjoy hearing from you, and always try our best to help.

story:
My name is Brenda Gallander and I am a 52 year old mother of four and Nana to 8 awesome grandchildren.   A year and a half ago I became  single after  18 years.  My youngest daughter choice to live with her farther. So for the first time in my life I was living alone. 

    I started making sterling silver and gold jewelry about 17  years ago.  I put it down for 10 years to raise my now 15 year old daughter.    When I divorced her father  I set myself up a jewelry bench and started making jewelry again.  I was determined to go after my dream of making jewelry.

      Around a year ago  a friend gave me some copper wire to make  jewelry with. When I annealed a piece I notice it changed colors. So I began to  research this color change and  discovered it is called Flame Painting Copper.  I watched all the videos I could find online and learned all I could  about flame painting copper. Another  friend  gave me a 3' x 3' sheet of copper to play with and I became hooked.  After a year of teaching myself I have developed a new  Technique for  Flame Painting Copper. 

    I started selling jewelry components on a Facebook group in November of 2017. In December I  posted a collage of some of my components on one of my Jewelry Groups and had 125 comment in 48 hours.  A lot of people wanted to know if I had a Tutorial. Which was a big surprise being I had not been Flame painting long.  I started my own group in January,  Flame Painted Copper Jewelry  with  442  members and growing fast.  In Feb. I opened an  Etsy store and I  have had 20 plus  sales.   In May  I started another group for selling  my components and jewelry on  and I  have 182  members or buyers.    A few weeks ago I posted another collage in the same  group on Facebook and I received over  70  friend request from members wanting to learn my technique.   Now  I have a growing list of around 100  plus  potential Students wanting to learn my technique of Flame Painting.

    My component and jewelry business is now full blown and I can't keep enough copper blanks on hand for everyone.  Plus,   I have a following of potential students wanting me to Teach On-line Classes, do video chat classes and to make  Tutorials.

   I have been teaching myself how to teach others for 6 months.  I finally  feel confident that I can teach others my technique of Flame Painting Copper.

    I have been researching Classroom platforms to set up on-line classes that supports live classes. I also need  quality video  equipment for making  video Tutorials and conduct Live Video Classes.

 

How the money will be used

 

   You have heard the phrase it takes money to make money. Well it is so true. The cooper  blanks cost from .45 to 3.50 and the cost of them add up quickly. A $200.00 order goes pretty quick. It takes up to 16  days to get a shipment so it's hard to keep blanks on hand. I have MTO, made to order, orders  piling up. This is  due to not being able to make a larger  order of banks due to their  cost.   So I would like to be able to stock up on copper blanks and sterling silver findings for making jewelry.  I also need the funds for  quality video equipment for making video tutorials  and to start  a  Live Online classroom.

 

     Risk on your investment 

 

   There is no risk on your investment. All Gift Certificate perks for merchandise will be available within 2 weeks of the campaign ending. I have two locations to purchase from.  All perks for Live one on one Classes  will be available  by appointment at the end of campaign. Full Online  Classes could be 2 to 3 weeks. I  hope to have beginner tutorials available by the end of the campaign, but I do not want to make that commitment . 

   Please feel free to check out  my Facebook Profile Brenda Gallander to find  out all about me.  I have a  pinned post on my Facebook Group Flame Painted Copper Jewelryof potential students,   . 

 

Examples of What You can use your Gift Certificates to Purchase

 

You also go to my Etsy Store Flamepaintedbybrenda and my Facebook sales group Flame Painted Copper Jewelry-components Buy-sale to see more designs.

Which was a big surprise being I had not been Flame painting long.  I started my own group in January,  Flame Painted Copper Jewelry  with  442  members and growing fast.  In Feb. I opened an  Etsy store and I  have had 20 plus  sales.   In May  I started another group for selling  my components and jewelry on  and I  have 182  members or buyers.    A few weeks ago I posted another collage in the same  group on Facebook and I received over  70  friend request from members wanting to learn my technique.   Now  I have a growing list of around 100  plus  potential Students wanting to learn my technique of Flame Painting.
    My component and jewelry business is now full blown and I can't keep enough copper blanks on hand for everyone.  Plus,   I have a following of potential students wanting me to Teach On-line Classes, do video chat classes and to make  Tutorials.
   I have been teaching myself how to teach others for 6 months.  I finally  feel confident that I can teach others my technique of Flame Painting Copper.
    I have been researching Classroom platforms to set up on-line classes that supports live classes. I also need  quality video  equipment for making  video Tutorials and conduct Live Video Classes.
 
How the money will be used
 
   You have heard the phrase it takes money to make money. Well it is so true. The cooper  blanks cost from .45 to 3.50 and the cost of them add up quickly. A $200.00 order goes pretty quick. It takes up to 16  days to get a shipment so it's hard to keep blanks on hand. I have MTO, made to order, orders  piling up. This is  due to not being able to make a larger  order of banks due to their  cost.   So I would like to be able to stock up on copper blanks and sterling silver findings for making jewelry.  I also need the funds for  quality video equipment for making video tutorials  and to start  a  Live Online classroom.
 
     Risk on your investment 
 
   There is no risk on your investment. All Gift Certificate perks for merchandise will be available within 2 weeks of the campaign ending. I have two locations to purchase from.  All perks for Live one on one Classes  will be available  by appointment at the end of campaign. Full Online  Classes could be 2 to 3 weeks. I  hope to have beginner tutorials available by the end of the campaign, but I do not want to make that commitment . 
   Please feel free to check out  my Facebook Profile Brenda Gallander to find  out all about me.  I have a  pinned post on my Facebook Group Flame Painted Copper Jewelryof potential students,   . 
 
Examples of What You can use your Gift Certificates to Purchase
 
You also go to my Etsy Store Flamepaintedbybrenda and my Facebook sales group Flame Painted Copper Jewelry-components Buy-sale to see more designs.

story:
Our Story

A Beautiful Journey

Hello, my name is Ethan and together with my partner Chloe, we founded Sun and Bamboo. Like many other college students and young millenials, we decided to set on a journey to discover ourselves right after we graduate. Our destination? The beautiful Far East: Japan.

 

Calming Nature, Stressful Culture

On a beautiful morning, we managed to catch the sunrise in a young and quiet bamboo forest. We saw the sunshine fill every gap of the bamboo plants, casting a beautiful glow all around us, both calming and soothing.

 

However, as we travelled to the urban areas of major cities, we felt that the surroundings were stressful and tense. We even learnt that there is this phenomenon called karoshi, which loosely translates to death by overwork.

 

So we asked ourselves, why is this so?

 

Why can’t we stop overworking?

Why can’t we stop glorifying the culture of overwork?

Why can’t we stop karoshi?

 

Or can we?

 

After some research, we found that other than the workers in Japan, workers in the United States and many developed countries are overworked as well. Overworking is harmful to the mental, spiritual and emotional health. What alarmed and angered us even more was there is virtually no one dealing with this issue. Hence, we were inspired to set out on a mission to change the culture of overwork.

Against Overworking, Against Karoshi

Many other wood watches brands out there are on a mission to plant trees and save the Earth.

 

We believe that is a very noble cause. And we want to build upon that.

 

We want to save workers from overworking.

So that they can appreciate the beauty of Mother Nature.

 

We are on a mission to change the culture of overwork.

 

To save workers from overworking. To save them from karoshi.

 

Will you join us in this mission?

 

Why Wood Watches and Positive Emotions?

Traditional watches are made from boring materials and have quirky names that are not relatable. We are the first to change that and we create wood watches that are named after positive emotions.

 

Firstly, we believe that wearing our wood watches and owning a piece of nature will bring positive vibes into your lives.

Secondly, we want to remind you that time is precious and not to overwork yourself.

Lastly, we believe that wearing a wood watch to your workplace is the best way to spark a conversation about the culture of overwork.

 

The Bold Collection

For our bold collection, we are offering FIVE different models to choose from.

Watch Specifications:

Case Material:  Zebrawood/Ebony
Case Diameter: 40/43 mm
Bezel Width: 2.5 mm
Band Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel and Zebrawood/Ebony
Band Width: 17.5/22 mm
Clasp: Safety Folding Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Hardlex
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Miyota Quartz
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistant: No Waterproof

We Need Your Support!

We need the bold to support us to stand up against the culture of overwork! Our dream of changing the overworking culture and for everyone to attain work life balance requires your help. We already have a functional prototype. Now, all you need to do is pledge for one of our bold watches. Not only that, you can also help us share our story with a friend.

We are going to make sure that as many people as possible get to know our story so that we can fulfill the dream of changing the culture of overwork. It would be really great if you could share our campaign on your social media, like us on our Facebook page, tweet about us or follow us on Instagram. Click on the Facebook and Twitter icons at the top ^ of the page right below the video. 

What We Need & What You Get

For just $69 ( $60 off of retail ) 

The funds will go directly to purchasing the raw materials, producing these watches and shipping them off to you.

  • Each watch will come with a beautiful wooden box, tools for links adjustments and a description of the watch!
  • If the funding goal is not reached, we will still shipped out these watches to those generous backers that have supported us!

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We've finalized our design and selected an experienced wood watch manufacturer. Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production. It will take about 30 days from production of the bold watches to shipping them to you! We want to make sure you have a good experience with us and we will try our best to make sure the watches reach you by Christmas. 

Risks & Challenges

This project is not so much about our watches. It is about standing up against the culture of overwork. Therefore, the challenges for our Bold watches will be spreading this word far and wide, and convincing fellow Indiegogoers to join us. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and influencers to help spread the word.

Another challenge will be producing our Bold watches on a large scale. However, we have established a good relationship with our manufacturer over the past few months and we are confident that they can deliver once the funding is in place.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, share, share! Make as much noise as you can about our campaign. Stand up against the culture of overwork! Use the sharing options available on the Indiegogo platform. Click on the Facebook or Twitter icons to share this campaign on those platforms.

story:
• The uChest Team is composed of fun-loving, tech-savvy entrepreneurs attending schools such as The University of Southern California and The University of San Diego. We will always work our hardest to attain our goal, which in this case would be to deliver a plethora of fun, interesting merchandise to kids through uChest Kids. What sets us apart from similar companies is our mission to bring our customers a more kid-friendly experience to the "randomness" of the subscription box model.

  • Our campaign is to raise money in order to start mass-production of our venture. We are in the process of selecting all the products that we know you will love, so that we can package them in a company-branded box, ready to be sent right to your doorstep.

  • For the cost of a monthly subscription fee, customers will receive uChest Kids. Your delivery will contain many items that we will hand select and package for you. The special aspect to our service is that the items we send to you are tailored to kid's interests. We are sure you will love every single piece of merchandise that arrives at your house!

  • This is not our first business venture, however. Our first venture was DeluxeMcHost, through which we straightened out the flaws in our formula to success and achieved the much needed experience that we hope to use to make uChest Kids a great success.



  • When one receives a uChest, the individual obtains a box filled with products that fully cater to a child's interest. uChest is designed to include many products that will entertain and educate children of all types.

  • Here at uChest, we remember where we came from and how a lot of what we are launching today and have done in the past would not be possible without the opportunities provided to us. This is why it is important to us to not only give back to our community but communities all over the United States to help, encourage and inspire all children of this nation.


  • uChest will be partnering with schools to kick back a percentage of our profits in order to assist with enhancing children's education. 
  • Lastly, a portion of the boxes we produce will be donated to hospitals and other facilities in order to reach children and families in need. 



  • We need at least $15,000 USD in order to initiate our venture. This will help pay for all the products, packaging, and graphic design and marketing for our first few months. The more money we can raise, the more products we can buy and the better the products will be. Your generous donations will help us get on our feet and hit the ground running.

  • If we don't reach our targeted goal, we will still get the company started. As well, we will be sure to stick to our word and send our kind contributors the benefits they have earned through their donations.






Over the course of the past 4 months, we have put together and lined up all of the resources we need for our company to function smoothly. With this being said, we predict we will begin shipping our uChest boxes by early to mid-April. Our full development timeline is:

  1. Come up with and refine idea for the company.
  2. Create logo and other branding.
  3. Begin product procurement.
  4. Design and order company boxes.
  5. Hire employees to begin promotion of company and increase product procurement. 
  6. Generate trial boxes and do Q&A with kids.
  7. Launch Indiegogo
  8. As we receive funds from our Indiegogo, continue to buy more product and advertise the company.
  9. Begin packaging the boxes we have sold. [Late March/Early April]
  10. Ship the boxes out to our generous supporters and customers. [Early to mid-April]



Why do we need your support and why do you need it:

  • uChest will be something you look forward to at the beginning of every month. It will be Christmas (or any holiday of your preference) every 4 weeks! We hope to supply our customers with entertaining merchandise and gear that will reflect their individual personalities. We embrace the fact that everyone is unique and has different interests!

  • Without proper funding, our goal will be much more difficult to attain. However, we assure you that regardless of whether we reach our goal or not, the uChest Team will not give up! With the help of many contributors, our company will simply expand much more rapidly, also giving us the opportunity to supply our customers with higher quality items.



  • If you cannot contribute monetarily, you can still help us reach our goal. To support us, please spread the word about uChest. Tell your family, tell your friends, tell your dog, tell anyone! Have them spread the word so that we can hopefully reach our goal through this Indiegogo. We appreciate any attention we can achieve for our new venture and hope everyone will be interested in our product. And that’s all there is to it. Contribute if you can, every penny makes a difference!

story:
To Get In Contact With The Nokï Team: WWW.THENOKI.COM


THE PROBLEM

There's nothing more heartbreaking and more frustrating than the scream of a hungry baby. It's even worse knowing you could've prevented the screams. When my sons were babies, I'd leave the house with them, thinking I'd packed everything they needed in their enormous diaper bags, only to realize I'd forgotten to pack their bottles. Sometimes, I'd remember to pack their bottles, but they'd quickly run out of the bottles I'd prepared for them. To feed my babies in these situations, I had to spend close to $40 on formula, a new baby bottle, and water.

Each time, I wished I didn't have to carry that huge bag of stuff, and that I had some type of baby bottle nipple to fit on a water bottle, so I could feed them easily (and cost effectively) on the go. No such thing existed, so I invented it myself.


THE SOLUTION

WHAT IT IS

Nokï is an adapter that fits on 8oz water bottles and dispenses powder formula, making it easier than ever to feed babies on the go.


HOW IT WORKS

Fill Nokï with your baby's favorite formula and toss it in your bag with an 8oz water bottle. When the time comes, twist Nokï onto the water bottle. Shake. Feed your hungry baby. Simple!



Nokï is reusable, BPAfree, latex free, affordable, and convenient.

HOW IT CAME TO BE

Nokï was born around the same time as my first son.  In 2011, when I was a new mom, I took my son with me to run a few errands.  By the time we arrived at our second stop, my son was crying for his bottle, and I quickly discovered that I'd forgotten to pack it.  As his cries got louder, I was faced with a difficult choice.  I could either abandon all my errands and go home, or I could buy an entire can of formula, a new baby bottle and a water bottle in order to feed my hungry child. Home was over half an hour away, and I knew I couldn't listen to my baby suffer for that long. He was heartbreakingly distraught, so I bought a new can of formula, a water bottle, and a baby bottle to feed him faster.

That experience got me thinking that there had to be a more convenient way to solve this problem, and that certainly other parents had also experienced the same. Four years later, I have patents pending on all versions of Nokï.

WHAT WE NEED TO MAKE IT HAPPEN

Nokï is a common sense solution to a common problem, and there is a huge need for it among caretakers of infant children.  In order to get Nokï to the people who need it, we need $30,000 to cover manufacturing and production costs.  Help us make Nokï happen and enjoy the awesome perks we have set up for you!

WHAT WE HAVE NOW

For now, we have a handmade prototype, and all the engineered files to manufacture Nokï. All we are missing is the money for production costs.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Back our campaign! Every $1 helps!
Share our campaign on your social media pages!
Like NOKï on Facebook!

story:
Timeless design and durability guaranteed by a lifetime of free repairs, invoking a bygone era where clothing was made with exquisite care.

Handmade by artisans in rural Portugal who have been crafting beautiful clothing for over 50 years.

Crafted out of luxurious fabric from only the finest quality yarn. This ensures both incredible softness and a lifetime of durability.

Sustainable fashion designed to lead an industry trend towards protecting our natural resources by making truly durable clothing.

Ethically made using organic cotton, reflecting our commitment to quality, respect for the environment and responsible production ethos.

Value you deserve created by cutting out pointless retail markups and delivering The Timeless Chino direct to you at wholesale.




With my menswear brand, Tom Cridland, I have designed Timeless Chinos for Leonardo DiCaprio, Ben Stiller, Stephen Fry, Hugh Grant, Brandon Flowers, Jeremy Piven, Robbie Williams, Stephen Merchant, Nile Rodgers, Frankie Valli, Rod Stewart, Nigel Olsson and Daniel Craig in the past year alone.

There are some items that should feature in everyone’s wardrobe and an immaculately cut pair of chinos is certainly one of them. Support our cry for clothing to be crafted with care by making yours The Timeless Chino.



1) Select a Perk on the right hand side to start your order.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information and payment details.

3) Complete payment using your credit/debit card.

4) Your Timeless Chino(s) will be dispatched when our campaign ends. We can't wait to deliver them to you.

N.B. At the end of the funding period we’ll get your color selections and sizes (there is a sizing chart below). If you would like a size that’s not displayed on this chart, it will not be a problem. To get in touch with us to discuss this, send us an email at customerservices@tomcridland.co.uk and we’ll get back to you immediately.




Have you ever gone all out and purchased that “very fashionable” outfit, only to realise 6 months later that it’s no longer to your taste? We do this all the time and this is an essential part of the fashion industry. Without this attitude to style, the likes of flares, fanny packs and mullets may never have existed!

What’s less acceptable is the big fashion brands who make wardrobe staples, like chinos, systematically to fall apart so that their customers will have to return to buy more. This is called built-in obsolescence, and it has created a needless cycle of consumption and waste.

Built-in obsolescence has long existed in the automotive and electronics industries, and what indeed is the problem with Apple bringing out a new iPhone with tons of new features every year or two? To keep our customers coming back, we believe, as designers, we have a responsibility to ensure that we consistently release great new products, not churn out mass produced goods knowing they will fall apart.

We have to draw a line in the sand. It’s time to return to that bygone era where clothing was made so beautifully it could last a lifetime. Partnering with a group of old school Portuguese craftsmen, who have been hand-making clothing since 1964, we have created what we feel is the perfect pair of chinos.

The Timeless Chino is so well made we are backing it up with a Lifetime Guarantee of free repairs. Together we can create a more sustainable fashion industry and lead a trend towards truly durable clothing. Choose a pair of Timeless Chinos in your favourite color, or share this video with your family, friends and work colleagues, and you’ll have made a difference. Thank you so much for your support, it means the world to us and we can’t wait to deliver you The Timeless Chino.



We know The Timeless Chino could not be better made; it was built to last a lifetime.

That is why it we back it up with a lifetime of free repairs. If you should ever unnervingly rip, tear or otherwise damage your chinos, you can send them back to us and we will immediately mend them free of charge.




Our chinos are so expensive to make that if we were selling through retailers, they would cost £115 at the very least. We are saying no to pointless retail markups though and passing on the 40% saved by this directly on to you. We are offering The Timeless Chino to you at the wholesale price of £69.





Tom Cridland started with just Tom himself (the guy in the video above), and he is still the only full-time employee at our brand, working 7 days a week assisted by a small team of 5 part-timers. Tom has been designing clothing since the age of 18, when he sold nearly £3,000 worth of "SWINE 09" t-shirts in a single week of school and donated all the profits to Médecins Sans Frontières.

Tom founded his eponymous menswear brand upon the simple principle of making truly luxurious clothing and selling it direct to customer online and, as THE GUARDIAN said, "high-spec material and production seem to be his thing". Tom is half Portuguese and it is in Portugal that all our clothing is made. We partnered with a group of old school craftsmen there, who have been hand-making clothing since 1964.

Tom Cridland's premium organic cotton crewneck sweatshirts have been acclaimed by everyone from the BBC to THE INDEPENDENT to THE HUFFINGTON POST, which makes us very confident we can deliver you the world's perfect pair of chinos.

We have spent the past two years meticulously developing The Timeless Chino and, as FAST COMPANY summed up what Tom Cridland menswear offers, "...there's now more choices for people who want ethical, relatively affordable clothes that are built to last".

It's ok to pay for luxury, just don't pay too much.



Backers: customerservices@tomcridland.co.uk

Business Enquiries: tc@tomcridland.co.uk

Press Enquiries: tc@tomcridland.co.uk



How do you select your size and color of preference?

As soon as the funding period is over, we will send out a survey to each and every one of you to collect your size and colour of preference, as well as your address. We’ll then get straight to work in Portugal hand-making your chinos.

Washing Instructions

You can machine wash or dry clean The Timeless Chino.

Exchanges

Once we’ve shipped everyone’s Timeless Chinos, if you’ve mistakenly chosen a size that doesn’t fit well we will be able to exchange yours for a different size. You’ll simply send your chinos to us and we’ll cover the return postage of your new one.

UK & US Shipping 

You did read correctly that Free Shipping to the UK and US is included in your pledge. We know this means that, even if we do make our target and reach the minimum order we need to get production started, we won’t really make money on The Timeless Chino. We don’t care though. This is a creative project and a labour of love.

EU Shipping

We doing secure EU Shipping with FedEx, which is just an extra £15.

International Shipping

We are also doing secure International Shipping anywhere in the world with FedEx, which is just an extra £15.

Terms of the Lifetime of Free Repairs Guarantee

There aren’t many T&Cs! The Timeless Chino is built to last a lifetime but, if anything happens to it, send it to us and we will mend it and post it back to you. That means the cost of repair is on us. Please note that we are unable to fix stains or items that have been shrunk through negligence!
story_txt:
Timeless design and durability guaranteed by a lifetime of free repairs, invoking a bygone era where clothing was made with exquisite care.
Handmade by artisans in rural Portugal who have been crafting beautiful clothing for over 50 years.
Crafted out of luxurious fabric from only the finest quality yarn. This ensures both incredible softness and a lifetime of durability.
Sustainable fashion designed to lead an industry trend towards protecting our natural resources by making truly durable clothing.
Ethically made using organic cotton, reflecting our commitment to quality, respect for the environment and responsible production ethos.
Value you deserve created by cutting out pointless retail markups and delivering The Timeless Chino direct to you at wholesale.



With my menswear brand, Tom Cridland, I have designed Timeless Chinos for Leonardo DiCaprio, Ben Stiller, Stephen Fry, Hugh Grant, Brandon Flowers, Jeremy Piven, Robbie Williams, Stephen Merchant, Nile Rodgers, Frankie Valli, Rod Stewart, Nigel Olsson and Daniel Craig in the past year alone.
There are some items that should feature in everyone’s wardrobe and an immaculately cut pair of chinos is certainly one of them. Support our cry for clothing to be crafted with care by making yours The Timeless Chino.
1) Select a Perk on the right hand side to start your order.
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information and payment details.
3) Complete payment using your credit/debit card.4) Your Timeless Chino(s) will be dispatched when our campaign ends. We can't wait to deliver them to you.N.B. At the end of the funding period we’ll get your color selections and sizes (there is a sizing chart below). If you would like a size that’s not displayed on this chart, it will not be a problem. To get in touch with us to discuss this, send us an email at customerservices@tomcridland.co.uk and we’ll get back to you immediately.Have you ever gone all out and purchased that “very fashionable” outfit, only to realise 6 months later that it’s no longer to your taste? We do this all the time and this is an essential part of the fashion industry. Without this attitude to style, the likes of flares, fanny packs and mullets may never have existed!
What’s less acceptable is the big fashion brands who make wardrobe staples, like chinos, systematically to fall apart so that their customers will have to return to buy more. This is called built-in obsolescence, and it has created a needless cycle of consumption and waste.
Built-in obsolescence has long existed in the automotive and electronics industries, and what indeed is the problem with Apple bringing out a new iPhone with tons of new features every year or two? To keep our customers coming back, we believe, as designers, we have a responsibility to ensure that we consistently release great new products, not churn out mass produced goods knowing they will fall apart.
We have to draw a line in the sand. It’s time to return to that bygone era where clothing was made so beautifully it could last a lifetime. Partnering with a group of old school Portuguese craftsmen, who have been hand-making clothing since 1964, we have created what we feel is the perfect pair of chinos.
The Timeless Chino is so well made we are backing it up with a Lifetime Guarantee of free repairs. Together we can create a more sustainable fashion industry and lead a trend towards truly durable clothing. Choose a pair of Timeless Chinos in your favourite color, or share this video with your family, friends and work colleagues, and you’ll have made a difference. Thank you so much for your support, it means the world to us and we can’t wait to deliver you The Timeless Chino.
We know The Timeless Chino could not be better made; it was built to last a lifetime.
That is why it we back it up with a lifetime of free repairs. If you should ever unnervingly rip, tear or otherwise damage your chinos, you can send them back to us and we will immediately mend them free of charge.Our chinos are so expensive to make that if we were selling through retailers, they would cost £115 at the very least. We are saying no to pointless retail markups though and passing on the 40% saved by this directly on to you. We are offering The Timeless Chino to you at the wholesale price of £69.

Tom Cridland started with just Tom himself (the guy in the video above), and he is still the only full-time employee at our brand, working 7 days a week assisted by a small team of 5 part-timers. Tom has been designing clothing since the age of 18, when he sold nearly £3,000 worth of "SWINE 09" t-shirts in a single week of school and donated all the profits to Médecins Sans Frontières.
Tom founded his eponymous menswear brand upon the simple principle of making truly luxurious clothing and selling it direct to customer online and, as THE GUARDIAN said, "high-spec material and production seem to be his thing". Tom is half Portuguese and it is in Portugal that all our clothing is made. We partnered with a group of old school craftsmen there, who have been hand-making clothing since 1964.
Tom Cridland's premium organic cotton crewneck sweatshirts have been acclaimed by everyone from the BBC to THE INDEPENDENT to THE HUFFINGTON POST, which makes us very confident we can deliver you the world's perfect pair of chinos.
We have spent the past two years meticulously developing The Timeless Chino and, as FAST COMPANY summed up what Tom Cridland menswear offers, "...there's now more choices for people who want ethical, relatively affordable clothes that are built to last".It's ok to pay for luxury, just don't pay too much.

Business Enquiries: tc@tomcridland.co.uk
Press Enquiries: tc@tomcridland.co.uk

story:
Website Facebook Instagram Pinterest Twitter

OUR TEAM

In this video you can see the production process of purse Load Gun. And also in this video we tried to convey the atmosphere of our workshop. We hope you will be inspired with it!

We have been in this industry for 6 years! It's really a good period for development. And now we are proud to say that our level goes up every day including a well-established feedback from our customers. The most important thing for me is to be grateful to any useful advice and experience. Because the purchase itself does not stop communication! Some time later we ask every customer if the item is handy. And we refine and improve it if it is needed. In the end I highlighted the most successful models of purses. And I'm glad to introduce them to you!

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?



OUR PRODUCTS

Based on my experience I chose the optimal line of accessories designed for money keeping.

Mini format cardholder. For people who prefer credit cards to cash and take with them only a couple of bills in cash.



Money clip for big amount of bills and for 3-4 cards. On the outer side of the clip there is also a flat coin pocket which does not significantly affect the thickness of the clip. But the main advantage of my clip is 15 mm heavy magnets that can hold a large amount of extra cash. And do not be afraid of magnets! According to our customers’ feedback, cards do not get demagnetized.


Bi-fold Azure offers you a classic filling of a wallet with two compartments for cash, three slots for credit cards, zippered pocket for coins, and additional compartments for business cards or discount cards. Bi-fold is designed and suitable for any number of bills. Button in the upper right corner prevents accidental opening of the wallet.


Concord is a bill long size wallet. This wallet has comfortable ergonomics: there are 2 compartments for bills, 8 credit cards slots, and a zippered pocket for sundries. Button prevents the wallet from accidental opening.


Wallet Load Gun is the biggest and most popular model. It has enough room for your phone and travel documents, as well as cash, cards, coins and sundries. We produce it only of thick leather that allows maintaining the shape and look for many years. Load Gun closes on the magnet and it is the most convenient and reliable fastening for such a multi-functional wallet.


PECULIARITIES!

Any product that you purchase can become individual! I suggest you to put embossment of any name (up to 15 characters) on a chosen product. Beautiful print, of one of two fonts I offer you!



Our team of four will make any number of purchased items within 21 days! Believe in us and make a gift to yourself on important events for you!

CHOOSE YOUR COLOR!


OUR GOAL!

There is a good reason why we start our campaign at this time! As early as December, 1 we are ready to ship products available to all our customers that they could please themselves and relatives with for Christmas and New Year!

What do we have for it? A sufficient number of Italian leather vegetable and chrome tanned in stock, experience of more than 6 years and of course soul!


What do you get? Individual design, quality performance, freedom in the choice of colors and textures and all this at minimal cost, and right for the holidays!

Choose the model that will be handy for your needs. We will start production immediately after the campaign!


SHIPPING

Products by Vita Gordievska can be met in Europe, America, Asia and Australia. We always send goods in different countries, and we are familiar with the terms and conditions of delivery to any part of the world.

PACKING

We understand that many of you will buy the product to present it, so we created a very interesting gift wrapping. Such gift is bound to cause emotions!



BONUS

If the project collects $3.500 each of you will receive a magnesium plate with your name!

If the project reaches $7.000 each of you will receive a bracelet with your name embossed on it!

WORKING HOURS

Website Facebook Instagram Pinterest Twitter

PRODUCT REVIEWS

"I came for one gift, and left with two..."

Tamara

"And leather is so nice by touch that I would not let it out of my hands forever..."

Zoya


FOLLOW US

Website  Facebook  Instagram  Pinterest  Twitter

story:
All new moms have been there.  We receive all the nursery gears to make taking care of our new baby days easier. However, we can't deny that often times too much of the necessary can become an unnecessary burden. It's no different with the diaper bag. Most diaper bags lack in function, and needless to say, are bulky and contain large pockets to carry 'everything'.  Because so much space is available, most new moms tend to over pack the diaper bags for a quick outing and continue to do so although they usually use 10% or less of the items in the diaper bag during one outing.

That's where the mommy clutch comes in. Madisson Lily developed the mommy clutch with the new mommy in mind, in order to allow her to take a quick trip with confidence and with agility. 

Our mommy clutches are made with only the best fabric that gives room for elegance and function. A variety of styles and colors are available for individual preference.                                                       

 

Did you know that thousands of new moms in USA will have only one-week of new clothes for their new born, while everything else such as diaper bags and strollers will be worn out hand-me-downs? Some moms even resort to utilizing older siblings' used backpacks as carry-on bags for their new babies. That's why Madisson Lily's goal is to give a mommy clutch to hospitals for new moms in need for every mommy clutch sold. Why 1:1, you ask? Why not sell 5 and give 1? At Madisson Lily we hold new moms, especially those who have a baby in the neonatal intensive care unit (NICU), very close to our hearts, as we have personal experience with this situation and understand the pain a lot of new moms have to overcome.  

 

 

Please help us reach our goal so we can make more of our mommy clutches available to more moms and to a population in need.

At Madisson Lily, we embrace every mom from every nation. We love the American mom, the Norwegian mom, the Indian mom, the Nigerian mom, the Australian mom, the Brazilian mom, and all of the other moms. That's why our additional goal is to feature a culture-rich line highlighting cultural styles from each continent, using fabrics from the selected countries to design our cultural mommy clutches.

                                    

Your contribution will definitely support production in the United States. We are proud to say that we currently work only with manufacturers within the United States that share the same human right values we do. We are in dire need to manufacture more mommy clutches and raising capital with you will help us accomplish that goal. Additionally, you will help us support a cause that's close to our heart, which is helping new moms with babies in NICU and new moms in the hospital who are under the poverty line.

To support us, scroll up and pick from the perks listed on the right.
 
 
 
 
 

 

April 2017-> Launch Campaign

June 2017-> Campaign Ends

August 2017-> Production

October 2017-> *Ship rewards to backers*

story:
Note. Scroll down to see more photos of the perks. All available perks are listed on the right.

 

THE STORY BEHIND THE BRAND

Fashion design as an artistic medium

The brand Henrica Langh was born from a dual love of design and art, and a desire to create fashion with a heart. By combining fashion design with artistic expression, I create unique ready-to-wear statement pieces and art projects that inspire and support each other.

The ready-to-wear is created for the "conscious femme fatale" who values quality and cares about how and where her fashion is made. All ready-to-wear items are designed with respect to the world around us and sustainability is considered in every little detail, such as thread and buttons.

 

 

 

 

 

 

THE COLLECTION

Mortal fashion

The Memento Mori /Agliophobia r-t-w collection was inspired by my graduate collection, which explores fashion as an artistic medium. The collection consists of two layers. The first layer symbolises our fragile inside; our deepest, most inner thoughts and feelings. The second layer represents our everyday armour; all the things we protect ourselves with.

The collection is designed to be mortal, meaning that once the garments eventually reach the end of their life cycle, they are easy to take apart to recycle or dispose of. All fabrics used in the collection are made from natural fibres and most of them are GOTS or OEKO-Tex certified. The fabrics are amazingly soft and were carefully chosen to feel good against your skin. All Memento Mori and Agliophobia items are manufactured by small Estonian companies in Tallinn, with high attention to detail and quality.

 

This a collection of timeless classics with a twist, meant to become long-lasting love stories in your wardrobe. With sophisticated yet interesting design details, comfortable fabrics, and quality construction, these items were designed for longevity.  

 

THE CAMPAIGN

What is needed and what you get in return

€4500 is needed to cover the cost of manufacturing a small amount of Agliophobia items. This cost includes the making of final production samples and the manufacturing cost of 10 pieces of the following Agliophobia items: the button-up blouse, double-sleeved shirt, wide trousers, and the trench coat. The amount also includes all campaign-related costs and fees.

If the campaign is successful and we exceed the original funding amount, the rest of the contributions will be used to develop a Memento Mori T-shirt for all you conscious hommes out there.

You will receive the perk you choose from the selection of ready-to-wear pieces and limited-edition items. There are both small and large investments to fit different types of taste and budget. The shipping is included and all clothes will be shipped with a tracked courier service.

 

Exchanging items

If you end up with an item that is not a good fit, you will be able to exchange it for another size. If we don’t have the right size in stock, we will work on making you a new one in the correct size as quickly as possible. However, please take your measurements very carefully to make sure you get a fit that is just right for you. See the size chart below and check the measurement guide for detailed information. Smaller items, such as cards, cannot be returned or exchanged.

 

 

THE IMPACT

Invest in fashion with a heart

By helping fund this small-scale production, you will contribute to the world of slow, ethical, and eco-friendlier fashion. You will help an emerging brand grow and move one step closer to becoming a fashion label that does good. All Henrica Langh  ready-to-wear is already designed and manufactured with sustainability at the core, but the long-term objective is to create clothing that is not only better but actually good for the world around us, without compromising style and the brand story.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

All set and ready to go

There are very few risks or challenges involved as the manufacturing process has already been organised. The challenges involved in the sustainable design process have been solved, the patterns have been graded, and all materials have been sourced. The manufacturing is being done by a highly skilled, small company in Estonia, who have excellent expertise in quality clothes manufacturing. You will, without a doubt, receive your Agliophobia item, as well as other perks, within the given time frame.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Every contribution counts

All help is welcome and needed. It is perfectly understandable if you do not have the possibility to fund the project at this moment. Your help is still valuable and you can contribute by sharing this campaign on social media and telling your friends and family. By spreading the word, you can help this campaign become successful. The different Indiegogo share icons at the top of the page make it easy to share this campaign via email or various social media.

 

THE PERKS

Something unique just for you

Scroll down for photos of the different items included in the perks. New items will be added during the campaign, so be sure to check back here on Indidgogo and follow on social media for updates.

 

For that special someone: Greeting cards

 

Memento Mori posters

 

Agliophobia posters

 

Make a fashion statement full of heart: "Fashion with Heart" tote bag

 

Rib cage heart vest

 

Be your beautiful self: Memento Mori 'Ribcage' vest

 

Make an immortal fashion statement: Memento Mori 'Oh the mortality' vest

 

Because some bones just click: Memento Mori 'Terribly Beautiful' T-shirt

 

You know you want that little touch of drama: Agliophobia button-up blouse

 

Look elegant in what feels like a pyjamas: Agliophobia double-sleeved shirt

 

Make sure your legs look good, in case you need to walk away: Agliophobia trousers

 

Your perfect companion to any event: Agliophobia double-sleeved trench coat

THE CAMPAIGN
What is needed and what you get in return
€4500 is needed to cover the cost of manufacturing a small amount of Agliophobia items. This cost includes the making of final production samples and the manufacturing cost of 10 pieces of the following Agliophobia items: the button-up blouse, double-sleeved shirt, wide trousers, and the trench coat. The amount also includes all campaign-related costs and fees.
If the campaign is successful and we exceed the original funding amount, the rest of the contributions will be used to develop a Memento Mori T-shirt for all you conscious hommes out there.
You will receive the perk you choose from the selection of ready-to-wear pieces and limited-edition items. There are both small and large investments to fit different types of taste and budget. The shipping is included and all clothes will be shipped with a tracked courier service.
 
Exchanging items
If you end up with an item that is not a good fit, you will be able to exchange it for another size. If we don’t have the right size in stock, we will work on making you a new one in the correct size as quickly as possible. However, please take your measurements very carefully to make sure you get a fit that is just right for you. See the size chart below and check the measurement guide for detailed information. Smaller items, such as cards, cannot be returned or exchanged.
 

 
THE IMPACT
Invest in fashion with a heart
By helping fund this small-scale production, you will contribute to the world of slow, ethical, and eco-friendlier fashion. You will help an emerging brand grow and move one step closer to becoming a fashion label that does good. All Henrica Langh  ready-to-wear is already designed and manufactured with sustainability at the core, but the long-term objective is to create clothing that is not only better but actually good for the world around us, without compromising style and the brand story.
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
All set and ready to go
There are very few risks or challenges involved as the manufacturing process has already been organised. The challenges involved in the sustainable design process have been solved, the patterns have been graded, and all materials have been sourced. The manufacturing is being done by a highly skilled, small company in Estonia, who have excellent expertise in quality clothes manufacturing. You will, without a doubt, receive your Agliophobia item, as well as other perks, within the given time frame.
 
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Every contribution counts
All help is welcome and needed. It is perfectly understandable if you do not have the possibility to fund the project at this moment. Your help is still valuable and you can contribute by sharing this campaign on social media and telling your friends and family. By spreading the word, you can help this campaign become successful. The different Indiegogo share icons at the top of the page make it easy to share this campaign via email or various social media.
 
THE PERKS
Something unique just for you
Scroll down for photos of the different items included in the perks. New items will be added during the campaign, so be sure to check back here on Indidgogo and follow on social media for updates.
 
For that special someone: Greeting cards

 
Memento Mori posters

 
Agliophobia posters

 
Make a fashion statement full of heart: "Fashion with Heart" tote bag

 
Rib cage heart vest

 
Be your beautiful self: Memento Mori 'Ribcage' vest

 
Make an immortal fashion statement: Memento Mori 'Oh the mortality' vest

 
Because some bones just click: Memento Mori 'Terribly Beautiful' T-shirt

 
You know you want that little touch of drama: Agliophobia button-up blouse

 
Look elegant in what feels like a pyjamas: Agliophobia double-sleeved shirt

 
Make sure your legs look good, in case you need to walk away: Agliophobia trousers

 
Your perfect companion to any event: Agliophobia double-sleeved trench coat

story:
You are free to discover your own unique combination!

        5 Collections, 6 Colors, 9 Designs and 12 Motifs

 

 

 

          * Designs or Motifs can be excluded 

Nature one

For people who love classic aesthetics and minimal style.

Round neck, standard sleeves and shirt length

Nature 2.0

Enhanced natural look for those who enjoy simple yet stylish approach.

V-neck, curled sleeves

Distinct sense

Sense of urban trends in your wardrobe. If you seek a different, distinct feel.

V-neck, long body, claw marks

*Other collections unlocked once the stretch goals are met

 

You spread awareness by wearing our shirts. You embrace the love of the wildlife. You represent a style that, for the first time, has a globally relevant prospect

5% from every piece of clothing you buy is donated to habitat and wildlife conservation funds.(In your name)

We will plant a tree for every single piece of clothing you buy

We reinvest the money you help us make to upcoming collections and collaborating with other organizations. Thus you invest in our expansion which is ultimately directed to saving wildlife

You take no risks regarding our product.

We are proud to say that quality is the best feature of One With Nature t-shirt. After five prototype stages we are thrilled to present you with results. We are certain that you will absolutely love the luxurious comfort of our tees.

Trees will be planted – you will even get your personal photograph of the sapling.

Donations will be made – you will get a signed certificate or cheque.

Your package will hit your doorstep in late August.

In all seriousness,

Our real challenge lies in accumulating motivation and attention to push forward after this campaign. Full clothing collections, collaborations, activism work, research, tests, innovative expansion – there are a lot of elements to perfect if we wish to actually make an impact. We really do. This is why we absolutely need you. You are our driver and our fuel; you are the only force makes a difference.  We are here just to remind you that the power is in the hands of Individuals who are willing to inspire the masses. This is our time to act. Let’s do it.

Share the love!

story:
We are thrilled to finally introduce the Yolk.

A creative way of sharing information.

Yolks are not just beautiful accessories. They are a door to your CV, to your social media profile, your favorite recipe or whatever you like. They can be also very useful in emergency situations like loosing your baggage, pet lost or even if your grandpa gets lost. We love creating purposeful, but yet appealing everyday carry items that are built to ease your life and make it more interesting.

They also look amazing. Each of them is created by our designers, precisely laser cut and carefully colored and protected. Our products are handmade, we pay attention to detail and we make sure to meet high standards and expectations.

We are group of people with a lot of creativity and ideas. We want to use our skills to create great products, which people would enjoy wearing and using, For now we have figured out how to make great looking accessories, but we still have to develop our web platform and a secure database and to do that we need your help.


 

Step 1. Go to our website
Step 2. Choose a yolk from our shop or make your own with real time rendering

Step 3. Upload a link or any other data to your yolk
Step 4. Get your yolk
Step 5. Turn on NFC on your phone and place it on the yolk

After we develop the platform users will be able to control and change the links on their yolks from their profile.


From sharing your social media accounts, your portfolio or CV, to functions like giving your friends access to your Wifi, or storing important medical information on the yolks, the product has a wide variety of different functions and purposes, all accustomed to your personal needs.

Share your instagram account with people in your environment by letting them scan your yolk which links to your personal account
Promote your portfolio by taking your yolk to the interview

 
The Wifi yolk has magnets attached to it. Stick it to a place at your home and let your friends scan it when they ask for your Wifi password.
The medical yolk stores all information that is needed for you to get help in case you get a seizure or get unconscious in a public place.
See how simple it is to use the Yolks. Simply activate NFC on your phone and scan the badge. There is need for an additional app.
 
 
We went through a few design phases and iterations until we finalised our design. We made sure that there is just enough space for the NFC tag, while still paying attention to keeping an aesthetic design
Our innovative design focuses on combining the NFC technology with hand-crafted wooden accessories. The combination of high quality wood and NFC Tags which do not require power, makes our yolks durable and long-lasting.

story:
Short Summary

We have spent past year working with many types of wood veneer to create something unique, handmade, comfortable and very special. So we came up with successor of wooden bow ties, with affordable, stylish looking wooden ties, that everyone would like. Made of the most luxury part of wood called veneer.

 

We made sure of these details, while creating our amazing product:

-The minimalist look that could be worn in casual and also professional setting.(set up)

-Precise manufacture and the highest quality materials.

-Making our product unique, because you can hardly find two the same pieces of our product.

(each piece of wood veneer has different grain)

 

Who is the team and how did it all start?

Started by young entrepreneur Miroslav, who always wanted to create a brand with something special, and his fellow business parter Vladimir, a master on website designs and online marketing they begin the business. Lenka, marketing manager came up with many new ideas and finally Daniel and Matus took care of design, logos, video, photography and packaging. What started as friend's dream is now our real business.

 

OUR COLLECTION:

For our first collection, we are offering 3 different types of wood variations to choose from.

 

We need your support.

In order to turn our dream into reality, we need your support. Not only by pledging for our amazing product, but sharing the story with other people. The most important thing with indiegogo is to remember, that if we don’t reach our full funding goal we get nothing. We have set a goal for 9000, because if making orders for this amount we are going to get back our investments and get opportunity to work on our company even harder and bring more ideas to the business. 

 

We are going to do everything to spread it to the world, because now is the time we’ve been all waiting for. We hope that the using  social media and blogs can help to get enough traffic to our page which will result in successful campaign. 

 

 

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We have already produced some samples, which were hard to create at this small amount, we finalized design, created real product, testing and found not just best manufacturer, but also amazing person who helped us to begin production. Our wooden ties are handmade in Slovakia. Once Indiegogo releases the duns, we can pay the deposit to begin production. The production of 1 tie takes almost 2hours if everything is going due to plan depending on quantity of the order. Our team will then ship the orders to our supportive backers! 

We just can't believe after so much work and so many months here, on IndieGogo, we fully produced prototype that looks perfect. From the other side we would like to have our company as a symbol for others. We are using renewable source from well-treated trees (veneer) so we would like to have “giving back program” of 1% for the planet that can help to raise new trees. Small step, but if every company would do the same. Life could be completely different.

Our packaging is going to be produced from 100% environmental materials, returnable and easy to decompose. I am sure, that together we can make positive impact. 

 

Risks and challenges. 

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Because we need to put in real work! We have been trying to find a manufacturer for long months and thats why we are now 100percent sure about the person who we cooperate with and we established a solid relationship, which has given us guarantee. Every backer gets his product with special present. 

 

Cant believe after so much work and so many months here, on IndieGogo, with fully produced prototype that looks perfect. Now we just need one more thing and it is YOUR SUPPORT!:)

  • We made our best to minimize our profits just to make this product popular.
  • We will send to all backers a little survey to specify model afterwards.
  • All 5€+ backers will be also mentioned on our official website mwties.com

 

FROM ALL OF US HERE at MWties thanks for helping us to launch this project.
