story:
The purpose of Design X Social Responsibility has always been about giving back to the community through garnering, raising & bringing forth talents, innovations and design creativities. In this particular project, with the help from PLAN International, a non-profit organization, and together with a group of young designers & underprivileged children, we are very proud to have created a collection of designer watches that is beautifully crafted with a meaningful philosophy.

 

We have named our three watches Freedom, Pride, and Change respectively.

The three patterns in the collection symbolize the desire for opportunity, dignity and transformation respectively. The highlight of the dial design is the one graphic that stands out in particular and differentiates itself from the others. This concept comes from the realization that we all need to have opportunities to be seen and heard.

 

Inspired by French philosopher Henri Lefebvre who first introduced the concept of “Design Participation” in the 1970s. The idea is to involve both the professionals (designers) and the people (users) in the total design process. Such a concept is truly inspirational, and its evolved form – “working with the professionals and collaborating with the people in need” – has become the bedrock of our project.

 

Leveraging our knowledge in design and business, together with you and our community, we would like to create awareness and garner support for the Design X Social Responsibility project.

The goal is to build a platform connecting groups of professionals – predominantly designers from various businesses – and underprivileged individuals from a specific segment in the community. As a result, all parties involved in the project will benefit from the experiences & the rewards that lead to the establishment of an on-going self-sustainable program.

 

Having said that, we have taken a quite different approach on design creativities in this project.

Watch Dial : 

Through interacting with a group of young designers & underprivileged individuals, we believe in each person potential to succeed. We wanted to reinforce our belief that each one of us is born with different gifts and talents. Inspired by the drawings from the children, the watercolor stroke treatment doesn’t only bring the watch to life – its varied forms done by hand have also made each dial one-of-a-kind.

Watch Case :

 A sci-fi inspired round case was designed to complement the Cyan “secu-cell” button. It comes with a massive dome crystal lens that boldly shows off the graphic pattern, while paring with a lug-less design, the overall look and feel is clean & modern.

Thanks to the thinness of the Swiss Ronda 762 Movement, together with our savoir faire in both watch making and design creative, the streamlined case’s rim and the under-cut layering design make the watch look thin & crisp with a solid feeling.

Watch Strap : 

We have gone for a smooth natural leather strap with folded edge construction and to maintain the thinness of the case, a soft but stiff Italian cowhide leather was chosen to achieve a 2.5mm thickness. The strap also comes in different colors on both sides. Furthermore, the message pattern embossed on the strap echoes with the design of the watch dials, which helps to deliver the overall design identity.

Beside delivering a clean & modern look and working along with the lug-less case and the Cyan “secu-cell” button, our hang-n-lock designed strap also meets the ergonomics of our wrist curvature and lets the watch sit on various wrist sizes comfortably.

The production is licensed by the fashion brand “Cyan” (cyan-ide.com).

 

1. Collaborating with people in need :

Our philosophy is to actively engage those with needs in our project. In this project, we got the idea from the drawings of the children in the activity we co-organized with Plan International. Each dial of our watches features a final touch – a hand-painted vibrant watercolor stroke that highlights the spirit of our design process.

2. Differentiation from mainstream watch dial production process :

We have adopted letterpress printing – an age-old artisan technique that reigns over respect in the realm of graphic design today. As this craft is much less commonly seen nowadays, the sense of nostalgia it engenders is one-of-a-kind, reflecting an irreplaceable past and at the same time, an iridescent future.

Letterpress printing requires meticulous attention to detail; a subtle relief effect adds a unique touch to the graphic. Such craft is pure allurement, and our watch dials might very well be the one and only in the market that adopt letterpress printing as the production methodology. Using the supreme Crane's Lettra 100% pure cotton paper, the pigment shows off vividly and graciously.

3. Unique user experience with the watch case :

The “secu-cell” construction on the case back is an exceptional design of the Cyan watches. Not only does it serve as the opening for battery replacement; the way it sits in a shiny circle with slanted edge creates a harmony between the function and the aesthetics. 

 

Pledge your support and truly enjoy the watch with its individuality, premium quality & the sense of fashion it carries.

 

 

 

In terms of packaging, we have gone for a clean and simple style. Each watch comes in a metal tin, which can be reused for storing your bits and bobs. 

 

Upon conclusion of the Indiegogo campaign, we will send out surveys where you can indicate the details for shipping. We ship our product worldwide.

 

Both the watch components & the complete watches have to pass a rigorous quality control procedure before assembly & shipping to the backers.

 

At Design X Social Responsibility, we always have a heart for the young generation and believing in each person’s potential to succeed. Having the purpose to contribute back to the community through nurturing talents, we founded Design X Social Responsibility Project by end of 2015 with a goal to establish an on-going self-sustainable platform that brings forth more meaningful projects.

Our team comprises young professionals in design & business from various industries who share the same passion for making an impact through innovation, meaningful collaboration and self-sustainability.

If you would like to reach us, please feel free to email us at hello@dxsr.community

story:
My name is Sharyn Cook, for the past 11 years I have been a Himalayan Salt Merchant on the Sunshine Coast in Queensland, Australia. Throughout my years of selling Himalayan salt it became very clear that there were no shakers available on the market that adequately dispense Himalayan salt. This is due to unrefined salts not having the addition of anti-caking agents such as sodium ferrocyanide which prevent the salt crystals from clumping and forming salt cakes. With the growing exposure of Himalayan Salt worldwide there is now a market for a specialised shaker which subsequently dispenses unrefined salt, pepper, herbs and spices.



The designing is done, the Cubby Rebound Shaker moulds are made. I have the first shot of completed prototypes and have placed, and covered the cost of my first order of 10.000 Cubby Shakers so your orders are safe. We expect to commence dispatch of Ingiegogo orders in November 2016. My sales target through Indiegogo is $30,000 AUD.  With your backing through presales, the injection of money will allow me to order a second larger quantity of Cubby Rebound Shakers. to maintain a consistent flow of stock to supply growth in demand to Australia and Internationally.



Cubby Rebound Shakers are the only patent protected inner-funnel dispenser designed specifically for commercial use, to use with unrefined salt, pepper, dried herbs and spices.

Cubby Rebound Shakers work differently. They fill from the top, pouring your choice of condiment around a unique inner funnel. Then just shake up and down. The contents rebound off the top of the lid, and dispense through the funnel and out of the bottom of the shaker. Cubby shakers are easy to use, moisture proof and look classy on any table setting. No more clogging, no tricky grinding mechanisms.


  The real benefit for you is:

· They are easy to fill

· They have no challenging or expensive grinding mechanism

· There are no holes at the top, so no moisture can get in to clog up the flow.

· They sit flat on the table so no insects can crawl in. 

·  Most importantly, they are easy to use. Child and elderly friendly.


Cubby Shakers are Easy to Use


           



       



           

Cubby Rebound Shakers are made with BPA-Free Tritan™, engineered to be better. Better than glass. Better than stainless. Better than any other plastic. And Tritan doesn’t contain BPA, BPS or any other bisphenols. Products made with Tritan plastic are clear, durable, safe and stylish. 

More questions about Tritan?

https://www.tritanfromeastman.com/faqs


My intention behind the idea, and my invention, to make Cubby Shakers, was to find a dispenser to put healthy unrefined salt on everybody’s dining table. Whether it be at home, or at a restaurant. Cubby Rebound Shakers offer that solution. NOW…my mission is to make them available to everyone and educate people on the benefits of consuming a healthy unrefined salt with clean water.

It may be just a little salt shaker, but I  have a passion with a global vision to make Cubby Rebound Shakers available to everyone to fill with healthy,
mineral rich, energetic, unrefined table salt.  

By eating Unrefined Salt your body absorbs pure unrefined minerals and sun energy, which is revitalising and energising to the body.



"With the help of Cubby Rebound Shakers, it is my mission to quite literally light up the world with Crystal Salt, one shake at a time." 

Sharyn Cook 



                  Sharyn Cook - CEO and Jack of All Trades     

                  Paul Nunns - Video Editor

                  Joshua Cook - Animations and Video Editor 


                  Cody Cook - Assistant Video Editor 


                  Hitesh Devra - Head of Design Team (Divine Design Factory)  

                  Corey Richards - Marketing Assistant 


Did you know Salt and Water is a conductor of Electricity?

I love this information from the Home Science Tool. - Inspired learning website:

Did you know that you can use salt water to make a light bulb shine? It sounds crazy, but it's true! This is because salt water is a good conductor of electricity.

Salt molecules are made of sodium ions and chlorine ions. (Anionis an atom that has an electrical charge because it has either gained or lost an electron.) When you put salt in water, the water molecules pull the sodium and chlorine ions apart so they are floating freely. These ions are what carry electricity through water.

To prove it, try this simple experiment.

http://www.hometrainingtools.com/a/saltwater-circuit-project

You are what you eat! I promote eating Unrefined Salt and drinking clean Water every day to maintain good health and help your body heal.                  

                                    Download my Free E Book

I often wonder why companies are allowed to process salt to the point of toxic waste, and worse than that, Doctors tell us not to eat salt???
If you're having a bad day and you're told to lighten up, go and drink salt & water. It literally does lighten you up! And now...back to Cubby Shakers.


                               

"I have been using these cute little, awesome innovative shakers and they are fantastic, delivers just the right amount and they look so great on the table". 
Wendy Robertson  - Maroochydore, Australia 
 "I love Cubby Shakers they are amazing and easy to use and the Salt and Pepper is delicious. The Nepalese pepper is surprisingly flavoursome and brings the essence of Nepal to the table". 
Viv Friend  - LOT104 Restaurant Mooloolaba, Australia 

 "Best Looking Shakers ever ! Love the shape curves transparency in addition to the practical function". 
 Erich Stark  - Alexandra Headlands, Australia

         



    


Where Does the Name Cubby Rebound Shakers Come From?

After days pondering on a name, the word Cubby literally popped into my head early one morning. I looked up the definition of Cubby in the Encarta Dictionary: 1. small area - a small space or room. 2. storage compartment - a small storage compartment. PERFECT! I went with that. 


Are Cubby Shakers Just for Himalayan Salt?

No, my passion is Himalayan Salt. Cubby Rebound Shakers are suitable for salt, pepper, dried herbs and spices. We recommend textures between 1 to 2mm.


Do Cubby Rebound Shakers clog up?

With everyday use Cubby shakers does not harbour any moisture, however within trials, like any other shaker or grinder, when used above steaming pots there is opportunity for moisture to get inside the shaker. If the flow is ever compromised, simply dry the inside of the shaker.   

Are Cubby Rebound Shakers Dishwasher Safe?

Yes. To maintain the optimum quality finish, I recommend washing in warm soapy water, or top shelf dishwasher.


What are the Size dimensions and weight of Cubby Shakers?

Cubby Rebound shaker dimensions are 7.5cm high x 6.1cm diameter (Approx. 3in high x 2.4in diameter) and they weigh approximately 59gms (2.08oz).        As a guide, Cubby Shakers hold 90g of salt and 40g of pepper.


*Notes about our 

Due to logistics, customs/quarantine, our perks offering Salt and Pepper refill bags are available to Australian residents only. We recommend you fill Cubby Rebound Shakers with any dried, ingredient ground to 1-2 millimetres.

            



I want to sell Cubby Rebound Shakers in my business. How can I get more information?

Thank you for your interest in selling Cubby Rebound Shakers. We are looking for opportunities to expand our network of superior wholesalers and distributors. For details email us at CubbyShaker@gmail.com 

I have additional questions. Who do I contact?

We would love to hear from you! 

Please email us at: CubbyShaker@gmail.com


My Story

For many years I have been fortunate to work from home, creating and operating new and revolutionary business concepts, whilst juggling life as a single Mother with four Sons. I discovered Himalayan Crystal salt in 2005, whilst searching for a product to assist my work as a Natural Therapist. After selling Himalayan salt for a year or so to my clients, I saw the opportunity to brand and sell Himalayan Crystal Salt to retail outlets and restaurants.

I collaborated the Himalayan Salt with a boutique Australian grown Black Pepper grown in far north Queensland and over the last 11 years I grew my business "Saltt Trading". In November 2015 I sold "Saltt Trading" to make the dream of manufacturing Cubby Rebound Shakers a reality. At 52 years young, I find myself, in the early stages of another exciting new business venture. Manufacturing Cubby Shakers have been a vehicle for travel and research, one such destination was a recent trip to India and Nepal where I successfully outsourced a designer, and an exceptional organic Nepalese Timur Black Pepper (Sichuan in Chinese) found in the higher altitudes of the Middle East and West Zones of the Himalayas in Nepal. I have selected this Organic Black Pepper to partner with Himalayan Crystal Salt as my recommended choice for Cubby Rebound Shakers.

Sharyn Cook
Sole Proprietor
Creative Cook & Co Pty. Ltd.


"Salt is born of the purest parents, the Sun and the Sea." Pythagoras.


                                                © Cubby Rebound Shaker ™

                                              


        "Scroll back up to the top of the page to order our earlybird specials!"
story_txt:
My name is Sharyn Cook, for the past 11 years I have been a Himalayan Salt
Merchant on the Sunshine Coast in Queensland, Australia. Throughout my
years of selling Himalayan salt it became very clear that there were no shakers
available on the market that adequately dispense Himalayan salt. This is due to unrefined
salts not having the addition of anti-caking agents such as sodium ferrocyanide
which prevent the salt crystals from clumping and forming salt cakes. With the growing exposure of Himalayan Salt worldwide there is now a market
for a specialised shaker which subsequently dispenses unrefined salt, pepper, herbs and
spices.






The designing is done, the Cubby Rebound Shaker moulds are made. I have the first shot of completed prototypes and have placed, and covered the cost of my first order of 10.000 Cubby Shakers so your orders are safe. story:
Our names are Miguel and Alex. Here's a short story about us:

We came up in a regular setting, we are two teenagers ages 17 and 18. We realized that most of the "high fashion" items were very expensive and very plain. All they were selling was the brand name. Our campaign is important to us so we have start up money to fund what has always been our dream since we were young. With your contribution we will be able to purchase our own equipment to make our own shirts and hopefully grow in size and create more jobs in our small community. With our growth we were hoping to open  a small retail store in our town. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $12000 to hopefully buy t shirt presses and also t-shirts. With that money we also hope to start our small store and at least rent the space for a month to start out. We hope to build something big. Something national. Maybe even worldwide. Our perks basically allow us to showcase our designing talent by giving customized items to contributors. It allows them to connect with us in a way that we feel that our brand expresses. We give them a unique experience. An ORIGINVL experience.

If we don't reach our goal our funds will still go towards shirts and will hopefully be enough for a screen printer. Any contribution will help.

Risks & Challenges

We have always ran into problems since we started this brand last year. I've poured hundreds of dollars into this and sometimes barely broke even. Regardless of these struggles we overcome and thrive to succeed no matter what the challenge. We don't plan on failing. We will keep on trying.

Twitter: @Originvl_Brand

story:
Hello! I am Danny Finegood's son Matthew.  I have always wanted to change the Hollywood sign with my dad.  We considered completely covering the Hollywood sign for April Fools Day, but refrained until we felt a truly important statement needed to be made.  Unfortunately Dad passed away in 2006 of Multiple Myeloma but I'm confident that if he were alive on January 1st 2017 we would have run into other courageous sign changers in the dark of the night. Danny was an artist, activist, furniture maker, neon sign collector and just a heart warming soul.  

Friends and family have long requested an original "Hollyweed" shirt, yet I have been reluctant to commercialize my dad's achievement.  But with recent legislation and new political threats to California's democratic approval of recreational marijuana use, I feel it's time for everyone to celebrate and have an opportunity to make their OWN statement. 

This Campaign has multiple objectives 

  1. To sell vintage 'Hollyweed' apparel to anyone and everyone
  2. To offer apparel to customize the Hollywood sign to say anything you wish - in the same font and on the real Mt Lee Landscape... IMAGINE in BIG BOLD LETTERS...  
  • D O D G E R W O O D
  • B U M P G U  M P
  • D U M P T R U M P
  • G O O D W O O D   ... or anything you have to say!

Campaign supporters will have an iconic medium to express their creativity and beliefs. 

What We Need & What You Get

The Hollyweed campaign's goal is $10,000. However flexible funding will go toward HOLLYWEED TSHIRTS.  

Total Funding will support the following ...

  • Design a custom website for anyone to design their own apparel to alter the "Hollywood" sign to say anything! I will have an inexpensive "weebly" site up soon to purchase Hollyweed T-shirts. 
  • Maintain and advertise websites for www.TheHollyweedSign.com  - We have already purchased the domain names. 
  • Purchase a first round launch inventory of vintage "Hollyweed" t-shirts.
  • All contributors will receive a free "Hollyweed" poster or "Hollyweed" t-shirt representing a photograph of the sign on January 1st on 1976, with a caption tribute!
  1. $3-5000 for web design - I'm currently building a low cost weebly site for initial Hollyweed T-shirts but the goal is a custom Hollywood Sign Design t-shirt site.  
  2. $3-500 for first Ad Blitz
  3. $3000 for initial t-shirt inventory - roughly 300 screen-printed shirts in a few colors and sizes.
  4. $1500 for shipping supplies and curve-ball costs. 

  total $8,000-$10,000

Current Resources for the Foundation of this campaign

  • An active trademark and Copyright on the 1976 photo of the 'Hollyweed" sign, taken by my dad. 
  • Original Hollyweed T-shirts created by my dad in 1976 - not to be sold or given away 
  • Original artwork, content, contacts and stories to enhance the customers experience
  • I have registered the Domain www.TheHollyweedSign.com and .net, .info and .org
  • 200 Hollyweed Posters 
  • A fantastic Apparel Vendor
  • Video Interviews with the original Sign Changers
  • Free office space - thanks Mom

The Impact

This campaign is great because it allows people to make their own statement using an incredible and identifiable landmark.  Danny Finegood believed Environmental Sculpture and Art allowed opportunity to alter perspective and reality without harming the environment. This project gives everyone to use a legendary environmental sculpture to make a powerful statement, political or fun, that doesn't harm the environment. 

I also plan to donate 5% of each customers $ purchase to their choice of charity - The ACLU to protect our civil liberties - The Institute of Multiple Myeloma - a TBD marijuana organization - or a College Art School Scholarship program.

story:
Our shoe rack is stacked with sandals.  Some people already have a gigantic collection and still continue to buy more, thereby consuming a lot of money. When we leave on holiday and it’s time to prepare the suitcases, we would like to take all of our sandals with us, but in order to save space, we need to make a selection and leave some behind .  My dream was to design a pair of sandals that goes with all the outfits to resolve these type of problems.  One sandal but  infinitive models. After two years of hard work, my dream has become a reality: I designed CLOS! 

The main goal, that we had from the beginning, was to create a product with the emphasis on both simplicity and rapidity. The interchangeable magnetic accessories made this possible. In fact our magnetic hook system allows to go from one model to the other whenever you want and without losing time. By interchanging the accessories, the aesthetic of the sandal will  change completely, going from a casual model to a more elegant one.                

So far, we have designed two models of sandals and around twenty accessories, but it's not enough. We want to create many more.                                                                      

Now, we need your help to realise our ultimate goal and see CLOS on the feet of girls around the world.  

We hope that you love CLOS as much as we do.

Thanks so much, 

CLOS Team!

                                                                                                  

I wanted it to look like a normal sandal. The innovative part lays inside: in the interior of the laces you’ll find  a strong magnetic system that allows you to change the accessories. Changing them is so easy and fast that you can do it while walking in the street. Make sure to have the accessories on you, attach them to the laces and it’s done. Just like that! Now you’re ready to go!  You’ll go out in the morning wearing a particular style and during the day you can change styles as much as you want!

You can change the accessories  while walking in the street, interchange them with your friends to always have a different look!

 

 

The hook system is not visible to the eye and this allows not only to create a myriad of models but also to prevent the magnets from getting damaged after long usage. Thanks to this system, we can obtain infinitive combinations of colours and textures and the majority of the accessories are created to use on both sandal models.

 

 

 

Another important goal was to make sure that Clos looked like a classic sandal which we can use with or without accessories.

You can choose between two types of sandals: The Artemis model that has a  more sportive look or Aphrodite, which is more elegant.

 

 

 

Here you can find all the accessories we have made until now.  Each of them has a different price but for our backers they cost the same!  Choose your favorites!

The majority of the accessories can be used for both models. Beneath you can find an overview:

 

There are some accessories that you can use exclusively on one model:

 

 

 

 

 

 

IF YOU LOVE CLOS. DON'T FORGET TO SHARE THEM WITH YOUR FRIEND!!!

 

MY CONTACTS

Facebook CLOS:   https://www.facebook.com/CLOSsandals/

                    THECREATIVECLO:  https://www.facebook.com/thecreativeclo/

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/thecreativeclo/

Blog:  http://www.thecreativeclo.com/
story_txt:
Our shoe rack is stacked with sandals.  Some people already have a gigantic collection and still continue to buy more, thereby consuming a lot of money. When we leave on holiday and it’s time to prepare the suitcases, we would like to take all of our sandals with us, but in order to save space, we need to make a selection and leave some behind .  My dream was to design a pair of sandals that goes with all the outfits to resolve these type of problems.  One sandal but  infinitive models. After two years of hard work, my dream has become a reality: I designed CLOS! The main goal, that we had from the beginning, was to create a product with the emphasis on both simplicity and rapidity. The interchangeable magnetic accessories made this possible. In fact our magnetic hook system allows to go from one model to the other whenever you want and without losing time. By interchanging the accessories, the aesthetic of the sandal will  change completely, going from a casual model to a more elegant one.                So far, we have designed two models of sandals and around twenty accessories, but it's not enough. We want to create many more.                                                                      Now, we need your help to realise our ultimate goal and see CLOS on the feet of girls around the world.  We hope that you love CLOS as much as we do.Thanks so much, CLOS Team!                                                                                                  I wanted it to look like a normal sandal. The innovative part lays inside: in the interior of the laces you’ll find  a strong magnetic system that allows you to change the accessories. Changing them is so easy and fast that you can do it while walking in the street. Make sure to have the accessories on you, attach them to the laces and it’s done. Just like that! Now you’re ready to go!  You’ll go out in the morning wearing a particular style and during the day you can change styles as much as you want!You can change the accessories  while walking in the street, interchange them with your friends to always have a different look! 

 
The hook system is not visible to the eye and this allows not only to create a myriad of models but also to prevent the magnets from getting damaged after long usage. Thanks to this system, we can obtain infinitive combinations of colours and textures and the majority of the accessories are created to use on both sandal models.
 


 

 Another important goal was to make sure that Clos looked like a classic sandal which we can use with or without accessories.You can choose between two types of sandals: The Artemis model that has a  more sportive look or Aphrodite, which is more elegant.   Here you can find all the accessories we have made until now.  Each of them has a different price but for our backers they cost the same!  Choose your favorites!The majority of the accessories can be used for both models. Beneath you can find an overview: There are some accessories that you can use exclusively on one model:      IF YOU LOVE CLOS. DON'T FORGET TO SHARE THEM WITH YOUR FRIEND!!! MY CONTACTSFacebook CLOS:   https://www.facebook.com/CLOSsandals/                    THECREATIVECLO:  https://www.facebook.com/thecreativeclo/Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/thecreativeclo/Blog:  http://www.thecreativeclo.com/

story:
WE TAKE YOUR BALLS OFF YOUR MIND!

Whether it's the night before the round or on the first tee, realizing that you don't have enough or ANY golf balls to use for your upcoming round can be a huge hassle!

Even worse is what follows; Making that inconvenient emergency trip to a local golf retailer, or buying the over-priced golf balls in the courses clubhouse. There had to be a better way, and that's where we come in!

 

Problem Solved!

The Golf Ball Club is a membership service that delivers the highest quality golf balls directly to your door!

You'll have a choice of premium or super premium golf balls, as well as the number of sleeves you would like to receive each month.

 

Membership Choices:

Birdie - 1 Sleeve of Golf Balls Delivered per Month

Eagle - 2 Sleeve of Golf Balls Delivered per Month

Double Eagle - 4 Sleeves of Golf Balls Delivered per Month

It's Simple, Quick, and Convenient.

 

Benefits:

  1. Brand new high quality golf balls delivered directly to your door every month
  2. Save time and money by avoiding unesessary trips to a golf retailer or over-priced balls in the golf course clubhouse
  3. As a member of the The Golf Ball Club you will never have to worry about refilling on your favorite golf ball ever again! 
  4. If you like variety, you can try out new golf balls to see what works best for you game or what's popular on tour. 
  5. A membership with The Golf Ball Club is the perfect gift for yourself or any of the golfers in your life!

 

We need your help! And here's why:

Premium and super premium balls are highly engineered and well manufactured. Which makes them expensive. We need your contributions in order to buy the golf balls in large bulk amounts, bringing down the cost of the balls. And guaranteeing our customers the absolute best value for their money.

Thank you for your support and PLEASE share this campaign with anyone you think would be interested in The Golf Ball Club.

story:
Growing up in a family full of tailors, I found my love for fashion through the eyes of my mother. She was a creative individual who was passionate about being a tailor. I moved to the United States with my two brothers in other to join our father. With my mother back in Togo, West Africa, I knew I had to make her proud. I began taking modeling classes and realized there weren't many opportunities for everyone.

This led me to think outside the box and take matters into my own hands. I wanted my voice to be heard and I wanted to create a platform that gives young people an opportunity to grow, to embrace themselves, and to be confident that they can achieve all that they wanted to in the industry.

              I started teaching my peers what I have learned while attending a fashion school at John Roberts Power, and would put on fashion shows, for other Organization fundraising by using clothes that my mother made for me from Togo. Two years, right after graduating from high school, I started my brand Unique by Reelia in 2013. A wearable accessories brand, that I started making myself with $1.

 I have been involved in various fashion shows, including international shows. In the midst of building my brand, I lost my mother, I worked hard to make sure my mother’s legacy can be reflects in my designs.  

               It is time for me to do something bigger. I am asking for your support for my first international fashion Show that I will be organizing in Farrara Italy, one of the biggest Fashion Capital in the world. I want to bring the celebration of diversity and give a platform to younger and uprising designer to showcase at this event. 

             I want to honor this opportunity not only for me, but also to empower other young women like myself, I believe everybody has a dream and to fulfill it you must keep on believe in yourself and that everything in this life is possible. Your generosity will be what makes this possible. THANK YOU!

story:
THE TALE OF TWO SISTERS

My name is Lucy and my sister is Kitty. We both graduated in 2016 with degrees in Fashion & Textiles.

We both became concerned about the devastating effects that the fast fashion industry is having on the environment and in October 2016 joined together to create Studio Five, a brand that celebrates stylish sustainability.

I moved to Glasgow while Kitty stayed in Edinburgh and between the two cities we have built up a network of loving support for our brand. Studio Five's first collection was a mixture of unisex, organic cotton, illustrative tee’s (such as the Mana Tee and Killer Tee, which became very popular for their quirky names) and organic cotton cushions, hand rolled scarves, recycled paper postcards, badges and sticker packs. The collection received amazing press feedback and we have now been part of several sustainable, fair trade and inclusivity events such as Fashion Revolution Week, Label Fashion Show and FashionABLE. We have also built up a strong social media presence of over 1000 followers.  

"Scotland's coolest new fashion and lifestyle brand" 

                                                                                                     - Urbanity Blog

This month Studio Five are going to be a part of the Honey Pop Club set up by fashion and lifestyle blogger Honey Pop. Her following is over 38K and to have her promoting us is an amazing opportunity that validates our work.

Studio Five products can be purchased on our website (www.studiofiveuk.com) and in The Scottish Design Exchange in Ocean Terminal, Edinburgh. Feedback from The Scottish Design Exchange has been overwhelmingly positive, with customers requesting more of our products and enquiring about our next collection. We would like to put our all into our next collection, but our limited resources is making it difficult to bring our creative vision to fruition.

So this is where you come in…

AUTUMN / WINTER COLLECTION

Over the past few months, we have been working on our new collection.

Kitty took a trip to Iceland and collected photographs from the beautiful black beach: its unusual rocky landscapes have inspired the colour palette and textures we have created for our digitally printed fabrics. We also went to Loch Lomond to collect more photographs and gather more inspiration for the collection.

The next stage was to start painting. The aim is to design unique prints that follow on from our last collection by bringing together bold colours and quirky illustrations of animals.

Our collection will be a new selection of bold street style t-shirts, cushions and makeup bags as well as working with a local designer to release a unique limited edition knitwear range.

 FUNDING

Our goal of raising £5000 is specifically to help us with the manufacturing of the Autumn / Winter Collection. 

So far we have managed to fund the brand ourselves with no loans or grants. This has been a challenge and meant we have built ourselves up slowly using only the income we make to update our stock. We are motivated and believe in our venture so much we have put every penny into the business but to expand we require help to take us to the next level. 

We will use the money to produce a large amount of stock and branch out to other retailers, events and markets. This will also contribute to our studio and equipment fees. We will be able to release collaborations with other designers to produce limited edition products that you can have first choice at thanks to your contribution. Every pledge will take us a step closer to what we believe Studio Five can achieve and allow us to promote our ethical and sustainable message while keeping up with customer demand.  

 

Find us on:

https://www.studiofiveuk.com

https://www.instagram.com/studio_five_uk/

https://www.facebook.com/studiofiveuk/?ref=book...

story:
Why Are We Passionate about Bone Conduction?

Bone Conduction + Open Ear = Healthy + Safe

Bone conduction headphones have many benefits. User can avoid hearing damage from prolong usage of the headphone as bone conduction bypasses the eardrum. Furthermore, with the open ear design, user can observe the surrounding while using the headphone.


  • Conventional headphones can easily reach >100dB
  • Continuous exposure to 100dB sound has negative impact on hearing (source: WHO)
  • Don't forget to protect your ears while listening to music!

(source: WHO)


Despite the benefits, bone conduction earphones have never been the mainstream headphone in the market. We found that bone conduction headphones today have similar problems:

          1. Compromised sound quality

          2. Expensive (~$90 to $280)

          3. Not suitable for noisy environment

          4. Awfully Uncomfortable


Our Promise:

Affordable + Healthy Listening Experience for the General Public

We strive to re-invent a listening gadget with great sound quality, minimalist design, while maintaining an affordable price loved by all!

Since the beginning of 2014, we have spent our best effort in improving, optimizing, and testing numerous prototypes. 

Through the months of hard work, our R&D team re-invented what we believe to be one of the most efficient transducers. More than 20 music experts have come together to iterate the best possible sound quality of a bone conduction headphone.  All these technologies are beautifully put together by our Red Dot Design Award winning designer to achieve the truly minimalist masterpiece we have today.

We are on verge of bringing a wonderful innovation to live, but without your help, there's a limit to we can do...


Y-BoneTouch: Design for You

1. Design for Comfort

Ergonomic design, highly elastic & slim headband, sunglasses ready contour.



Well balanced, no electronics at the back. Maximum comfort.


Easy access control, all buttons at front.


2. Design for Finesse

The decoration cover uses recyclable aluminum precisely machined to the highest dimensional accuracy, which is then treated with micro-brushing, anti-corrosion coating and laser engraving. This produces one of the finest craftsmanship you can find on any bone conduction headphones today.

          


3. Design for Sound

High Efficiency + Wide Bandwidth = Proprietary VibeDirect Transducer


Two modes of listening suitable for different environments.

Open ear: Full bass without sacrificing mid-high frequencies and clarity. Allow you to listen music and make calls with awareness of surrounding, no matter where you are and what you are doing, such as at home, in office, walking, jogging and cycling etc.


Close ear: further enhance bass performance, the thirst for bass. Allows you to listen to music and make calls with full isolation of background noise, no matter where you are and what you are doing, such as on the train, in the airplane, at the construction site, traveling, motorcycling etc.


3. Design for Functionality

  • For music and phone calls with built-in microphone.
  • Bluetooth 4.0 seamless wireless connectivity with blue indicator. 
  • Up to 6 hours of play time when fully charged.
  • Convenient carrier case




Wired version also available (no battery required, sounds just as great!)

          



Wide Applications, Amazing Experience



Our Appeal & Offer

The development of the Y-BoneTouch is completed, and we have a fully working prototype waiting to go into production. Production and shipping of the first Y-BoneTouch is planned for Early Summer 2016.  Given the chance, and with encouragement from all our supporters, we will reach our funding goal quickly and perhaps be able to improve on this delivery date. 

There are several ways which you can help, and we are offering some really awesome perks for your participation in this project. When funding a perk you will be one of the first to have this ground-breaking product at a special price. Even if we don't reach our full goal, we will still produce the Y-BoneTouch and deliver them to backers.


Y-BoneTouch 9 (Wireless)

Specifications:

  • Output: 8 Ohm
  • Battery：3.7V/420mAH
  • Bluetooth version：V4.0+EDR
  • Bluetooth compatibility：A2DP/AVRCP/HFP/HSP
  • Play time：up to 6 hours
  • Charging input：MICRO USB input 5V DC, 210mA


Package content:

  • 1x YBT9 Wireless Bone Conduction Headphone
  • 1x USB charging cable
  • 1x User Manual
  • 1 pair noise isolation ear plugs with box
  • 1x carrier case


Y-BoneTouch 8 (Wired)


Specifications:

  • Output：8 Ohm
  • Mic sensitivity：-40dB
  • Power handling: 800mW
  • Cable length：1.2m
  • Plug: 3.5mm

Package content:

  • 1x YBT8 Wired Bone Conduction Headphone
  • 1x User Manual
  • 1 pair noise isolation ear plugs with box
  • 1x carrier case

Risks & Challenges

The product's comfort and functionality have already been widely tested, and feedback has been amazing in every sense. All the wonderful user experience feedback, great survey results, interest of stakeholders and already received public and private funding for R&D ensure that Y-BoneTouch production will continue and won't disappear after the Indiegogo funding campaign has ended.

  • There is the possibility that delivery  to our backers maybe delayed due to unforeseen issues with international shipping and logistics, such as any political or economic issues that may cause delay. 
  • Shipments may be subject to import duties and other local taxes.
  • Any changes that may occur will be fully communicated to all backers in a timely manner
  • Thank you for your interest in Y-BoneTouch. We really appreciate it!


Other Ways You Can Help

If for some reasons you are unable to contribute, there are of course several ways in which you can be of great help to us.

  • You can help by getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • A simple "share" or "like" definitely helps a great deal.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!


Our Team

Our team consists of industrial veterans who have many years of experiences in Product Design and Innovation. 

Our team includes: Acoustics Engineers, Award Winning Industrial Designers, System Integrators and  Marketing Experts. We are passionate in creating and delivering products that can bring happiness to the world.

story:
Hi, we are QRX. We have made the best wallet for sportsmen, explorers, and all those with an adventurous soul. 

Introducing QRX Bifold

QRX Bifold, a wallet built with technical materials originally used for extreme outdoor sports, such as climbing or rafting. Lightness and robustness are the key words of QRX Bifold.

The QRX Bifold's minimalist design holds 7 cards + banknotes.

The QRX Bifold aims to simplify your daily life. We have worked hard to make every use of QRX Bifold enjoyable and easy.

But also that it is sustainable in time. Because we did not intend to offer you a product that will need to be changed often, we put all the conditions for it to be environmentally friendly and resistant. A French manufacture in a small workshop of the South of France and a label labeled OEKO-TEX are the guarantee.

It is very difficult to find a portfolio today that perfectly combines sleek and elegant design with multiple features. 

During our creation phase, we have tried to offer you a perfect alliance between these essential points and we are proud to offer you the QRX Bifold that successfully combines them.

Ultra-fast slot

Ultra-fast access for the card you use the most.

Sliding slot

But always easy access for your other cards thanks to our sliding system.

Banknotes compartment

A secure area dedicated to banknotes.

Multi-use compartment

And a compartment to hold your tickets or other cards.

We told you that the environment is one of our priorities. Creating a functional and design wallet was not enough for us, it was important for us to combine all these qualities with respect for the environment. Our QRX Bifold is mainly made of an OEKO-TEX labelled fabric, which means that its design is environmentally friendly. 

Built with an extreme fabric for the adventurers of the extreme.

Thank you everyone who has helped us along the way !

And share with your friends, family, on instagram, facebook and anywhere else :)
story_txt: Hi, we are QRX. We have made the best wallet for sportsmen, explorers, and all those with an adventurous soul. Introducing QRX BifoldQRX Bifold, a wallet built with technical materials originally used for extreme outdoor sports, such as climbing or rafting. Lightness and robustness are the key words of QRX Bifold.The QRX Bifold's minimalist design holds 7 cards + banknotes.The QRX Bifold aims to simplify your daily life. We have worked hard to make every use of QRX Bifold enjoyable and easy.But also that it is sustainable in time. Because we did not intend to offer you a product that will need to be changed often, we put all the conditions for it to be environmentally friendly and resistant. A French manufacture in a small workshop of the South of France and a label labeled OEKO-TEX are the guarantee.It is very difficult to find a portfolio today that perfectly combines sleek and elegant design with multiple features. During our creation phase, we have tried to offer you a perfect alliance between these essential points and we are proud to offer you the QRX Bifold that successfully combines them.Ultra-fast slotUltra-fast access for the card you use the most.Sliding slotBut always easy access for your other cards thanks to our sliding system.Banknotes compartmentA secure area dedicated to banknotes.Multi-use compartmentAnd a compartment to hold your tickets or other cards.We told you that the environment is one of our priorities. Creating a functional and design wallet was not enough for us, it was important for us to combine all these qualities with respect for the environment. Our QRX Bifold is mainly made of an OEKO-TEX labelled fabric, which means that its design is environmentally friendly. Built with an extreme fabric for the adventurers of the extreme.Thank you everyone who has helped us along the way !And share with your friends, family, on instagram, facebook and anywhere else :)

story:
INTRODUCING ISAMEL

LUXURY SWIMWEAR - Ethically Made from Sustainable Materials

shopisamel.com

ISAMEL takes luxury to a new level with innovative and eco-friendly hand-embroidered swimwear that you won’t find anywhere else! 

We are a woman-owned direct-to-consumer luxury swimwear brand that provides high-quality swimsuits for chic and adventurous women. 

We are different because we only use the highest quality recycled, eco-friendly, and natural materials. Our styles are unique and feature one-of-a-kind hand detailing and embellishments. ISAMEL is also committed to partnering with the most ethical garment manufacturers around the globe. 

WHAT MAKES ISAMEL DIFFERENT?

Our Founder and Creative Director Kendall is a seasoned fashion design professional and fit expert, with specialized expertise in runway embellishment and embroidery techniques. With over six years of top luxury runway design experience, her work has been featured in numerous magazines and on celebrities attending VIP red carpet events such as the Met Gala, Emmys, Tonys, and Oscars.

ISAMEL is leveraging this expertise to bring you innovative swimwear with design details:

  • Custom-designed hardware and jewelry additions
  • Real natural fresh-water pearl embroideries
  • Unique beaded strappings, which are under patent review
  • Gorgeous fine-detailed embellishments
  • 100% recycled plastic sequins
  • Styles that are truly flattering and selfie-perfect for all body types, making our customers look and feel confident
  • Silhouettes inspired by the ‘40s, ’80s, ’90s, and early 2000s, as well as runway fashion.
  • Entire looks are fully realized. For example, you can order a swimsuit, pareo cover-up skirt, and a headband or scrunchie that all are a perfect match in color and detail. Or, you can mix and match!

INNOVATIVE RECYCLED MATERIALS:

ECONYL:

A revolutionary Italian fabric made from 78% recycled fishing nets pulled from the ocean. It is incredibly soft and resistant to chlorine, UV rays, and sun creams. This means your ISAMEL swimwear not only feels and looks amazing but lasts through many swimwear seasons. You can find more information on ECONYL fabric here: https://www.econyl.com/the-process/

QUALITY:

Our bathing suits are designed and constructed to last two years or your money back. Most of our swimsuits are tested and projected to last over five full seasons of wear. This is quality swimwear that lasts! We stand behind everything we make and are very proud of our quality.

We also have an excellent repair program, which is quite rare in the swimwear market. 

Our customers can send back any piece up to two years after purchase for repairs if ever needed. Our repair program fits into our business’s sustainability and customer loyalty models.

SWIMWEAR SIZING:

Did you know most women purchase the wrong size in clothing and swimwear?

Our sizing reflects real women’s bodies. Also, our fabric has the perfect amount of stretch and the elastic recovery is very resilient.

See our sizing chart below:

RECYCLED SEQUINS:

We’ve partnered with the #1 fashion embroidery house in India who has developed sequins that are created from 100% recycled plastic, collected from city streets in India. This partnership assists in cleaner local communities, as well as provides new and necessary jobs to the region. 

ZERO WASTE IN PRODUCTION:

Extra cut-off fabric pieces are sewn into scrunchies and hair accessories. The very small leftover pieces are donated to a pillow-making factory. None of our fabric scraps are thrown away or end up in a landfill.

ECO-CONSCIOUS PACKAGING:

Our customers will be delighted when receiving and unboxing their packages. Our packaging is beautifully minimalist in design and created from eco-conscious materials.

Our swim styles are packed in cassava bags, which are fully biodegradable as they are created from plant starch.

All orders are shipped to our customers wrapped in paper tissue and inside recycled cardboard packaging for easy home recycling. 

No plastics are used to ship our products to customers.

By wearing ISAMEL you will be the chicest person at the beach, pool, or spa, while also contributing to helping the world environment. 

ETHICAL PRODUCTION:

Our sewing manufacturer is a 100% ethical family business. Everyone is over 24 years old, paid well above minimum wage, and men and women are paid equally for equal work.

The manufacturing facilities and offices have access to running water, electricity, air conditioning, ventilation, and cleanliness.

ABOUT KENDALL:

Hi, I’m Kendall, a 32-year-old Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD) fashion design alumni, lover of travel, and former competitive swimmer who has worked as a professional fashion designer with an emphasis on embellishment and fabric surface treatments in New York City for over ten years.

My most recent position was as a Senior Designer for Michael Kors Collection, with an emphasis on embellishment and embroidery design. I worked with Michael Kors personally for over six years and through that experience gained a wealth of insider knowledge. Michael was a wonderful mentor and I cherish the experience I gained with the company.

My fashion design experience is vast and includes: 

  • Gathering concepts and inspiration
  • Directing print, fabric, and embroidery research
  • Designing seasonal prints, patterns, and corresponding colorways
  • Sourcing and developing unique embellishment materials and techniques
  • Engineering embroideries and prints around the body
  • Executing highly detailed technical packets for overseas factories
  • Overseeing foreign mills by issuing comments and approvals on colors and embellishments
  • Sketching by hand and digitally
  • Actualizing samples to the final runway show and then production
  • Fitting garments
  • Pricing and negotiating for strong margins
  • Building relationships with vendors domestically and overseas
  • Merchandising
  • Directing embellished garment care and repairs

I was recently laid off due to Covid-19’s devastating effect on the world of fashion and am using this opportunity to finally 'dive in’ (pun intended!) to my long-time dream - creating a luxury swimwear and lifestyle empire. 

Having had an insider's view of the effects of waste and the consequences of mass production on the environment, I am delighted to use my skills to create a luxury swimwear line that reflects the change consumers want to see. 

Through ISAMEL my goal is to create more jobs for other talented but otherwise unemployed persons in this current economy, especially creating new opportunities for women, minorities, and persons of color.

The name ISAMEL is a wordplay and dedication to my beloved best friend Melissa who tragically passed away alongside her boyfriend Carl two years ago.

Melissa inspired me and many others to always be your true self, love nature, go for your dreams, dance and sunbathe whenever you can, and embrace new experiences - especially travel!

Your support of this campaign will go towards:

  • Purchasing of fabric
  • Development of custom embroideries
  • The first production run of swimwear inventory, which includes the international shipping cost and U.S. Customs duties and fees
  • Purchase of custom garment labels
  • Initial digital marketing campaigns
  • Photoshoot productions of the first collection drop which includes models, photographers, and retouching fees for our e-commerce website
  • The launch of our e-commerce website
  • Packaging supplies for shipping our products to customers (recycled boxes, labels, tissue paper, marketing materials, etc.)
  • Consulting fees for legal and tax experts
  • Overhead like office supplies, software, and platform fees

*This campaign funding will not be used to pay Kendall any type of capital compensation or salary.

After our INDIEGOGO campaign is finished, we are committed to bringing even more fresh colors and styles to our assortment!

We have some very exciting perks available with your donation to this campaign. By pre-ordering an ISAMEL piece (or a few!), we will be able to fund our first production run.

Simply select the style, size, and then color from the options below, and you will be the first to wear ISAMEL this summer!

*Please note that if a color is out of stock at the time of manufacture, we will reach out to you to select a different color.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Any contribution amount would be very appreciated and extremely helpful to building our brand. It’s completely understandable if you are not able to make a monetary donation at this time. Please help spread the word about this campaign with your friends, family, and co-workers. 

Also, if you have any professional connections that you think would help grow the business, they would be greatly welcomed! 

FOLLOW ISAMEL ON SOCIAL MEDIA:

You can help share this campaign via social media on the top right of this page.

Follow us on Instagram @shopisamel and stay tuned for our website launch at shopisamel.com!

story:
Overview

We’re passionate about empowering individuals to be unique today. We believe that we can do that through something as essential, yet simple as hairbrushes. Queen’s Story is the hairbrush product you will wish you had in your life all these years. For all of the brushing, detangling and effortless combing on your travels, Queen’s Story is ready to provide you with hairbrushes you can rely on.

These beautiful brushes are the perfect gifts for birthdays, anniversaries or just to make the woman around you feel special. Buy one of them and gift it to your mother, sister, or friends because small gestures matter!

If you are going to buy only ONE hair product this year, let this one be the one. Why?

  • Unique and Attractive Prints: Not only our hairbrushes are reliable, they are stylish and pretty so that will surely turn heads. So, all the beauty conscious people out there why settle for the same boring hairbrush when you can have one that reflects your aesthetic sense?
  • Different Styles: We have different styles of hairbrushes, each contains a beautiful personality trait therefore, you can select one according to your liking or personality relevance.
  • Reliable and Convenient Design: Our hairbrush design is one that is reliable, durable, and meant for all hair types. If your thick hairs stay untangles with most of the hair brushes. Try this one. It is unbreakable.

Why Back This Campaign?

You have a chance to be part of a new era of hairbrush – an era that celebrates uniqueness, style, creativity, and vibrancy. We want to keep this hairbrush affordable for our buyers, which is why we need your help to brand this product.

Be a part of this campaign to change the future of individual beauty expression forever. Share this to your social media platforms.

story: Frayed Knot is made of three, 18 year old guys trying to make a difference in the bow tie community.  Our ties are unlike any other tie on the market.  Every half is interchangeable and adjustable which allows for endless possibilities for customization.  Bow ties can be purchased by the half tie or full tie.  We competed in a Virginia DECA state competition, and placed first qualifying for the international competition in Orlando, Florida.  The DECA program allows us to spread the name of our company, and believe that competing at the international competition will help us legitimize our company and provide valuable knowledge about the inter workings of a business.  The competition is expensive, and there are three of us that need to go.   Any donation is greatly appreciated.  Please help us reach our goal, so we can spread the Frayed Knot brand.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Dominique Ansari, and I started my Ready-to-wear label back in 2009 in San Francisco, CA. I took a chance on something I really wanted to do after finding that the job market during that time took a plunge. I started out with Jersey knit dresses and expanded to tops, pants, jumpsuits, shrugs, swimwear and more.

A few years later, after much success selling my brand online and in local San Francisco boutiques, I was invited to showcase in Los Angels at LA Fashion Week.

My Brand has been recognized in many magazines, fashion shows, and trade show events throughout my design career. I have participated in the following shows, events,  and featured in the follow press:

Fashion Shows:

  • Project Ethos LA Fashion Week (2011)
  • New Orleans Fashion Week (Last two Collections) (2014/2015)
  • RAW:Artists San Francisco (2011)
  • Fashion Show at Anime Convention in San Jose, CA (2010)
  • Several Local Fashion Shows in Northern And Southern California

Boutiques I have sold In:
  • Rag Co-op San Francisco
  • Milk Handmade Chicago
  • 8 Limbs Los Angeles

    • Trade Shows I have Done:
  • Unique LA
  • Thread LA
  • Los Feliz Fashion Fest


    • Press:

    I opened a studio shortly after moving from Norcal to Socal and continued my work there, hiring interns to fulfill the orders we had coming in. I have always made everything by hand from scratch for each collection, so it's always been sleepless nights for me with each new collection.
    I took break after that to settle down with my family and moved to Texas, where I'm working on my latest Label; Couture! In Texas, I am a full time Stay at home mom to my 2 year old by day and a designer/seamtress at night. I have done two massive collections since I've had my son; both 30 pieces for each collections. 

    Now, I have been accepted to showcase my designs in what could be the highlight moment of my career, at an International show at Vancouver Fashion week! This is one of the largest, most anticipated shows I have ever done and it comes with a hefty price tag.

    I've gotten my foot into the door of being accepted, now I just need your help in reaching my goal to get there. This show means more to me than just a trip to vancovour; it's a chance for me to debute my couture collection to show what I can really do as a designer. I've never been able to really go all out and buy the materials I need to create a REAL couture collection because of limited budgeting, but with your help and this wonderful opportunity, I can do just that. The garments for this event will be completely handmade from start to finish by myself, so it will be challenging, yet completely satisfying once on the runway. This collection is a step into transforming myself into the bridal/couture designer that I've always wanted to become. By helping me, you could be inspiring someone else that had this same dream.


    What We Need & What You Get

    I've been Accepted, now I just need the means to get there. This campaign will help support, myself and my husband (my right hand assistant) with:  

    • Airfare
    • Transportation
    • Shipping the Collection
    • Materials
    • Hotel Accommodations (6-7 nights)
    • Designer Participation fee
    • Other Expenses
    The Designer Participation fee includes:
  • Security
  • Event Organization
  • Professional Runway 
  • Technical and Logistic Support
  • Lighting and Sound Equipment
  • Dedicated Backstage area
  • Backstage Equipment
  • Backstage management and Support
  • Dressers
  • Models
  • Model Management and or Model Replacement
  • Fittings
  • Rehearsals
  • Show choreography
  • Front Seating for guest
  • Photography
  • Video
  • Hair and Makeup

    • There are some really neat perks that are included in this campaign:
    • Gift Cards from my Ready-to-Wear Collections on Etsy
    • Exclusive Logo Designed Tote Bag

    • Exclusive Logo Designed T-Shirt

    • A digital illustrated rendering of one of our past editorials
    • Bespoke Designs handmade to fit you
    • Photoshoot opportunity with bespoke designer dress, hair and makeup
    • Ticket to the show

    If I don't reach my minimum goal here, then I will put whatever I do get towards the cost of the participation fee, and the rest I will try to find a different route of securing funds for the flight, hotel and others expenses.

    The Impact

    The Dominique Ansari brand is made for confident, strong women, who make bold choices when it comes to their clothing and style. Supporting me  in my journey to Vancouver Fashion week helps me to continue making clothes for women like this or those that need a boost of confidence. I've also only ever wanted to produce clothing here in the USA, this I why a lot of my items are bespoke items in order to keep it local. Supporting my dreams could make someone realize or believe in their dreams and know that it is possible to do. I want to make dresses that come from dreams and be able to keep the creativity in my designs, as well as take my brand to a higher level.

    Risks & Challenges

    This collection is a quite challenging one, in that it is something that I have never done before on a runway in a short period of time. Making 16 couture outfits for an international showcase can be quite daunting, as well as the cost that comes with doing such a show as this, but I have the skill, the experience, confidence, professionalism, and attitude to bring the best designs that I got for this show. Contributing to this campaign not only helps my brand, but you're giving stay-at-home moms everywhere a chance to see that they too can still do what they love and be with who they love. My dedication to my love for fashion has always made me a hard worker, and so I work into the morning hours to perfect every fit of every seam for this collection.  

    Other Ways You Can Help

    There are other ways you can help, if you can't donate now. Just spread the word to any and everyone that can, every little bit helps.

    If you would rather purchase a garment to help out, instead of donating, you can visit my etsy shop, at www.etsy.com/shop/DominiqueAnsari and to find out more about me or my collections, please visit: www.dominiqueansari.com

This collection is a step into transforming myself into the bridal/couture designer that I've always wanted to become. By helping me, you could be inspiring someone else that had this same dream.    What We Need & What You Get I've been Accepted, now I just need the means to get there. This campaign will help support, myself and my husband (my right hand assistant) with:  
Airfare
Transportation 
Shipping the Collection
Materials 
Hotel Accommodations (6-7 nights)
Designer Participation fee
Other Expenses



The Designer Participation fee includes: 
Security
Event Organization
Professional Runway 
Technical and Logistic Support
Lighting and Sound Equipment
Dedicated Backstage area
Backstage Equipment
Backstage management and Support
Dressers
Models
Model Management and or Model Replacement
Fittings
Rehearsals
Show choreography
Front Seating for guest
Photography
Video
Hair and Makeup
There are some really neat perks that are included in this campaign:

Gift Cards from my Ready-to-Wear Collections on Etsy
Exclusive Logo Designed Tote Bag

Exclusive Logo Designed T-Shirt

A digital illustrated rendering of one of our past editorials
Bespoke Designs handmade to fit you
Photoshoot opportunity with bespoke designer dress, hair and makeup
Ticket to the show

If I don't reach my minimum goal here, then I will put whatever I do get towards the cost of the participation fee, and the rest I will try to find a different route of securing funds for the flight, hotel and others expenses. 
    The Impact The Dominique Ansari brand is made for confident, strong women, who make bold choices when it comes to their clothing and style. Supporting me  in my journey to Vancouver Fashion week helps me to continue making clothes for women like this or those that need a boost of confidence. I've also only ever wanted to produce clothing here in the USA, this I why a lot of my items are bespoke items in order to keep it local. Supporting my dreams could make someone realize or believe in their dreams and know that it is possible to do. I want to make dresses that come from dreams and be able to keep the creativity in my designs, as well as take my brand to a higher level.    Risks & Challenges This collection is a quite challenging one, in that it is something that I have never done before on a runway in a short period of time. Making 16 couture outfits for an international showcase can be quite daunting, as well as the cost that comes with doing such a show as this, but I have the skill, the experience, confidence, professionalism, and attitude to bring the best designs that I got for this show. Contributing to this campaign not only helps my brand, but you're giving stay-at-home moms everywhere a chance to see that they too can still do what they love and be with who they love. My dedication to my love for fashion has always made me a hard worker, and so I work into the morning hours to perfect every fit of every seam for this collection.     Other Ways You Can Help There are other ways you can help, if you can't donate now. Just spread the word to any and everyone that can, every little bit helps. 
If you would rather purchase a garment to help out, instead of donating, you can visit my etsy shop, at www.etsy.com/shop/DominiqueAnsari and to find out more about me or my collections, please visit: www.dominiqueansari.com

story:
My name is Christopher Peter Van der Essen, a music producer, black light artist, and clothing designer. For the past few years I have set up the Peace Catcher, a fluorescent art installation based on the weave of a dream catcher, where I used its webs to hold folds in place on a shirt and use water based spray acrylic to paint clothing while it was being worn.

 As I travelled from festival to festival all over the northeastern United States with the Peace Catcher, I have learned much and honed my craft. Now it is the time for me to utilize my skills and pursue clothing design full time as a business. With your help I can make this dream a reality.

I have a studio where I will be working, but we are in need of getting blank shirts as well as paint in bulk to get this endeavor off the ground. In order to maintain quality and provide consistency, we will need to install the proper ventilation and build other equipment needed to produce the clothing in mass quantities. This includes building a spray booth and creating custom painting frames so multiple shirts can be painted at the same time. I also need to construct the proper black light displays for my art, so the public can see my work in normal as well as black light. With your help I will be able to provide for my family, provide jobs as well as leave a legacy for my son.
As a personal thank you for everyone that contributes to my campaign, you will receive:

NAME LISTED ON WEBSITE & SOCIAL MEDIA ($5 Contribution)

CUSTOM SINGLE LAYER PAINTED T-SHIRT ($25 Contribution)



CUSTOM MULTI LAYER PAINTED T-SHIRT ($50 Contribution)




CUSTOM MULTI LAYER PAINTED T-SHIRT & A NUMBERED AND SIGNED CERTIFICATE  OF AUTHENTICITY THAT GETS ONE OF YOUR SHIRTS PAINTED AT ALL FUTURE EVENTS ($100 Contribution)



CUSTOM HOODIE & A NUMBERED AND SIGNED CERTIFICATE  OF AUTHENTICITY THAT GETS ONE OF YOUR SHIRTS PAINTED AT ALL FUTURE EVENTS ($500 Contribution)



CUSTOM JACKET & A NUMBERED AND SIGNED CERTIFICATE  OF AUTHENTICITY THAT GETS ONE OF YOUR SHIRTS PAINTED AT ALL FUTURE EVENTS ($1000 Contribution)



COMPLIMENTARY TICKETS TO ALL 2016 EVENTS, CUSTOM JACKET, & A NUMBERED AND SIGNED CERTIFICATE  OF AUTHENTICITY THAT GETS ONE OF YOUR SHIRTS PAINTED AT ALL FUTURE EVENTS ($5000 Contribution)

If you cannot afford to donate please share this campaign on social media, post it on your wall, your friends and family's wall, and in groups and your pages. Thank you all very much.

story:
Tianblue is a brand inspired by a mix of fashion lifestyle and the sport of polo, focusing on men and women’s polo shirts. Tianblue aims to not only capture the true essence of the sport of polo, but also keep up to date with latest fashion trends. 

Tianblue was established in 2004 when twin polo players Alice and Louisa Hutton struggled to find well-fitted female polo shirts to play polo in (obviously as with any sport, shirts that fit and allow movement are important in polo). Tianblue began as a way for polo players in Asia (primarily ladies) to find fitted polo shirts with a creative edge, bringing a more fun and colorful look to the polo field.
 

That's us! Alice on the left and Louisa on the right :)

After the success on the polo field, the brand moved on to producing items for people to enjoy both on and off the field. The company enjoyed early success at strategic equestrian and fashion locations around Singapore and the UK for a few years before ceasing business in 2009.
 
Tianblue prides itself on designing and manufacturing not just apparel of the highest quality and best fits, but also vibrant and fun designs. In addition to polo shirts, Tianblue will soon make a wide range of other clothing items and accessories including hoodies, vests, jeans, caps, and much more.

Check out a collection of Tianblue's past designs in this gallery:
 
 

At Tianblue, we take quality and integrity very seriously. No product will ship until we are 100% satisfied of its quality. This encompasses all aspects of the apparel, from quality of fabric to quality of print and embroidery. Tianblue shirts last a long time and are durable enough to endure the stretch and sweat of a high paced polo match.

As well as quality of product, we also keep a close eye on our supply chain, ensuring no human rights violations or animal cruelty occurs along the way. Its too easy to become complacent in this area, with so many suspect suppliers offering such great deals. To ensure the integrity of all of our products, Tianblue has no problem paying a slight premium in production, after all, what's a couple of dollars profit in exchange for a clear consious and peace of mind? :)

(We currently have our shirts produced by a company in Singapore who use a factory in Malaysia)
 

After completing university and entering the workforce, we are now ready to bring Tianblue back, and we need your help! We are aiming to re-launch Tianblue with a fully operational online boutique style website in October 2015 offering polo shirts and T shirts to begin with. Our goal is to raise US$25,000 to help fund our 2015 Autumn Range of Polo Shirts that will include women's, men's and children's shirts in a variety of different colours and designs. We will then expand the range to Rugby Shirts in January 2016 (we’ve got some awesome designs ready and waiting) before launching Tianblue Hoodies and Jeans with our full 2016 Spring Collection.  

What happens if our goal is not reached? That won't stop us! Not for one second. Tianblue is a brand we hold close to our hearts and we will continue to strive to reach our goal. Whatever money is raised through this campaign (even if it falls under our target of US$25,000.00) will go towards our efforts to re-establish Tianblue as a trusted fashion label (we’ll just have to re-work some of our launch numbers) And all contributors will of course still receive their Tianblue shirts :)

 


 

We will be re-launching with 4 Ladies Polo Shirt's, 3 Men's Polo Shirt's and 4 Children's Polo Shirts. You can either view the full range by clicking on the link to our catalogue below, or view each design individually.

Click here to view a PDF version of the catalogue. 


The Tianblue logo was designed around the Chinese character 'Tian', meaning sky. The two polo playing girls represent twin sisters Alice and Louisa playing polo. This polo girl has been a central design in many of the shirt designs, and has become a symbol in which many female polo players have come to love and relate to. Both the girls now live in China (Alice in Beijing and Louisa in Shanghai), and the Chinese language is something they have both become quite passionate for. A few of the very popular Tianblue shirt designs are designed with a Chinese influence. One of the favorites is a shirt with the popular polo quote 'King of Games' written in Chinese. You can see one of these designs in the picture below.


 
 

       

Tianblue prides itself on designing and manufacturing not just apparel of the highest quality and best fits, but also vibrant and fun designs.

In addition to polo shirts, Tianblue will also produce a wide range of other clothing items and accessories including hoodies, vests, jeans, caps, and much more.


And of course many more polo shirt designs ... ;)



 

We know some of you out there may want to support the Tianblue brand but are unable to support financially at this time. That’s ok, we’re happy for all the support we can get be it financial or not. If you want to help in other ways, the best way would be to share this campaign with all of your contacts in an effort to help us secure more contributors and get us closer to our goal. You can do so by sharing this link: http://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/659bcfdd

"Let others play at other things, the King of games is still the game of Kings..."

story:
Short Summary

 

Against The Grain Sunglasses Co. is a Toronto, Canada based start up company that is dedicated to eco-fashion. We believe that there is no reason why an individual cannot be both fashionable and eco-conscious at the same time. That is why all of our products are made from either all natural or recyclable materials.
ATG Sunglasses currently has 1 product line out, which has been a big hit! With all of our customers positive feedback propelling us, we are currently working on 3 new collections that are to be released within the next month or two.
We have also created a partnership with an amazing Canadian company named "The Carbon Farmer". Some of you may have seen them featured on CBC's "The Dragons Den" where they were backed by Bruce and Arlene. The Carbon Farmer builds and preserves forests and provide habitats for wildlife. We created this partnership to create a "Giving Back Program" for ourselves and our customers. So for every pair of sunglasses sold, we donate to have a tree planted and cared for within Canada until it reaches maturity. In this Campaign, every contribution is rewarded with at least 1 tree being planted.

What We Need & What You Get

**If our goal is reached, ATG Sunglasses Co, will donate to have an additional 50 tree's planted, this is in addition to those from awarded during the funding process**
If this funding is successful, we plan on using a majority of the funds towards research and development. Our limitation on materials that we are able to use, coupled with our need to have High Quality frames and lenses that offer complete UV400 protection, make this process quite expensive and extensive.
We will also use a portion of the funds to improve on our website, making it easier to navigate for our customers and offering a better experience.
In addition to planting tree's, we will also be offering our current line of sunglasses as incentives. We already have them in our possession, so they will be shipped out worldwide as soon as the campaign is over! 

The Impact

The Impact we plan on creating is one that is as least harmful and invasive as possible. Against The Grain Sunglasses Co. has a firm belief that every business should be responsible to preserve our planet as much as possible and to look ahead of their short term goals and ensure that our planet will thrive for generations to come. Having tree's planted with our profits is a small but effective way of us standing behind these beliefs, and ensures our customers will feel good about their purchase!
