story:
Who is Quotus?

We are an independent label that produces handcrafted stationery. We were bored of seeing the shop shelves full of the same brands, products, colors and design, therefore we have decided to create by ourselves different products capable of satisfying tastes and needs of those who are looking for something new.

We realize sketchbooks, notebooks and block-notes covered with genuine leather, made with fine laid paper and a wide range of themes and colors. Anyway, we are not here to talk about what we’ve done…

We are here to talk about our latest creation, NovusBook.





What is NovusBook? 

Our latest creation is a sketchbook that mixes genuine leather with the amazing technology of carbon fiber, the material of the future. 

The word Novus means New in latin, the language spoken in Ancient Rome by poets and emperors, which has influenced many European languages. It is a New notebook that has its roots in the past and wants to help us rediscover the pleasure of writing with our own hand, leaving for a while our digital lives, writing with our unique and inimitable calligraphy a simple sentence, a thought, an emotion.

Suitable for all those people who want to stand out from the crowd, possessing something unique and special that reflect their personality.

It is the perfect accessory for businessmen, for career women and for young novelty lovers who want to be one step ahead of their peers. 

An object that will not cut a poor figure next to our tablet or smartphone, and will remind us the importance of  writing, in our own hand, what really matters in our life.  

 



We want to bring this project to your attention because no one ever realized nothing like this in the world of stationery, a particular field where innovation rarely finds space, since the materials and the techniques used, are always the same. 

We took a risk choosing carbon fiber, a material that is normally used for luxury cars, sport bicycles, planes or space missions, but that no one would think to use with an ancient and classical object made of paper and leather like a notebook. The challenge was right here, trying to combine two world so far apart, proving that it is possible to introduce new materials without losing elegance and class! 

To realize this goal, Quotus needs you too!!!



How we create a NovusBook?

NovusBook is an high-quality product, for those who want to stand out in a simple but refined way...... in every detail.

This is why we pay attention to all the details during the production, from the selection of high-value materials to the manufacturing activities, in order to give you a 100% Made in Italy object which is:

  • Beautiful - NovusBook is a perfect balance between linearity and elegance, realized by Italian master artisans according to the inimitable Made in Italy style.
  • Strong – Great leather thickness, good grammage, perfect binding and the best quality of carbon fiber, guarantee solidity and durability to each product.
  • Handy – An essential and meticulous cutting, with the choice of smooth and uniform textured leather, emphasizes the natural qualities and simplicity of the product. This allows you to use it with ease in a several different situations, every day, both in free time and in formal occasions, where it will look really good near the common organizer of your boss!


To realize NovusBook we have choosen:

  • Only the best quality of genuine leather
  • Only 100 gr/m2 of ivory laid paper uncoated  
  • Only carbon fiber from certified companies with the necessary patents for its production and processing.

We want each NovusBook to be the result of a careful study and will be the best witness of the passion for our work.  

The love, the care and the rigor used for creating NovusBook, are the same that we have used in the past in the realization of all our traditional creations: notebooks, sketchbooks and block-notes covered with genuine leather, to be chosen from dozen of colors and themes, in order to satisfy every taste. Come to discover all our collections on the website quotus.it, in the meantime, this short video will introduce you in our world, in which our artisans works every day with professionalism and passion.






Why Indiegogo? 

Because we firmly believe in this project and we made many sacrifices to realize it! 

Carbon small notebook are only the first step and we would like to expand our horizon increasing the carbon fiber collection. We believe that it will be possible to discover new solutions, using the skills and the experience of our artisans and thanks to the famous italian ability to find innovative solutions by reusing materials that had been never applied in a particular field. To make this possible, we need your help!

Working the carbon fiber is very expensive  and we need  sophisticated machineries. We have invested a lot of our resources and energies for this first stage of research and experimentation, as well as the production of the first examples. In order to continue to produce NovusBook we should buy larger quantities of carbon fiber, appropriate machineries  and an advertisement that reaches the highest number of people, because we are sure that this product can please everyone, without differences.

With this campaign, we are offering all the first samples of NovusBook at a special price, that we will not propose again in the future because of the high material and processing costs. This is a chance for you to help us and, at the same time, buy a new and innovative product that will certainly be more expensive.



Packages that can be purchased with a perk

This is a list of our perks; we have tried to satisfy everyone with many price ranges offering a variety of solutions for those who would like to purchase a Novusbook  

For any other requirements or special needs do not hesitate to write to us at: info@quotus.it




Customize your NovusBook

Buying one of the two packages “customizable”, you can engrave your name, initials or a short phrase on your NovusBook, making it a unique and special product. Through a delicate process, made by skilled craftsmen, we are able to write on the plate of carbon fiber, with an elegant cursive writing that will give even more prestige to your exclusive purchase.

Fashion Packages

The Fashion packages are the result of a selection of the most special leathers of our collection; they are NovusBook available only in 3-4 pieces. The packages are a surprise! So if you decide to buy one package, you can receive one of those in the pictures below. 

We just have to wish you good luck, and remind you that for any doubt or question you can write here on Indiegogo or send us an email to: info@quotus.it



Why Quotus has been created?

Because the fast-paced rhythm of modern life conditions us! It so happens that, among thousand of things to do, slow down and enjoy our life, becomes a luxury. 

Quotus is proud to bring that luxury back.

It can help you, discretely and constantly, to grab and keep noteworthy emotions, thoughts, ideas, events and people.

Rediscovering the ancient pleasure of writing by hand, the small space of a sheet becomes a place where we can express ourselves, find ourselves, feel emotions, leaving traces of what really counts.




Follow all our profiles to stay up to date on this campaign, and do not forget to share!


 : To always know everything about Quotus

 : For short and timely updates about Quotus world

  : Quotus in the life of every day, our Instagram profile

 : Our best pictures on Pinterest's profile

 : To see the Quotus videos at best quality

 : Quotus channel on Youtube

 : Official Quotus blog



Talk about us


 : A creative agency, that always looking out for quality stationery 

 : Giovanni Maieli, italian marketing specialist, consultant, entrepreneur


 : Publisher for the publication of magazines







FAQ

  • How NovusBooks are made? - They are high-quality products made with fine and noble materials. The particularity of our product is the choice to combine carbon fiber plates, mm 170x80, with genuine leather, purchased by the best Northern Italian tanneries. All the sheets are printed with only Laid paper , 100 gr per square metre, (a particular type of paper which is no longer used by any competitor because it is too expensive).
  • Who makes NovusBook? - Expert Italian craftsmen make an excellent, practical and fashionable product.
  • Where do the materials of the NovusBook come from? - We purchase both the paper and the leather from Italian companies that produce the row materials used. The product is 100% Made in Italy.
  • There are many versions of NovusBook? - Currently, we have realized the 12x17 cm size, but in the future we could realize the 17x24 cm size.
  • How many themes are available? - NovusBook is available exclusively with blank page, ivory color, for Classic Lines (red, black, blue and green) and lined page for Fashion Lines.
  • Is it possible to customize the leather cover? - Prior request must be made by e-mail at  info@quotus.it, asking for different colors of leathers.  Obviously it is possible to hot-stamping  a logo, your initials or a brand onto leather (please ask for a detailed costs estimate because they can vary significantly).
  • Is NovusBook a long lasting product? - Our products are made from expert craftsmen who use tested assembly techniques; for this reason all the Quotus products are destined to endure over time..
  • How a Notebook Quotus is made? - The Laid paper 100 gr is bound in quinternion – five bifolia and cotton thread. A 280 gr cardboard cover is glued on it and on top of that a leather cover is applied; then, the product is trimmed according to the size and the design chosen. The last step is to glue the carbon fiber plate, previously trimmed to fit perfectly with the cover of the notebook.
  • Where do we ship NovusBook? - We are able to ship the products all over the world through agreements with the world's main couriers. The price ranges are: Italy – Europe – United States – Rest of the World
  • How quickly you will receive NovusBook? - Normally, we have all the products in stock, therefore we ship within 1 week from the request. In case the product is not available in our warehouse, we need 20/30 working days to produce or customize a new product.
story_txt:
Who is Quotus?We are an independent label that produces handcrafted stationery. We were bored of seeing the shop shelves full of the same brands, products, colors and design, therefore we have decided to create by ourselves different products capable of satisfying tastes and needs of those who are looking for something new.We realize sketchbooks, notebooks and block-notes covered with genuine leather, made with fine laid paper and a wide range of themes and colors. Anyway, we are not here to talk about what we’ve done…We are here to talk about our latest creation, NovusBook.What is NovusBook? Our latest creation is a sketchbook that mixes genuine leather with the amazing technology of carbon fiber, the material of the future. The word Novus means New in latin, the language spoken in Ancient Rome by poets and emperors, which has influenced many European languages. It is a New notebook that has its roots in the past and wants to help us rediscover the pleasure of writing with our own hand, leaving for a while our digital lives, writing with our unique and inimitable calligraphy a simple sentence, a thought, an emotion.Suitable for all those people who want to stand out from the crowd, possessing something unique and special that reflect their personality.It is the perfect accessory for businessmen, for career women and for young novelty lovers who want to be one step ahead of their peers. An object that will not cut a poor figure next to our tablet or smartphone, and will remind us the importance of  writing, in our own hand, what really matters in our life.   We want to bring this project to your attention because no one ever realized nothing like this in the world of stationery, a particular field where innovation rarely finds space, since the materials and the techniques used, are always the same. We took a risk choosing carbon fiber, a material that is normally used for luxury cars, sport bicycles, planes or space missions, but that no one would think to use with an ancient and classical object made of paper and leather like a notebook. The challenge was right here, trying to combine two world so far apart, proving that it is possible to introduce new materials without losing elegance and class! To realize this goal, Quotus needs you too!!!How we create a NovusBook?NovusBook is an high-quality product, for those who want to stand out in a simple but refined way...... in every detail.This is why we pay attention to all the details during the production, from the selection of high-value materials to the manufacturing activities, in order to give you a 100% Made in Italy object which is:

Beautiful - NovusBook is a perfect balance between linearity and elegance, realized by Italian master artisans according to the inimitable Made in Italy style.


Strong – Great leather thickness, good grammage, perfect binding and the best quality of carbon fiber, guarantee solidity and durability to each product.


Handy – An essential and meticulous cutting, with the choice of smooth and uniform textured leather, emphasizes the natural qualities and simplicity of the product. This allows you to use it with ease in a several different situations, every day, both in free time and in formal occasions, where it will look really good near the common organizer of your boss!



To realize NovusBook we have choosen:
Only the best quality of genuine leather
Only 100 gr/m2 of ivory laid paper uncoated  
Only carbon fiber from certified companies with the necessary patents for its production and processing.
We want each NovusBook to be the result of a careful study and will be the best witness of the passion for our work.  The love, the care and the rigor used for creating NovusBook, are the same that we have used in the past in the realization of all our traditional creations: notebooks, sketchbooks and block-notes covered with genuine leather, to be chosen from dozen of colors and themes, in order to satisfy every taste. Come to discover all our collections on the website quotus.it, in the meantime, this short video will introduce you in our world, in which our artisans works every day with professionalism and passion.
Why Indiegogo? Because we firmly believe in this project and we made many sacrifices to realize it! Carbon small notebook are only the first step and we would like to expand our horizon increasing the carbon fiber collection. We believe that it will be possible to discover new solutions, using the skills and the experience of our artisans and thanks to the famous italian ability to find innovative solutions by reusing materials that had been never applied in a particular field. To make this possible, we need your help!Working the carbon fiber is very expensive  and we need  sophisticated machineries. We have invested a lot of our resources and energies for this first stage of research and experimentation, as well as the production of the first examples. In order to continue to produce NovusBook we should buy larger quantities of carbon fiber, appropriate machineries  and an advertisement that reaches the highest number of people, because we are sure that this product can please everyone, without differences.With this campaign, we are offering all the first samples of NovusBook at a special price, that we will not propose again in the future because of the high material and processing costs. This is a chance for you to help us and, at the same time, buy a new and innovative product that will certainly be more expensive.

Packages that can be purchased with a perk
This is a list of our perks; we have tried to satisfy everyone with many price ranges offering a variety of solutions for those who would like to purchase a Novusbook  
For any other requirements or special needs do not hesitate to write to us at: info@quotus.it









Customize your NovusBook
Buying one of the two packages “customizable”, you can engrave your name, initials or a short phrase on your NovusBook, making it a unique and special product. Through a delicate process, made by skilled craftsmen, we are able to write on the plate of carbon fiber, with an elegant cursive writing that will give even more prestige to your exclusive purchase.

Fashion Packages
The Fashion packages are the result of a selection of the most special leathers of our collection; they are NovusBook available only in 3-4 pieces. The packages are a surprise! So if you decide to buy one package, you can receive one of those in the pictures below. 
We just have to wish you good luck, and remind you that for any doubt or question you can write here on Indiegogo or send us an email to: info@quotus.it



















Why Quotus has been created?

Because the fast-paced rhythm of modern life conditions us! It so happens that, among thousand of things to do, slow down and enjoy our life, becomes a luxury. 
Quotus is proud to bring that luxury back.
It can help you, discretely and constantly, to grab and keep noteworthy emotions, thoughts, ideas, events and people.
Rediscovering the ancient pleasure of writing by hand, the small space of a sheet becomes a place where we can express ourselves, find ourselves, feel emotions, leaving traces of what really counts.








Follow all our profiles to stay up to date on this campaign, and do not forget to share!



 : To always know everything about Quotus
 : For short and timely updates about Quotus world 
  : Quotus in the life of every day, our Instagram profile
 : Our best pictures on Pinterest's profile 
 : To see the Quotus videos at best quality
 : Quotus channel on Youtube
 : Official Quotus blog 



Talk about us


 : A creative agency, that always looking out for quality stationery 

 : Giovanni Maieli, italian marketing specialist, consultant, entrepreneur

 : Publisher for the publication of magazines

story:
Bonjour!

Je souhaite aider mon parfait gentleman du mieux que je peux... Sa collection printemps/été a très bien été accueillie a Toronto cet été.

Il désire plus que tout présenter une nouvelle collection pour l'automne, encore plus spectaculaire que la première!! Mais ceci coûte très cher...

Je vous demande donc de faire partie de l'aventure en contribuant selon votre désir... Je vous suis reconnaissante d'avance pour votre générosité!!! :)

--------

Hello!

I want to help my perfect gentleman as best as I can ... His spring / summer collection was a uge sucess in Toronto this summer.

He wants more than anything to present a new collection for fall, even more spectacular than the first !! But this is very expensive ...

I ask you to be part of the adventure by contributing according to your desire ... I am grateful in advance for your generosity !!! :)

story:
BÓG WIE CO (GOD KNOWS WHAT in Polish) is a fashion clothing brand created in Poland by Sonia Świacka in December 2013. Sonia who had previously worked for a global IT outsourcing company decided after several years of leading global transformation projects, to leave the corporate world and use her skills in an entirely different environment. "One day I realised that I would like to use my abilities, experience and knowledge I have gained for a different purpose. I still wanted to make changes but wanted something more." With the heart of a missionary and the mind of a creator, Sonia found a path, that would combine spreading Christ's message - you can trust Me - with pop culture and modern design.

                       


The clothing brand was created with limited funds: "I needed a year to come up with a plan of what I should do next in my life, which resulted in all my savings being used up ". After the eureka moment, Sonia managed to gain a small grant from the EU labour fund and slowly started working on the project. Within two years, she has managed to launch an e-commerce website and open two standalone boutiques, both based in Poland’s large cities: Szczecin and Krakow.


BÓG WIE CO big differentiator is quality - everything is produced locally using Polish fabrics and manufacturing. The collections offer womenswear and menswear fashion, shoes and accessories, which characterise a minimalistic, simple and bold style. "We likes playing with words - the name of the brand BÓG WIE CO, in many languages has two meanings. The direct one is our motto for life."


This campaign has been inspired by upcoming World Youth Days 2016. It is a catholic event, which gathers young Christians from all over the world in Krakow, Poland. "It is our dream to give people the opportunity to buy designer clothing with the same message in over 20 different languages. Creating a collection of clothes with three simple words "God knows what" is a step towards deeper awareness. Awareness that can lead us to "become the change we want to see in the world" (M. Ghandi)"

                               

By contributing to this simple yet bold collection, you not only help making the fashion industry more beautiful and meaningful but also you become a part of the peaceful change ideal. Change that many of us are sincerely seeking from the bottom of our hearts.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Most of the funds we are asking for ($25 016) will go towards buying materials, paying for sewing, printing and finishing services. The rest ($1 550) will cover the expenses needed to prepare this campaign (film, photos, IT related cost)
  • In thanks for your contribution, we will be offering you products from our unique multi-language collection: shirts, blouses, caps, bags and especially for women - our best seller - the T-shirt dress

 
All products produced in Poland from the best quality locally sourced materials

B-dress- closer look


B-shirts - closer look


The timeline


Risks & Challenges

If we don't reach the entire goal, the funds will be used to produce a smaller collection. We want to use all the money we get from you to invest in our products and create new designs (apart from the campaign expenses which we need to cover first).

We hope to be ready with our collection for the World Youth Days 2016 in Krakow on 27th - 31th July, but of course delays could occur due to manufacturing issues. In this unlikely event some garments might be completed and distributed later than planned.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially but still want to help:

You can promote our campaign (publish it on your FB page, Instagram, Twitter or simply email or tell your friends around the world)

Pray for us and our campaign so that it brings more good to society as a whole.

Thank you so much!

story:
Adelaide Apparel

Are you tired of not feeling comfortable in the clothing offered at your local department stores? Tired of dresses that hit mid-thigh, too-low necklines and too-high slits? Do you wish you could find comfortable yet stylish fashions that keep you and your lifestyle in mind? We do too!

We own a women’s modest clothing boutique in Logan, Utah, and a lack of stylish yet beautiful, functional and modest clothing in the fashion world lead us to the conclusion that we needed to design and manufacture our own clothing. That’s why we are developing Adelaide Apparel.  We will feature junior and women's clothing in sizes XS to 3XL (0 to 20) made from comfortable yet durable fabrics in timeless and vintage inspired cuts to give you many years of enjoyment. We have future plans to manufacture maternity/nursing and girls clothing sizes 8 to 14 as well.

We had a few items that we were able to manufacture last year which were very well received. We had the Annie Dress, the Zoe and Poppy tops, and the Sarah Perfect skirt, all of which sold out in just a few months in our little store.

We feel that dressing modestly is empowering to women allowing them to be seen for their merits and abilities, and to feel comfortable and look beautiful in any situation. #modestyempowers is the hashtag for our women's clothing movement.  Join the revolution and help us empower women everywhere.


Our Fundraising Goals and Your Benefits

We all know that bank loans are risky for small businesses and hard to come by. When we learned about the crowdfunding opportunities that are now available, we were in love! We now have a platform where we can introduce and pre-sell our clothing line and get the funding required for large-scale clothing manufacturing without having to "sell the farm" as it were. And bonus for you, our faithful backers, is that in pre-ordering merchandise from us you will get a spectacular deal! The perks we are offering are in the form of merchandise credits to our online store, adelaideapparel.com. That way you can pick out exactly what you want when our merchandise arrives. 

Donations: our undying love and gratitude

$25 pledge = $30 merchandise credit (20% bonus)

$50 pledge = $60 merchandise credit (20% bonus)

$70 pledge = $85 merchandise credit (22% bonus)

$100 pledge = $125 merchandise credit (25% bonus)

$250 pledge = $325 merchandise credit (30% bonus)

$500 pledge = $675 merchandise credit (35% bonus)

$1000 pledge = $1400 merchandise credit (40% bonus)

Once we have several pieces manufactured and in our inventory, we will contact you and let you know they are available on our online store. 


Call to Action

We have women of all sizes coming in our store every single day that are so tired of what the department stores are offering. They have been from store to store and are unable to find great  high quality basic pieces, such as modest skirts, blouses and tops. They also want beautiful, flattering dresses in styles that will not become obsolete in a year or two. We want to help! Support our #modestyempowers movement and help us revolutionize women's clothing one beautiful outfit at a time.

Our Challenges

There are always challenges with any new endeavor, and clothing design and manufacturing are no different. We have done our homework and found a fantastic manufacturer and partner in design that works out of Texas, we flew to Los Angeles and found many beautiful high quality fabrics, and we have many fantastic designs. Now we need two more things:  time and money. Once we reach our funding goals the process is a bit long in approving samples and manufacturing. Because of this our timetable for fulfilling your pledges is open ended. We envision having several of our styles in by the end of the year. We have over 22 pieces designed and in the works. Getting all of them up and in the manufacturing process will take us into the middle of 2017. 

Our online store, www.adelaideapparel.com currently has a very bare bones offering of a few items that we sell in our little boutique. When our Adelaide line becomes available in force, all of it will be available on the website. We will keep you up to date on the launching of the new and improved online store.

Ways You Can Help

We hope you love our ideas and our plan to help empower women and make women's clothing that is more user-friendly. If you can make a donation or pledge, that is awesome. If you can't right now, please help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with your friends and family. Thank you!!

story:
Save Your Purses!!

You spend good money on your purses and bags. The last thing you need is to accidentally put it down in a sticky mess. Wrapurse™ solves the problem. An on-the-go, quick on, quick off, lightweight wrap for any size purse: Wrapurse covers small purses to diaper bags. 

According to statistics at Statista.com, in 2013, women in the US spent 8.7 Billion Dollars on handbags.  Many women resell their designer handbags and get a lot of money for them.  They could get even more if the the handbag looks new. 

The Story

I’m a single mom of two very active and athletic boys.  I’ve sat on bleachers, benches and fields cheering on my kids’ teams.  Many times I’ve had to go to games with my purse.  I won’t leave it in the car, but who wants to hold it in their lap the entire time?  So….. I eventually had to put it down.  Yuck!  

After ruining several expensive bags with mud, rust and unknown sticky gooey stuff stuck to the bottom (not to mention all the gross germs), I thought what can I do to protect the bottom of my favorite bags?  The solution is Wrapurse. 

Germs. Grime.  Rust.  Goo.  Things we all want to keep off the bottom of our purses and diaper bags. We all want to carry a purse that is clean and looks new, after all it's a fashion statement. 

And, I don't want to bring germs into my home.  Moms with diaper bags - you know what I'm talking about!  You go to change your baby at a public venue and 9 times out of 10 there is nowhere to put your diaper bag down except directly on a disgusting restroom floor!  Then you bring the bag home and put it on your  floor where your baby is crawling.  

Where do you put your purse down?  Doctors' office floors, shopping carts, bathrooms with no hooks, movie theaters, the list goes on and on.  Women put their purses down every day and the bottom of their bags do not just contain germs but are also getting ruined and detract from the look of the bag.  

Benefits

  • Convenient–Wrapurse folds into a small, lightweight case so it can go where you go.
  • Versatile–Wrapurse comes in four sizes to fit most purse, tote and diaper bag styles.
  • Reusable–Just hand-wipe and your Wrapurse is ready to use again and again.
  • Protective–Wrapurse keeps your purse good looking, clean, dry and germ-free.

Charity Begins at Home

I'm a single mom and one of the reasons I created Wrapurse was so that I could stay home with my kids.  I have a son with special needs who has struggled for years.  Fortunately, he is doing much better now, but educationally, we still have a long road ahead ahead of us.  But then, I recently stumbled upon an organization called Understood.org.  

Understood.org is a comprehensive FREE online resource created by 15 nonprofits that care deeply about kids with learning and attention issues. Understood empowers parents through personalized support, interactive tools, daily access to experts, a community of parents and more, so their children can go from simply coping to truly thriving in school and in life.

This hit home with me - finally an online community I could use to help my son, Colton.  I wish I would have found it years ago!  It was at that point I decided to give back so that Understood could continue to help others.  I will be donating $1 for every bag sold in this campaign to Understood.org. 

At the end of the campaign, all the money collected for charity, will be given directly to the non-profit organization.

What I Need & What You Get 

With your help, I will be able to help establish a brand for Wrapurse as well as get them into major retailers. We have a strong following on Facebook but need to get the word out and the need established. It's a new product category, and it's taking more time and money to bring it to top of mind. 

If we surpass our funding, we could also offer additional color choices, patterns and sizes! Who knows?!

Challenges

The greatest challenge I face, and the main reason for doing this Indiegogo Campaign, is to raise awareness and bring my dream to life.  Having a child with special needs has kept me from working a mainstream job.  I developed this idea so I would be able to work from home and support my children.  

FAQ

  • When do I get my PERK?  Many campaigns make you wait months for your perk.  I will send your perk right after the campaign closes and your color choice is confirmed.  Sorry, but for obvious reasons custom perks will take a bit longer.  Those who back the project early in the campaign and indicate color preference and size will get their perk the fastest.
  • How do I choose a color and size?  The current three color choices and a size chart for the four sizes are pictured.  There are instructions on how to measure your purse.  The most common sizes are Medium or Large.
  • How do I add multiple PERKS? This can only be done one at a time. Therefore you add the first PERK go through all the steps of logging in and then go back to the campaigns main page select another PERK and check out again. You can do this as many times as necessary. 
  • How can I upgrade my PERK after I already purchased one? Find the answer here.

Other Ways You Can Help

I'm doing everything I can to spread the word but I need your help. If you could do something as simple as sharing this page with your Facebook friends or posting a link on Instagram, it can go a long way.  Simply click the Facebook tab at the bottom of the page.  Here is my link for Instagram Wrapurse Instagram.

And please use the Indiegogo share tools! 


Thank you so much for your continued support!!

All the best, Team Wrapurse
story_txt:
Save Your Purses!!

You spend good money on your purses and bags. The last thing you need is to accidentally put it down in a sticky mess. Wrapurse™ solves the problem. An on-the-go, quick on, quick off, lightweight wrap for any size purse: Wrapurse covers small purses to diaper bags. 

According to statistics at Statista.com, in 2013, women in the US spent 8.7 Billion Dollars on handbags.  Many women resell their designer handbags and get a lot of money for them.  They could get even more if the the handbag looks new. 

The Story
 

I’m
a single mom of two very active and athletic boys.  I’ve sat on bleachers, benches and fields
cheering on my kids’ teams.  Many times
I’ve had to go to games with my purse.  I
won’t leave it in the car, but who wants to hold it in their lap the entire time?  So….. I eventually had to put it down.  Yuck!  

After ruining several expensive bags with mud,
rust and unknown sticky gooey stuff stuck to the bottom (not to mention all the
gross germs), I thought what can I do to protect the bottom of my favorite bags?  The solution is Wrapurse. 


Germs. Grime.  Rust.  Goo.  Things we all want to keep off the bottom of our purses and diaper bags. We all want to carry a purse that is clean and looks new, after all it's a fashion statement. 
And, I don't want to bring germs into my home.  Moms with diaper bags - you know what I'm talking about!  You go to change your baby at a public venue and 9 times out of 10 there is nowhere to put your diaper bag down except directly on a disgusting restroom floor!  Then you bring the bag home and put it on your  floor where your baby is crawling.  
Where do you put your purse down?  Doctors' office floors, shopping carts, bathrooms with no hooks, movie theaters, the list goes on and on.  Women put their purses down every day and the bottom of their bags do not just contain germs but are also getting ruined and detract from the look of the bag.  







Benefits





Convenient–Wrapurse folds into a small, lightweight case so it can go where you go.


Versatile–Wrapurse comes in four sizes to fit most purse, tote and diaper bag styles.


Reusable–Just hand-wipe and your Wrapurse is ready to use again and again.


Protective–Wrapurse keeps your purse good looking, clean, dry and germ-free.






Charity Begins at Home
I'm a single mom and one of the reasons I created Wrapurse was so that I could stay home with my kids.  I have a son with special needs who has struggled for years.  Fortunately, he is doing much better now, but educationally, we still have a long road ahead ahead of us.  But then, I recently stumbled upon an organization called Understood.org.

about kids with learning and attention issues. Understood empowers parents

community of parents and more, so their children can go from simply coping to
truly thriving in school and in life.
This hit home with me - finally an online community I could use to help my son, Colton.  I wish I would have found it years ago!  It was at that point I decided 
to give back so that Understood could continue to help others.  I will be donating $1 for every bag sold in this campaign to Understood.org. 
At the end of the campaign, all the money collected for charity, will be given directly to the non-profit organization.

When do I get my PERK?  Many campaigns make you wait months for your perk.  I will send your perk right after the campaign closes and your color choice is confirmed.  Sorry, but for obvious reasons custom perks will take a bit longer.  Those who back the project early in the campaign and indicate color preference and size will get their perk the fastest.

How do I choose a color and size?  The current three color choices and a size chart for the four sizes are pictured.  There are instructions on how to measure your purse.  The most common sizes are Medium or Large.

How do I add multiple PERKS? This can only be done one at a time. Therefore you add the first PERK go through all the steps of logging in and then go back to the campaigns main page select another PERK and check out again. You can do this as many times as necessary. 

How can I upgrade my PERK after I already purchased one? Find the answer here.


   Other Ways You Can Help
I'm doing everything I can to spread the word but I need your help. If you could do something as simple as sharing this page with your Facebook friends or posting a link on Instagram, it can go a long way.  Simply click the Facebook tab at the bottom of the page.  Here is my link for Instagram Wrapurse Instagram.
And please use the Indiegogo share tools!   Thank you so much for your continued support!!All the best, Team Wrapurse

story:
Hello World! My Name is Anthony "Nathaniel" Wilson, I'm 21 years old, and I am the Founder of Ori Huu, The world's First line of Healing Crystal/Mineral Infused Durags. Ori Huu is inspired by the Ifa & Orisa spiritual system of the Yoruba peoples of Nigeria. In this spiritual tradition, the most essential aspect of one's being is their Ori which means head. According to Ifa Priest Solagbade Popoola," In simple Yoruba language, the word "Ori," which has many meanings, means head. It also means the apex of all things, the highest of any endeavor. For instance, the head is the highest and most important in the human body. It houses the brain, which controls the whole body. The leader or boss in an organization is called the "Olori," the head. The head is the topmost part of anything. There is nothing on Earth that does not have its own Ori. The roof is the Ori of a building; the leaves and branches form the Ori of a tree; the lid is the Ori of a container; the cork is the Ori of a bottle; and so on. The moment something has its own Ori, such a thing will assume its own identity. However, the concept of Ori to the Yoruba people goes beyond the ordinary meaning of the head as the apex or container that houses the brain. Ifa states that Ori is the symbol and extension of Olodumare(God) in every being. It is also regarded as "Eledaa," the creator and comprises both dynamic and cosmic forces that determine the uniqueness of every individual. This means in essence that whatever a person becomes in life is attributed to her/his Ori." It is so refreshing to know that Our very own head is the ultimate expression of The Supreme Being within us. Ori, which is your head, is a divinity all by itself. Ori Huu is here to honor the Divinity within You! Now, Huu is an onomatopoeia for big, huge, mighty, and Marvelous! So Ori Huu can be translated as Marvelous head/destiny/ life path/ deity. So, the message of Ori Huu is that you, your life, destiny, and Your Head is Marvelous (stop being Nasty!lol!) 

 

                                   How does this relate to Durags and Why?

African peoples have a long and documented history of wearing headwraps, Crowns, and jewels to adorn the head. Many times these Head accessories signified Social status, sensuality, Marriage, Queenship, Kingship, Ancestry, Protection, and Spiritual well-being. In the African Diaspora, this tradition still lives on, and one of the carriers of this tradition is the Durag. Though the Durag is mainly used for aesthetic purposes, it also is a signature of one's identity, mood, and self-care. Since The Durag goes on one's head(Ori), it is an optimal garment for healing and energetic transformation. Also, Ori Huu is dedicated to providing the most optimal experience for those that wear our Durags. Thus we only use the finest silks so that the basic need for the Durag is still met, while the crystals are for the inner head(Ori Inu). Ori Huu merges outer beauty with inner beauty.

 

                                               Why Healing Crystals/Minerals in Durags?

Healing Crystals are a popular "alternative" healing modality amongst modern-day people. Most of us approach this healing modality through a Western "New Age" lens but fail to realize that Healing Crystals are an ancient healing method. Interestingly, in many ancient African cultures healing crystals were of great use, and many of the most popular healing crystals today can only be found in African countries. In totality, Healing crystals can help you to manage your emotions, ease internal and external tensions, find stability, attract abundance and prosperity, and much more! 

I do want to make it clear that Healing Crystals are not a part of traditional Ifa&Orisa spirituality. But, the Brand is inspired by the philosophy of Ifa, and we will be using chromotherapy to connect to spiritual energies through crystals. But, to honor traditional Isese, we will be creating different Durags using items used in traditional Orisa worship, such as a river rock-infused Durag for Osun, and a silver-infused Durag for Obatala, etc.

 

                                                       What We Need

We need to raise $15,000. $5,000 will be used to produce a professional High-Quality storytelling video where I will promote the fundraiser by sharing more information about the Durags and an ancient sacred story about Ori. $10,000 will be used to cover the cost of Marketing the fundraiser via a Fundraising agency. 

 

                                                           What do You get?

Unfortunately, we cannot offer physical perks at this time. However, Backers who donate $500+ will have the opportunity to join our Pilot Program, where they will be the first to receive a Healing Crystal/ Mineral infused Durag.

 

                                           What If We Do Not Reach Our Goal?

In the Unfortunate Case that we do not reach our goal, funds will be used to produce any part of the fundraiser that we can. Whether it be a short 1-minute video and a limited marketing budget, we still will make it happen.

 

 

                                                                     The Impact

First and Foremost, Ori Huu gives people of all backgrounds the opportunity to connect with the healing wisdom of Ancient African/ Indigenous wisdom without feeling like they have to convert to a new spiritual practice or a spiritual practice at all. Secondly, Ori Huu is what I like to call "Spiritual Ingenuity" because, in practice, it is modern, stylish, and cool. But, in ideation and origin, it uses ancient wisdom to help empower and nourish the lives and minds of everyday people. Lastly, the big picture behind Ori Huu is to control, change, and redefine the narrative around Black people and Headwear. Black people have been labeled as "Ghetto" and "Criminal" for wearing Durags, Headwraps, Bonnetts, Hats, and Hoodies, in public and this label has gotten many Black people murdered and arrested. So, Ori Huu intends to show the world that Durags and Headwear for many African descendants is a representation and affirmation of Beauty, sensuality, Divinity, Protection, and Status.

 

                                            Risks & Challenges

With any new endeavor, there is always a host of Risks and challenges. The Main challenge for Ori Huu is its originality. Because Crystal Infused Durags are new, it will be challenging to get people to connect to the mission and philosophy of the Brand. But, I understand that this hurdle can be overcome through education on this particular modality, which we will offer via monthly workshops, and videos.

 

                                       Other ways you can help.

Please share with your network and please feel free to contribute any ideas and feedback.

story:
Somni is a limited-edition garment ethically manufactured, designed and inspired by young people in Barcelona. Made from the most premium fabrics in the world and mainly focused on fair-trade and suistanability, Candes offers through Somni, a modern garment that represents the classic essence of what society once had, the satisfaction of caring for every detail. 


Its thoughtful and studied cuts allow the garment to be used in any situation. It may be used in an urban or elegant way, with a T-shirt or shirt, with jeans or with dress pants and it includes an interlining that represents the young soul of the brand.

Designed to be your best ally, Somni can be used in the winter, spring and autumn. Its cover is made with a 100% cotton liberty fabric, including an interlining that retains heat, and makes it more durable but also very light.

 

Comfortable in all occasions. At the office or at the park.

Candes stands for handmade craftmanship, premium materials, fair-trade and sustainability. With every new collection, we are aiming on improving our practices to reduce our footprint and maximise our positive impact. We work really hard to deliver the most fine-quality garments in the market and to become your daily partner.

Each of our garments is handmade with the love and care it deserves in a local studio in Barcelona. We firmly believe each garment has to be unique, as it expresses the personality of whoever wears it. 

To this day, fashion follows cyclical trends. Over time, it recovers the essence of our past moments. Somni is a durable garment made to be worn over time, not only by us but by our children and grandchildren.

Candes is present in every step of the way in the creative process, the production and distribution of the garment. We personally take care of designing the piece in pencil, making the pattern, fetching the fabrics and crafting it. It is a long and arduous process, but the result is what pushes us to go further.

Ricard.

Attracted to the power of fashion and how style can give shape to people's attitudes and personalities, to how it can be used to become empowered.

That's how Somni is made.

 

We will personally get in contact with you through email to ask for sizes after the campaign ends. We want to take care of our clients, and we want our products to fit perfectly on you.

story:
Our Story & Our Mission

We are a team of volunteers that started Hope Outfitters back in 2012. 

We have poured everything into this company, not taking a penny of the profit along the way.  Since we started our clothing brand we have given back over $220,000 to the causes we have partnered with.  We started it because Jesus gave up everything to love us and we, in a small way, want to do the same.  So here's how it works: we design and sell apparel and give all of the profits away.  Every year we partner with a new charity, work to create awareness for it and donate 100% of the profits from the sale of our clothing back to its cause.  

It may seem small to buy a T-shirt, but it matters.  Mother Teresa said, "...Do small things with great love."   When all of us work together, our small acts can add up to make a big difference.  From the sale of our T-shirts we have healed the sick, sheltered the homeless, rescued girls out of human trafficking, provided clean water, granted money to adopting families, and so much more...all because of your purchases.  Together we are changing our world for Christ.  Together we are making a difference that will last for all eternity.

Our Campaign (What We Need)

We have exciting news to share--we have decided to open up a new store in downtown Spokane, WA at River Park Square Mall.  We know it's time to take that next big step of faith to expand our mission and message. 

    So here's where you come in!  God's been faithful to grow our company in the last 5 years, debt free!  Because He has used people like you to help us every step of the way.  When you invest in this project it will go toward three things:

    1. Remodeling the existing store (see video for pictures).  This is a huge job: new electrical, drywall, paint, signage, and furniture; cost is $45,000 (We'll try to do as much of the work ourselves to keep the cost down as much as possible.)
    2. Designing, developing and manufacturing our new fall clothing line to include tees, hats, dresses, and pants; cost is $55,000.
    3. All new inventory to fill up the new shop; cost is $60,000.

    Total Investment Needed: $150,000

    Here is a pic of the store that needs remodeling work:

    What You Get

    We are so grateful for anything you can give, but every person who gives over $100 will receive a $40 gift card.  This will allow you to buy any sweatshirt, T-shirt, or hat of your choice.  (The gift card will be sent to your email by March 2019.) To see our clothing click here.

    The Impact

    This new store and new line of clothing is important for 3 reasons:

    • First, we'll be able to sell more gear which means we can give back more money to the causes we partner with.
    • Second, we'll be able to spread the light and love of Jesus through downtown Spokane.
    • Third, this is our first big step of faith and it will be a model for opening stores all over America.

    We completely remodeled an older building for our first shop a few years ago and did most of the work ourselves.  It took an entire summer to finish but since then it has been a source of light and hope in our community.  Here is a picture of our existing store in Richland, WA:

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Maybe you don't have the means to give.  You can also help by sharing this campaign on social media.  Use the tools here and help us get the word out.  Together we can make a difference in the lives of so many around the world!!

Our Campaign (What We Need)
We have exciting news to share--we have decided to open up a new store in downtown Spokane, WA at River Park Square Mall.  We know it's time to take that next big step of faith to expand our mission and message. 

So here's where you come in!  God's been faithful to grow our company in the last 5 years, debt free!  Because He has used people like you to help us every step of the way.  When you invest in this project it will go toward three things:

Remodeling the existing store (see video for pictures).  This is a huge job: new electrical, drywall, paint, signage, and furniture; cost is $45,000 (We'll try to do as much of the work ourselves to keep the cost down as much as possible.)
Designing, developing and manufacturing our new fall clothing line to include tees, hats, dresses, and pants; cost is $55,000.
All new inventory to fill up the new shop; cost is $60,000.

Total Investment Needed: $150,000
Here is a pic of the store that needs remodeling work:


What You Get
We are so grateful for anything you can give, but every person who gives over $100 will receive a $40 gift card.  This will allow you to buy any sweatshirt, T-shirt, or hat of your choice.  (The gift card will be sent to your email by March 2019.) To see our clothing click here.

The Impact
This new store and new line of clothing is important for 3 reasons:

First, we'll be able to sell more gear which means we can give back more money to the causes we partner with.
Second, we'll be able to spread the light and love of Jesus through downtown Spokane.
Third, this is our first big step of faith and it will be a model for opening stores all over America.

We completely remodeled an older building for our first shop a few years ago and did most of the work ourselves.  It took an entire summer to finish but since then it has been a source of light and hope in our community.  Here is a picture of our existing store in Richland, WA:
Other Ways You Can HelpMaybe you don't have the means to give.  You can also help by sharing this campaign on social media.  Use the tools here and help us get the word out.  Together we can make a difference in the lives of so many around the world!!

story:
While visiting India back in 2014, we saw a desperate need for children living in underfunded homes - we knew we needed to do something, we couldn’t not help.

That’s when we dedicated our lives to doing about something about it, we started Tribe of Lambs - a for-purpose jewelry brand that uses 100% of its profits to fund homes for HIV positive children.

Our first goal was to support 1 home of 26 children in Northern India, we've since helped over 500 kids and now fund homes that solely care for HIV positive children.

We partner with Indian NGOs run by good-hearted people to give HIV positive kids a chance.

We fund projects in 4 areas:   

 

Thanks to our customers we've been able to help over 500 children in the last 4 years. But now we need your support to help us grow!

We need money for 4 key steps forward: 

 

JUST ADDED! 

 

Risk & challenges

PRODUCTION

We work closely with our workshop and artisans to ensure production and quality match our high standards. However, as our products are handcrafted in small batches, there is often a risk of delay or quality control. Any minor imperfections are a sign that our products are not mass produced and each piece unique.

 

SIZING

Please double check your ring sizing online (available at www.tribeoflambs.com), as we cannot offer refunds for incorrect sizing for the crowdfunding campaign products.

 

DELIVERY TIMES

We do what we can to deliver perks before the expected delivery dates! Production delays and unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. This is however not our first rodeo and we know our workshop and timelines well.

 

DUTIES AND TAXES 

All prices are including GST, duties/taxes inside Canada. If you live outside of Canada you will be responsible for any applicable duty charges. While we wish we could help get our packages to you faster, we have no control over custom processing times.

story:
Using our expertise and resources in the medical and textile industries, we aim to help flatten the viral curve by initially providing 100,000 face masks to the general public and our frontline workers for protection against the viral infection.  Due to the urgent need for masks, we will be running multiple short campaigns. This will facilitate faster production and distribution timelines and eliminate idle stock. Our first campaign will be targeting $100,000 in 15 days. Your contribution will help us secure a needed shipment of N95/ KN95 Medical masks from an approved supplier as well as buy the raw materials for the fabric face masks. 

  • We should all do our part to flatten the curve by wearing a fabric mask.  We are selling each mask at cost so that the mask is accessible to as many people as possible. 
  • When you purchase your own mask, you will also be donating a medical-grade N95/ KN95/ surgical mask to one of our frontline heroes (Healthcare professionals and Essential workers).  You can recommend a hospital in need in the indiegogo comments section.

 

Due to the severe lack of essential Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) in hospitals and the recent recommendation from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) advising the general public to wear cloths masks in public, a group of our MIT Sloan Executive MBA classmates pooled our expertise and resources in order to help. 

 

The leader of the team, Dr. Ahmed Mady’s family, owns a textile manufacturing factory where they have dedicated two production lines to manufacture face masks at cost and have a production capacity of approximately 50,000 masks per week. They have also secured three suppliers who can provide more than 100,000 N95 and KN95 FDA approved, CDC certified masks for our frontline workers.   

 

 

The N95/ KN95 masks - and the materials they're made from - are in extremely short supply right now. So, it's critical that we reserve them for those who need them most, medical professionals. 

 

For the general public, we designed a stylish face mask that is manufactured from cotton blend/100% cotton fabric with an embedded filter. The mask will be comfortable, washable and reusable for many times. These masks will achieve more than 70% protection efficacy based on published data from University of Cambridge.

 

 

A new scientific rationale has indicated that wearing a fabric facemask creates a barrier that blocks projectile droplets during coughing, which may substantially reduce the production rate R, to an extent that may be comparable to social distancing and washing hands. This would then double the effect of mitigation in “flattening the curve”.

 

The fabric masks will come in different colors and patterns for adults and children.

 

  

 

 

 

Animation: Tyler Russo

Character Design: Goatboy

Graphic Design: Jen Liljegren 

Logo Design: Gregory Bass and Jen Liljegren

Narration: Bill Rogers

 

Danny Muehlschlegel, M.D., MBA (c) Vice Chair of Research, Brigham and Women's Hospital/ Associate Professor of Anesthesia at Harvard Medical School, Boston, MA

Oscar Benavidez, M.D., MBA (c) Chief of Pediatric Cardiology and the Medical Director of the Pediatric Cardiac Surgery and Catheterization program at Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, MA

Mark Clemens, M.D., MBA (c) Associate Professor of Plastic Surgery, University of Texas, MD Anderson Cancer Center Houston, TX

Jagjit Dhaliwal, MBA (c) Deputy Chief Information Officer, County of Los Angeles Los Angeles, CA, United States 

Jay Johnson, JD, MBA (c) An attorney, with over 15 years of government and law firm experience leading investigations, counseling on regulatory compliance, and handling litigation in a first-chair capacity, Dallas, TX

Cleidy Liborio Fernandes, MBA (c) Chief Commercial Officer for the Latin America Region at CMA CGM, Miami, FL

Nhan Tran, MBA (c) Former Director, Operations (GE9X), Albany International/ Albany Engineered Composites Rochester, NH

Jesse Honigberg, MBA (c) SVP, Director of Innovation and Product Development, Cross River Bank Teaneck, NJ 

Marjorie Cass, MBA (c) President, Matterlab Digital, New York, NY

Trevor Barcelo, MBA (c) Marketing Director, Analog Devices, Wilmington, MA 

Manny Sabiiti, MBA (c) Head Trader & Partner, Boston Common Asset Management,Boston, MA 

 

Testing the Efficacy of Homemade Masks: Would They Protect in an Influenza?
Davies, A.; et al. Disaster Medicine and Public Health Preparedness 2013, 7 (4), 413–418. https://doi.org/10.1017/dmp.2013.43

“Persons who always wore masks had a 70% lower risk of being diagnosed with clinical SARS compared with those who never wore masks, and persons with intermittent mask use had a 60% lower risk.” https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/10/2/03-0730_article

Professional and home-made face masks reduce exposure to respiratory infections among the general population. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18612429 “Any type of general mask use is likely to decrease viral exposure and infection risk on a population level.”

Simple Respiratory Mask (2006) https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/12/6/05-1468_article

Influenza Virus Aerosols in Human Exhaled Breath: Particle Size, Culturability, and Effect of Surgical Masks https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3591312/

Modeling the Effectiveness of Respiratory Protective Devices in Reducing Influenza Outbreak https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30229968/

Effectiveness of Masks and Respirators Against Respiratory Infections in Healthcare Workers: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29140516/

 

  • Post a comment to connect us with a hospital in need 
  • Visit our website: Masks2Heroes.com
  • Share our campaign on social media

story:
Lineagewear is one of the leaders in the curvy-fit athletic apparel industry. We believe in vibrant, colorful activewear that is also ethical, sustainable, and inclusive.

Lineagewear's unique fit was developed using concepts learned in Broadway costuming. Features include a flat front, elastic-free, high waistband, and unique seams contoured to hug a woman's curves. Our reviews speak for themselves! 


What We Need & What You Get

Initial goal: 

Our goal covers the production of 11 exclusive new designs (five peacock prints and six other patterns) in a new, high-quality poly-spandex fabric. 

This allows us to offer

  • Consistent sizing
  • Squat-proof back printing
  • Excellent fit and feel
  • A new 5X size!

These prints will be available in headbands (one size), baby sizes (newborn to 5T) kid sizes (4/5- 14/16), and adult sizes (XS-5X) in Capri, Ankle, and Mid Foot lengths. 

What do you get out of this? A TON of perks! Not only will our perks be limited edition, but we've priced nearly everything BELOW our usual prices. We are also shipping all perks over $125 for free!

 

Essentially, this campaign is the same quality Lineagewear that you know and love - except it's new, the designs are exclusive, much of it is on sale, and since it's a pre-order, nothing is out of stock! What's not to love?

HOW TO ORDER: Simply select the perk you're interested in, and check out. You will receive a backers survey shortly after the end of the campaign (after May 8th) where you can indicate size, length, and print preferences. Yes, you can split a perk with a friend and order two different sizes! 

Risks & Challenges

This is a low risk campaign! Lineagewear has been in business for two years now. We've run two successful pre-order sales last year- each raised close to 30k. We have an established supply chain and good working relationship with our printer and our factories. Running this sale as a crowdfunding campaign will help us better organize and manage logistics, as well as help us manage customer expectations.

Fabric printing is estimated to take 4 weeks, and manufacturing is estimated to take 4-8 weeks. Packing and shipping is estimated to take 1-2 weeks. 

Stretch Goals:

$50k: This project plus expanded inventory on other prints (no more waiting for restock!), and an expanded charity program. Each Peacock design will have a designated charity that a portion of proceeds benefits!

$70k: This project plus expanded inventory, expanded charity program, plus development of new products (sizes up to 6x, more maternity, petite, sports bras, shorts, mens leggings and shorts, mat bag, jogger pants, that sort of thing).

$100k: All of the above, plus the relaunch of our wholesale program!


Who We Are

After building costumes on Broadway for a decade, Katie Pippin was fully versed in what it takes to make a stretch garment withstand the rigors of a sweaty performer abusing it on stage for eight shows a week. She started Lineagewear in March 2014 in her living room. Since then, Lineagewear has developed a huge following, and has grown to be one of the leaders of the curvy fit athleticwear industry.

We've been spotted in:



Our philosophy- Ethical, Sustainable, and Inclusive.

Ethical

Our leggings are handmade in New York City's renowned Fashion District. The employees at our shops are paid a living wage, work realistic hours, and are given frequent breaks and holidays. We believe it is vital to build our products in a fair, sustainable way, never using child or slave labor. In order to ensure this, we build our products locally, where we can regularly tour production facilities. 
This occasionally increases production time and cost, but we feel like it's worth it. 

We don't do seasons. We release new prints as we find/produce them. A beautiful, well made garment should be timeless, and we believe our designs are attractive enough to be worn -- and released -- all year round. Just because the calendar changes does not mean the value of our products do. 

More importantly, seasons and micro-seasons are part of fast fashion, and often result in shoddy workmanship, low quality materials, questionable labor practices, and excessive waste. SO not our bag! 


Sustainable

Every step of the process is American made, with an emphasis on a small carbon footprint. Our shops are family owned and operated. Our tags, labels, and packaging are all sourced using American companies. Our mailers are made from 88% recycled materials, and are recyclable. Most of our tops are American Apparel. Our other tops, totes, accessories, and jewelry are created by partnering with independently owned American businesses.

Our leggings are printed on imported fabric using sublimination (heat-transfer) printing. Sublimation Printing is a process in which designs are transferred from pre-printed paper onto fabric by contact heat, of which the dyes are absorbed by the fabric. It is great way to produce high-clarity, well-defined designs. 

Sublimation printing has always been a more sustainable and environmentally-friendly process than dyeing fabrics. Whether it be single- or double-sided printing, sublimation uses less water and less energy to “color” the fabric, without emitting hazardous gases.

Our printing facility is further committed to sustainability in a number of ways:

  • Using water-based inks in our pigment printing operation with no solvents added (which emit harmful VOCs)
  • Operating an in-house waste water treatment system that cleans and filters our water to remove dye particles
  • Recycling our exhausted transfer paper to other markets
  • Collecting our waste fabric to be recycled to other markets


Inclusive

We don't add surcharges to certain sizes.

We don't have separate sections for "straight" and "plus" sizes.

We support the HAES (Health At Every Size) community.

Body shaming is not our bag.

All bodies are gorgeous, and all bodies are to be celebrated for their unique abilities.

We practice radical self-love.

We are adding new sizes on a regular basis, and will continue to do so.

We want every woman, no matter where they are on their fitness journey, to feel OHMazing in Lineagewear. 

Lineagewear doesn't believe in "one size fits all". People are all shapes and sizes, clothing companies skew their size charts differently, and the BMI chart doesn't take into account things like height, fitness, or muscle tone. A hundred years ago, almost every piece of clothing you owned would have been tailor made to your specific measurements. That's the type of fit we strive for with our leggings. We want our garments to fit true to size every time. 

Please, don't ever feel that there is something "weird" or "wrong" with YOUR body just because a garment doesn't fit. YOU are perfect, YOU are beautiful!  


Giving back 

We believe it's our responsibility to give back to our community. To date, we have raised nearly $24,000 for various charities such as Bend to Mend, NEDA, Project Fit America, and the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for checking out our campaign!

story:
THE SHOES: The RD SPRING AND SUMMER SOLSTICE UMD SE (Long Title eh)




Summary

One thing people often wonder about is why Marylanders have so much pride about their flag.  So much so, they have pride about where we are from.   When one of your own does something great, you get behind it 1000%

Well here's something both Marylanders and Maryland Terrapin Fans can get behind.

  • ROCKDEEP INC www.facebook.com/ROCKDEEPINC 
  • This campaign will run through the end of March Madness and shoes will go into production right after.  Delivery time will be approximately 45 to 60 days after.
  • Not only will you be purchasing a pair of Maryland Pride Kicks, you will be doing the following:
    With every purchase, there will be a pair of shoes donated to women's shelters, Kids group homes, homeless shelters and disabled vets.

    We believe in community and giving back.  Unlike many Footwear and apparel companies globally we pledge to give to those who truly need it, not just speak of "a portion of the proceeds going to charity"

    We will tell you exactly whats being done and allow you to assist in letting us know worth while places in need of these donations. 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We are seeking $15,000 in funding to produce both the white and black Maryland Summer Solstice Sneakers.   We will be offering them to you at a severely discounted rate of $50 per shoe.
  • We dare anyone to say our quality isn't as good (and better) as your current footwear company. You also can't say that purchase of anyone else's footwear will result in helping someone in need of a pair as well. 

    These will also come in kids sizes.

The Impact

Your contributions to this campaign will not only garner you a pair of shoes, and assist in others in need getting kicks, but it will enable our company to grow and compete; which will in turn create a company which offers you quality footwear and apparel at great prices...

  • Many homegrown companies grow and get big for their britches, and you realize you are paying the same prices for other brands. 
  • Our intent is to create a market place where you see quality products at far more affordable prices, causing others in the industry to lower their prices.
  • Of course this makes our competition tighter, but we also know this will build brand loyalty with our consumers because it was us who started the trend.

    Others charge more because they can.  It's time to present you another option!

Risks & Challenges

Some of the risks for this is like any other crowd fund.  Volume.  Making sure we get everyone exactly the sizes they ordered and the actual products they order.

  • Our advantage is we've already had several crowdfund projects and have created a lessons learned, so that all others have and will continue to run smoothly.
  • With your word of mouth, and our pledge to give you what you want and need, our company grows and volume is not a problem but a gift.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute you can do many things to help.

  • You can share the link for this crowd fund with your network and ask them to share it as well. 

    Lastly... we have several other community initiatives going right now, and they include themed shoes for: 
    Domestic Violence
    Ovarian Cancer
    Breast Cancer
    Autism.
    Disabled Vets

Found here:  https://www.facebook.com/groups/DEEPHEARTSWORLD...

Many speak of awareness, but we are all aware these are things that affect our loved ones and our pledge is to donate $2 million dollars if we reach 1 million donations of each themed shoe.

We will not donate to awareness organizations who just raise money to raise money for events... but to those who support those needing resources.  We will donate shoes to women's shelters, kids group homes, disabled vets, and the homeless. 

As well as money. As yourself.  Is your favorite brand doing this?

Thanks in advance for your support and we look forward to getting everyone their kicks.  

For more ROCKDEEP concepts and items check out: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/ALPHAKICKSTARTER/

story:
Sustainable.  Lovable.  Woolloomooloo Shoe.

The finest Australian merino wool, spun into a superfine yarn and knitted seamlessly into beautiful footwear.  Ready for you to enjoy for years to come.

 

Who are we?

Our names are James & Paul and we are mates, both born in Australia.  James now lives in CT and Paul is in Sydney.  We've been in the footwear industry for over 40 years combined and know how to build a truly comfortable shoe.  This time we are doing it with sustainability as our key driver.

Woolloomooloo Shoe was founded in Sydney at the end of 2019, with the hope that we could do our part by making a more sustainable product that people love!  Australian Merino wool is one of the most sought after raw materials for manufacturing and we have figured out a way to digitally knit this beautiful product into lightweight, breathable, washable, sustainable shoes. 

And we support Aussie Wool growers & the environment!

In October of last year, we recruited 50 independent retailers across the country to help us test our product and message to local consumers.  The response was amazing and we know we have not only a winning idea, but a product that people love.  Our shoes are the perfect combination of athletic and casual; making them perfect for today's "in and out of the house" lifestyle.

We are now looking for supporters to help us get our sustainable product to more people across the country.  Your contribution will enable us to invest in production and support our efforts to bring more sustainable shoes to consumers.  

 

Meet Shelly Lamb, Our Comms. Director to hear more.

 

 

 

Key Product Features

 

Our Goal

We need to raise $8,000 to get our new shoes into production!

  • We are offering over 25% off and early access to our new styles!
  • If we are unable to get this style in to production at the promised time, we will return any contributions.

 

Your Contribution

We have to buy minimums of our new styles to pay for the tooling required to get in to production.  Your contribution will help here, as well as:

  • Every pair of woolen shoes sold in the US will help reduce the amount of leather product coming in to this country. 
  • Leather is often described as a bi-product of the meat industry.  This is often the case, however, it also increases the productivity of slaughtering cattle, as leather equates to about 10% of the profitability coming from each kill.
  • On top of this, the tanning of leather uses chromium that is displaced in to the eco-system destroying the water supply in many parts of the world.
  • Let's stop these carcinogenic wastes, protect the waterways and GO WOOL! 

 

Can't buy a pair?  Please share!!

Please help us get the message out and share our videos to let the world know that we are on a mission to build the best quality Merino wool footwear.

  • There are share tools within the IndieGogo platform to make this super easy!  We really appreciate the support!

 

What Size am I?
