What Size am I?

story:
An iconic looking, solidly made, modern tool watch for divers that references the design cues of the timeless  1950's Submariners that started it all.

Manufactured with high spec materials while reflecting a vintage look and feel.

Importantly, at a sensible and accessible price point.

 

 

 

 

 

 

                             

                                                      www.protos.watch

 

** PROTOS watches started an initial production run on 1st September 2016! **

Please check our Campaign Updates for progress.

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONCEPT

 

I'm building an iconic looking, solidly made, modern tool watch, that references the design cues of the classics that started it all. Importantly, I'm doing this at a sensible and accessible price point. 

True vintage dive watches are awesome. Nothing can come close to the look and feel of a classic. Unfortunately they are also awesomely rare, extremely expensive, and lack the reliability and modern manufacturing standards of their younger siblings. Modern dive watches have largely sacrificed the elegant design cues and tool aesthetic of their forebears in order to stay 'fresh' and appeal to more modern tastes. 

I think they're wrong, and I'm producing a modern, well built automatic dive watch that looks the way it should. A perfectly sized 40mm case, rated water-resistant to 300m that you can actually use for diving, be it the stormy North Sea off the coast of Scotland, the sunny Maldives, or indeed your desk at work! A dive watch with a movement that you can set and forget and don't need to worry about. A grail watch we can all afford.

 

 

INTRODUCTION

My name is Nick, and I'm the founder of PROTOS; the realization of my obsession with creating the perfect automatic dive watch. 

 

I am originally from Scotland, and I've been an avid watch collector (read: geek) for years.  During a decade living and working in Asia I added scuba diving to my list of hobbies. 

I moved to Dubai in 2014 in order to further my training and experience in diving, while working in my day job in international trade. 

PROTOS has been my passion project for the past 3 years, where through my contacts on 3 continents I have been planning, researching, sketching, perfecting, and now finally producing, the PROTOS automatic dive watch.

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • CASE SIZE: 40mm Diameter, 15.4mm Height (including case back and crystal), 20mm Lug Width, 47mm Lug-to-Lug
  • CASE MATERIAL: 316L Marine Grade Stainless Steel, Matte Brushed with Polished Sides, Solid Steel Case Back
  • DIAL: Matte Black, Applied Maxi Hour Markers, Yellow Metal Surrounds, Hand Applied Lume
  • HANDS: Maxi Mercedes Hands, Yellow Metal Surrounds, Hand Applied Lume
  • CRYSTAL: Domed Sapphire, AR Coating on Inside
  • CROWN: 8mm Big Crown with Embossed Logo
  • BEZEL: Black Gloss Ceramic with Red Triangle and Lume Pip at 12, Indented White Indices, Uni-Directional.
  • LUME: Swiss C3 SuperLuminova on Hands and Hour Markings and Bezel Pip
  • WATER RESISTANCE: Tested to 1000 ft / 300 Meters / 30 Atmospheres 
  • MOVEMENT: NH35a Japanese Movement by Seiko
  • BRACELET: 316L Stainless Steel Oyster Style (20mm tapered to 16mm), Matte Brushed Finish, Polished Solid End Links, Double Locking Safety Clasp with Debossed Logo

 

 
AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT – SEIKO CALIBRE NH35A

At the heart of PROTOS is the Seiko manufactured NH35A Automatic Movement. Thoroughly tested and proven as extremely reliable, the NH35A has 24 jewels, beats at 21,600 bph and has 41 hours power reserve. The most up to date of the 3 most widely used micro brand movements (the others being the Swiss ETA 2824 and Miyota 9015 movements), the NH35a is from the family of robust, reliable  movements made famous by Seiko over decades. Unlike the in-house movements of many Swiss 'luxury' manufacturers, the Japanese NH35A will demand little (if any), maintenance for the lifetime of your watch, ensuring years of accurate, reliable service.

 

CERAMIC BEZEL

In recent years many luxury watch brands have made the shift from aluminium to ceramic bezels. Engineered ceramic, as used in watch making, has the benefit of being lightweight yet extremely hard, and does not age like other materials when exposed to salt water. Four times harder than stainless steel, ceramic bezels will not scratch or fade, preserving the pristine look of PROTOS for years to come and placing PROTOS in the same class as many high end luxury divers.

 

DOMED SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL with Anti-Reflective Coating

​Paying homage to the original Milsub divers of the 1950’s and 60’s, PROTOS has a domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating on the inside. This is functional as well as aesthetic, providing less reflection and improved readability under water. Domed crystals were traditionally used to withstand high pressures at depth.

 

 

 

316L MARINE GRADE STAINLESS STEEL CASE AND BRACELET

The preferred steel for use in harsh marine environments and widely used in diving (and surgical), equipment due to its properties, 316L stainless steel is the industry standard for extreme corrosion resistance, and is essentially unaffected by seawater. Both the case and bracelet have a brushed matte finish, with polished case sides and end links, for a stunning contrast on the wrist.

 

 

 

C3 SUPERLUMINOVA

Manufactured in Switzerland, the SuperLuminova brand supplies lume to many of the world’s leading watch brands. C3 is their strongest grade, ensuring a bright and even glow. PROTOS uses C3 SuperLuminova mixed with a specific Pantone colour formula which gives it a vintage patina appearance in natural light, without comprising on the powerful and lasting green luminescence for functionality.

 

 

 

 

8MM BIG CROWN

Another design tribute to both the form and function of original dive watches of the 1950’s, the Big Crown is both easy to adjust (even on the wrist) and nostalgic in its appeal. Nearly all modern dive watches feature crown guards. PROTOS does not, and like the vintage watches on which it is based, looks way cooler as a result.

 

PROJECT TIMELINE 2016

                       

With your backing and support, my goal is to raise the initial funding within the 45 day campaign limit. If funding is successful by the end of August, manufacturing will start almost immediately in early September. It will take 3 months to produce and quality test all the watches. Your finished PROTOS watch is thus expected to ship in early December. I will of course provide regular updates to this timeframe and communicate regularly with progress reports. If you have your own questions you can contact me personally on email (nick@protos.watch).

 

DIRECT TO CONSUMER MODEL

 

                                         

Its 2016. We are all well aware that we can achieve a much lower retail price point on high quality watches by adopting a direct to consumer model. With no large overheads for bricks & mortar retail space, no sub-distributor mark ups, no huge marketing budgets and other traditional costs, your PROTOS watch ships directly from us to your door at the best possible price point.
 

    BACKGROUND

    My mantra throughout this process has been:

    “Create a watch I would be excited to own. Make the quality the very best it can be, and keep it affordable.” 

    This project started several years ago as a day-dream, pouring over online watch forums and researching the history of mechanical dive watches, from the first water-resistant Rolex Submariner’s of the 1950’s and Blancpains' early divers, through to Doxa and Seiko’s legendary tool watches of the 60’s, 70’s and 80’s. 

    It became apparent that I was not alone in my appreciation, desire and enthusiasm for these watches. The perfect balance of form and function, automatic dive watches are made to be worn, used and enjoyed and hold timeless design appeal. I also discovered the cost to obtain an original vintage dive watch was often out of reach for most watch lovers. That’s when I decided I would make my own: conceiving what would be the ideal dive watch. I meticulously designed and perfected PROTOS through multiple prototypes and rigorous testing over the last 24 months.

    With more than fifteen years of international business experience, I have the skills needed to successfully bring PROTOS to market. My background in international trade, sales management, forecasting, project management, and marketing and design, combined with my absolute passion and dedication to the project will help make PROTOS a success. Most importantly, I am passionate about watches, and appreciate the attention to detail and high quality demanded by others who share my passion.

     

    NEXT STEPS

    With the final prototype complete and having passed all performance requirements and design specifications, right now, PROTOS needs your help raising the funds to begin the first round of manufacturing. The funds raised by this campaign will be used to purchase raw materials for the cases and bracelets, crystals, watch parts and the watch movements, and finally begin manufacturing the first full production run of watches and meet minimum quantity requirements. Any additional funds will be used to produce more watches.

    PROTOS is partnered with proven, reliable manufacturers experienced in watchmaking in China, Hong Kong and Japan. Each was selected following 3 years of research and tough trial and error periods, only becoming a partner after meeting strict prototype criteria and quality control. They all operate under strict internationally accepted QA guidelines as they primarily export to EU and US markets. This is reflected in the 12 months warranty PROTOS provides with every watch.

     

     

    PLEDGE YOUR SUPPORT

    Those of us who appreciate the detail, nostalgia and satisfaction of an automatic watch will understand why this project means so much to me, and why I am determined to make the best watch possible, for all of us to enjoy.

    You can pledge your support for PROTOS by being one of the first to own this truly special watch. Take advantage of the great savings available through this campaign. The first backers will receive a massive 100 USD off the price of a brand new PROTOS Dive Watch, and this includes international shipping.

    As a founding backer, your support is truly amazing and sincerely appreciated, and when you get your hands on the watch I promise you will feel something special!                   

     

     

     

     

     

    You can read the full story behind PROTOS now on:

     

                                           

     

    www.ablogtowatch.com

With the final prototype complete and having passed all performance requirements and design specifications, right now, PROTOS needs your help raising the funds to begin the first round of manufacturing. The funds raised by this campaign will be used to purchase raw materials for the cases and bracelets, crystals, watch parts and the watch movements, and finally begin manufacturing the first full production run of watches and meet minimum quantity requirements. Any additional funds will be used to produce more watches.
PROTOS is partnered with proven, reliable manufacturers experienced in watchmaking in China, Hong Kong and Japan. Each was selected following 3 years of research and tough trial and error periods, only becoming a partner after meeting strict prototype criteria and quality control. They all operate under strict internationally accepted QA guidelines as they primarily export to EU and US markets. This is reflected in the 12 months warranty PROTOS provides with every watch.
 
 
PLEDGE YOUR SUPPORT
Those of us who appreciate the detail, nostalgia and satisfaction of an automatic watch will understand why this project means so much to me, and why I am determined to make the best watch possible, for all of us to enjoy.
You can pledge your support for PROTOS by being one of the first to own this truly special watch. Take advantage of the great savings available through this campaign. The first backers will receive a massive 100 USD off the price of a brand new PROTOS Dive Watch, and this includes international shipping.
As a founding backer, your support is truly amazing and sincerely appreciated, and when you get your hands on the watch I promise you will feel something special!                   
 
 
 
  
You can read the full story behind PROTOS now on:
 

                                       

 
www.ablogtowatch.com

story:
Thirty One Degrees mission is designing and producing high-quality products at a fair price.

We ask for your support to launch our latest creation. 

Our luxury essential sneakers: The Everyday Collection.

 

An elegant and timeless product, crafted with the best materials, still keeping consciousness and fairness during production.  

 

From us directly to you

Our business model enables us, to offer products for one-third of their market value.

For him. For her. For every day. 

 

The everyday collection -

High top / Grey on White 

36-46

 

The everyday collection -

High Top / Natural on Natural 

36-46

 

The everyday collection -

Low Top / Grey on white 

36-46

 

The everyday collection -

Low Top / Natural on Natural

36-46

 

 

Our commitment to sustainability.

Today fashion is commonly associated to mass production, mass consumption and mass waste. 

At Thirty One Degrees we believe in quality, durability and artisanal production. 

We believe in products made to last. 

 

 

A sustainable project 

We brought to our project the 3 pillars of sustainability: social, economic and environmental, informally known as people, profit and planet. 

 

PEOPLE – People are our number one asset. Working environment and all the conditions at the workplace, like wages, job hours, health and safety are fundamental principles we request to our suppliers. 

We are very proud to work closely with a factory producing shoes in Portugal for more than 75 years which have the highest regard for fair working conditions. 

 

PROFIT - We are perfectly aware that it’s not possible to be loyal to our principles if we work solely for profit. We are committed to maintaining our business on a small scale to respect these principles. 

 

PLANET – We believe that higher quality means more durability and less consuming. 

Less consumption, would control the massive production and at the end , would lead us to a better planet. 

 

Higher quality = more durability = less consuming = Better planet.

 

 

 

Product

 

We put together the best materials from European suppliers. 

We work for durability, comfort, and human-constructed.

 

Product Information:

 

1- The outsoles. 

Our soles made of 100% natural virgin hevea milk, are the most natural soles in the market.

The virgin milk of the Hevea Brasiliensis (rubber tree) is refined to produce a unique sole, full of tiny air bubbles offering outstanding levels of comfort, elasticity, and lightness.

This process is entirely natural, helping to preserve the planet and creating a sustainable product. 

 

 

2- Leather.

We use the best vegetable tan leathers produced in Portugal and Spain.

All our leather is chromium-free.

Vegetable tan leather benefits compared to chromium tanned leather.

 

Vegetable leather:

+ Natural

+ Sustainable

+ Durable

+ Breathability 

 

 

3- The inner sole. 

Our inner sole has a  leather base  for  better breathability  and  a foam support  for a maximum  air circulation,  giving the feet  an outstanding  comfort.

 

 

4- Production.

We work exclusively with a factory with over 70 years of experience in producing handmade shoes for top quality brands around the world. 

Under fair conditions we use an artisan method to produce our sneakers.

 

 

 

Our special crowdfunding offer 

 

From us directly to you

Products for one-third of their market value.

 

Market value: €390 - €420

Our retail price: €225

Our Crowdfunding promotion: €129

 

 

 

 

 

 

The key factors that allow us to bring such a high-quality product at affordable prices are: 

 

Exclusive sales online

It allows us to deliver the product directly from our factory to you. 

 

Proximity

Our headquarters are just 10 km away from the factory, which enables us direct control over the production avoiding the cost of a 3rd party.

It allows a faster and cheaper process in terms of design, prototype creation and production control.

 

Marketing and content

Members of our team have previously worked in the advertising and content industry. This allows us to significantly reduce costs, as all content, marketing and advertising is “in house”.

 

Crowdfunding

Crowdfunding will enable us to produce only the necessary avoiding overstock waste and keep supporting our commitment to sustainability.

 

 

 

About us

 

We are a Portuguese brand, designing exclusive goods that honour the craft and lifestyle of our region.

Born in a small fishing village, near Porto in Portugal, we have a slow living approach, and it´s our goal to create a community, who prefers quality and exclusivity in opposition to waste and massification.

All our products are consciously handmade using craftsmanship and artisan methods under fair conditions for the workers. 

Joao Nuno Valente founded the company in 2018 from a need to find exclusive, high quality, durable products at affordable prices and his brother, Antonio,  joined at the end of 2019 to bring a new approach to the business. 

 

 

Why Crowdfunding? 

 

- Crowdfunding will support our growth. 

After 2 years in the sneakers business we strongly believe this is the right time to take a step further on our business growth. 

- Crowdfunding will give us the opportunity to improve our quality standards and develop new design projects. 

- Crowdfunding will help us to maintain competitive prices despite the increase on the production costs 

- Crowdfunding will enable us to produce what is absolutely necessary, avoiding overstock waste. 

- Crowdfunding will d support what is our commitment to sustainability.

 

Size Table 

 

Our models fit one size small than the usually sneakers.

At the end of the campaign we will help you find the perfect size for you, however you can start looking at which fit you better.

 

- Put a sheet of paper on the floor. The ends should touch the wall.

- Now, put your biggest foot on the piece of paper and make sure the heel is against the wall.

- Mark the longest part of your foot.

- Use a ruler to measure the distance between the marks on the paper.

- Check the table and find your perfect size.

 

Example: If your measurement is 27.5 cm, your size is 42.

 

 

FREE SHIPPING - To EU 28 Countries:

28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

Since we are located in Porto (Portugal), we can offer duty free shipping to all EU countries. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 28 countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc.

 

Can I return my 31ºc sneakers and get a refund? 

Yes. Our return policy allows you to send back unused products within 14 days from the date of reception 

 

Return and refund policy 

Refund will be made after goods’ reception at the warehouse. 

We will not accept returns showing visible signs of wear. 

The shoes must be returned in their original condition and original box. 

We guarantee the refund of the pledge. We don’t refund the shipping costs incurred with the return of the goods. 

We are not responsible for the payment of any additional duty or taxes occurred with the return of the goods.

 

Risks and challenges 

It’s our first crowdfunding, despite being in the sneakers industry for the last 2 years. 

We work closely with established and experienced manufacturers delivering great quality products in a short time frame. 

We guarantee transparency to our backers keeping information updated during and/or after our campaign. 

We anticipated potentially risky situations in our delivery plan and ensured a solution.

 

Thanks in advance, 

Thirty One Degrees team

story:
Fitness is our way of life

We want to inspire and motivate people to workout and feel joy and satisfaction to the body and mind.

Our vision is to create a new global lifestyle fitness brand. Good things take time. That is why we have put a lot of blood, sweat and tears into the making of the FitnessJunkie clothing for active and dedicated people.

Check out the FitnessJunkie sportswear in our video below

Our core values

For us, fitness is more than a hobby, it’s a way of life. It gives you exercise, builds a strong body, fuels your mind and releases those valued endorphins.

FitnessJunkie wants to inspire, motivate and bring out the best in you. Supercharge your thoughts, visualize the person you want to be, and work at it.

What we need & what you get

We’ve got our prototypes ready and with the support from you, our early backers, we're about to go into production and share it with the world.

Support our journey with 5€ - in return you get a supercharged thank you from everyone at FitnessJunkie.

We promise that we will continue improving and refining the overall designs. You can expect even greater, cutting edge designs and quality fabrics.

Let's get started

Join Team FitnessJunkie and order your new, cool fitness wear at a 60% campaign discount. Secure your perk now and get a 30% discount for the rest of 2017 on our website www.fitnessjunkie.dk

Supercharged Water Bottle 2,5 L - €8

Supercharged Tank Top - €14

Fitness Raw T-Shirt - €19

Cross Soldier T-Shirt - €19

Crossfit / Combat / Swim Shorts - €21

Supercharged Gym Shorts - €21



Harley Gym shorts - €21

Supercharged Gym T-shirt - €21

Fitness Raw Tights - €24

Supercharged Gym Pants - €32

Rashguard Gold Standard - €27

Original Junkie Sweat - €37

Harley Hoodie - €37

Fitness Attitude Hoodie - €39 

You're in safe hands with us

FitnessJunkie is brought to you from the little kingdom of Denmark by Ivan and Camilla Sprehn.

We desire to improve health, and the way we think about it. In all matters of life, we live by the golden rule: Stay fit – stay active - stay informed and stay happy.

Help us spread some love

If you can't contribute to our much loved brand, please share the love otherwise:

  • Help us raise some noise about our brand new lifestyle brand, word-of-mouth-style :-)
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tool, to share our campaign on your favorite social media channel!


 

Now, go get that hoodie!

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Got any questions that isn't answered here? Please e-mail us at support@fitnessjunkie.dk. 

Q: What is your exchange policy?

A: We want you to love your FitnessJunkie gear as much as we love making it! If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we gladly accept exchanges on orders shipped within the EU* within 90 days of purchase. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and still have tags attached. 
Exchanges are not guaranteed because our stock is limited. To exchange an item, please request your return label here.
* Please note that all international sales are final, i.e., we can not accept exchanges.

Q: Can I cancel my order?
A: If you need to cancel your order, we will try our best to get it cancelled before it's packaged and shipped. Please e-mail us at support@fitnessjunkie.dk ASAP if you need to cancel your order, and we will let you know if we're able to cancel it. No guarantee, but we'll try. Remember our business hours are Monday-Friday 9a.m.-5p.m. MST. 

Q: Can I change my order?

A: We process orders pretty darn quickly, which is both a blessing and a curse! So unfortunately once you place your order, we cannot make any changes.

Q: Which payment methods do you accept?

A: We accept all major credit cards.

Q: When can I expect my order?

A: We will ship the items ultimo September 2017, when all products are on stock.

Q: Can I sell Fitnessjunkie products through my retail store?

For retail inquiries, please e-mail support@fitnessjunkie.dk 

Q: What is your warranty policy?

A: All our products are Guaranteed For Good. If your product does not hold up, we'll work with you to resolve the issue, whether that means returning the item for repair, replacing or exchanging it, or refunding your purchase. 
Damages not covered by the warranty:
-Normal wear, tear, and fading (keep in mind, any t-shirt will fade or pill over time)
-User error (i.e. cheese grating your pack on rough desert sandstone)
-Animal damage (don't let your dog chew on your pack!)
-Ink, pencil, spills, or other types of cosmetic damage
-Loss or theft

Q: How can I change my shipping address?

A: Unfortunately, after an order is placed, the shipping address cannot be changed. 
If you've entered an incorrect address, please contact us and we will do our best to see if it can be adjusted. Even if you reach out immediately after placing the order, there is no guarantee that it can be changed, BUT we will try!! 

Q: Do you ship internationally?

A: Yes we do! Just note that there may be some taxes and customs charges. Good news is that you will most definitely be able to get your awesome stuff, no matter where you live. Please note that all international sales are final, i.e., we can not accept returns or exchanges.

Q: Can I pick up my order instead of having it shipped to me?

A: So you want to stop by our offices and say hi, huh? We’d love that! However, currently we do not have a pick-up system for online orders. If you’d like to pick up your order, come to our Showroom and purchase the product face-to-face! :) when it's in stock Mid-September.

story:
It’s a security button, that allows you to send an alert to your family, friends or emergency services, when you are in danger or have an emergency.

When you press the button, HelpyHero immediately connects through bluetooth to your Smartphone and then it alerts your family, friends or security services, according to your App configuration, also you can record video and audio storing them in the cloud. This device opens a discrete communication line between the user and the person who receives the alert.

 

 

 

Helpyhero is a very versatile personal security system. The security button comes in 5 different holders, these allow to carry it in different ways, adapting to every style.

  • Clip: you can use it on purses, clothes, backpacks, belts, etc.
  • Bracelet: It’s stylish and you can reach it easily.
  • Keychain: You will never forget and it’s very discreet.
  • Necklace: always reachable, ideal for the elderly,.
  • Sticky platform: You can put it under the counter, ideal for shops.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Alert mode:

Press the button for 3 seconds, and it sends an alert to your emergency contacts, besides opening a communication channel and recording audio and video buffers.

Recording mode:

Press the button 3 times and just record audio and video. This is like a spy camera where you can register situations of harassment, bullying, etc, when it is not necessary to alert but it is to record what is happening.

HelpyHero is 100% customizable.

  • You can choose the kind of alert you want to send (alert through the app, phone call or text message).
  • Several people can be alerted, all together or one by one, until the alert is answered.
  • It can be configured to open a total or partial communication line with audio and video. The user can transmit what is happening and receives instructions as well.
  • Set just for record audio and video.
  • Set to send an alert to security services like 911 or medical assistance.

  • Bluetooth module to connect with the Smartphone.
  • An 8 mega pixels camera for streaming video to the cloud.
  • Microphone and speaker to allow communication and audio registering.
  • Long duration Lithium battery, lasts for 600 hours.
  • One-body design with resistant material made of anodized aluminum.

 

 

 

 

 

Who receives the alerts?

Per your configuration, could be friends, family, security services and medical services. You can alert up to 30 different people, following a priority order.

What kinds of alerts does it send?

 To alert someone you can set up to 4 kinds of alerts, that can be combined:

  • Visual and sound alert waking up a smartphone of a relative through the App. In addition, you can track the location on real time, listening and talking with the distressed, and access to the recording.
  • Alert Call, proceeds to a phone call to an emergency contact.
  • Text message, Text someone with coordinates and pre-established templates.
  • Email, send an email with coordinates and pre-established text.

How many people can respond to my alerts?

Per your configuration, it can stop sending alerts after the first successful communication or keep sending alerts to a certain number.

What is in the pack?

  • 1 HelpyHero button.
  • 5 Holders (1 bracelet, 1 clip, 1 keychain, 1 necklace and 1 sticky platform).
  •  1 Induction charger.
  •  1 User manual.

How do I set up my HelpyHero?

First download the App on the smartphone then turn on the bluetooth, make sure the button is fully charged and press it five seconds in order to pair it with your smartphone.

What are its functionalities?

It has 2 kinds of use:

Alert Mode: Press the button for 3 seconds and the alert is sent, the location in the map is tracked also the audio and video are activated and stored in the cloud.

Recording Mode: 3 clicks on the button activates the recording of the audio and video storing it in the cloud, but no alerts are sent.

Can I cancel an alert sent by error?

Yes, by pressing the button 5 times and enter you security password on the App in order to fully cancel the alerts. If you type your secondary password it will means that someone made you cancel the alert therefore the App will start sending secret alerts. 

What HelpyHero is made of?

Anodized aluminum, manufactured in one piece, and premium hardware components.

How long does the battery last?

25 days in sleeping mode and 2 days of recording mode.

What are the smartphone requirements?

iOS 7+ and Android 4+ and we could port the App to other operating systems depending of the campaign success.

What my HelpyHero records? Where it is stored? How can I access it?

The video and audio recordings is store in the cloud, you can see on streaming on real time o downloading later using the App.

How do I link my HelpyHero to the App?

Turn on the bluetooth, make sure the button is fully charged and press it five seconds in order to pair it with your smartphone.

Does it have a monthly fee?

No, HelpyHero doesn’t have a monthly fee, the download of the App and the access to the cloud are also free. The use of this service has 3 years of warranty.

What warranty does HelpyHero have?

HelpyHero has a 3 years warranty.

What is the selling Price?

The price on retail will be 129 dolars, but for release and for the first indiegogo contributors the price for one HelpyHero will be 89 dolars.

Also for indiegogo contributors that buy several packages of HelpyHero for all the family or product dealers the price is even better!

What will you do with the money raised from crowdfunding ?

We will enter a phase of mass production, initiating deliveries on July 2017.

 

We believe that HelpyHero is the first step of our company in creating intelligent devices that help people overcome difficult times, even helping them to save their lives.

We have designed HelpyHero for the purpose of creating an emergency button that can be used in multiple situations. We also thought it had to be small, discrete, maintaining a stylized design. We should be able to carry it in different ways adapting to the style and necessity of each user.

With our Indiegogo campaing, we want to raise the founds we need to take our device to a phase of mass production, initiating the first deliveries to indiegogo contributors on July 2017.  

We truly need your help to make our dream come true, along the way we will make this world a little bit safer.

Your help is important to us, if you are not persuadedto buy our product you can still share our campaing, this way you are not only helping us but also helping other people who might need the HelpyHero to get away from many dangerous situations that could be lethal. The world is a beautiful place, help us make it safer.

Thanks you so much for helping us.
story_txt:
It’s a security button, that allows you to send an alert to your family, friends or emergency services, when you are in danger or have an emergency.When you press the button, HelpyHero immediately connects through bluetooth to your Smartphone and then it alerts your family, friends or security services, according to your App configuration, also you can record video and audio storing them in the cloud. This device opens a discrete communication line between the user and the person who receives the alert.   Helpyhero is a very versatile personal security system. The security button comes in 5 different holders, these allow to carry it in different ways, adapting to every style.
Clip: you can use it on purses, clothes, backpacks, belts, etc.
Bracelet: It’s stylish and you can reach it easily.
Keychain: You will never forget and it’s very discreet.
Necklace: always reachable, ideal for the elderly,.
Sticky platform: You can put it under the counter, ideal for shops.
       Alert mode:Press the button for 3 seconds, and it sends an alert to your emergency contacts, besides opening a communication channel and recording audio and video buffers.Recording mode:Press the button 3 times and just record audio and video. This is like a spy camera where you can register situations of harassment, bullying, etc, when it is not necessary to alert but it is to record what is happening.HelpyHero is 100% customizable.
You can choose the kind of alert you want to send (alert through the app, phone call or text message).
Several people can be alerted, all together or one by one, until the alert is answered.
It can be configured to open a total or partial communication line with audio and video. The user can transmit what is happening and receives instructions as well.
Set just for record audio and video.
Set to send an alert to security services like 911 or medical assistance.

Bluetooth module to connect with the Smartphone.
An 8 mega pixels camera for streaming video to the cloud.
Microphone and speaker to allow communication and audio registering.
Long duration Lithium battery, lasts for 600 hours.
One-body design with resistant material made of anodized aluminum.
     Who receives the alerts?Per your configuration, could be friends, family, security services and medical services. You can alert up to 30 different people, following a priority order.What kinds of alerts does it send? To alert someone you can set up to 4 kinds of alerts, that can be combined:
Visual and sound alert waking up a smartphone of a relative through the App. In addition, you can track the location on real time, listening and talking with the distressed, and access to the recording.
Alert Call, proceeds to a phone call to an emergency contact.
Text message, Text someone with coordinates and pre-established templates.
Email, send an email with coordinates and pre-established text.
How many people can respond to my alerts?Per your configuration, it can stop sending alerts after the first successful communication or keep sending alerts to a certain number.What is in the pack?
1 HelpyHero button.
5 Holders (1 bracelet, 1 clip, 1 keychain, 1 necklace and 1 sticky platform).
 1 Induction charger.
 1 User manual.

story:
About Tatewari

It began a year ago when I supported the natives of nayarit, in the civil association (pro-defense of the rights of indigenous peoples) which helps all indigenous people, there I met the Huichol and Choras. I learned a lot about their culture, traditions, ceremonies and how they live. I want to create work facilities, to develop their work and take it to the whole world and produce modern designs. At the moment we only have few modern designs, because we do not have the licenses. I hope that in the course of the collection  more youtubers, Streamers, companies will join us.

Thanks Trick2g for supporting us.

Sobre Tatewari

Comenzó hace un año cuando apoyaba a los indigenas en el estado de nayarit,  En la asociación civil (pro defensa de los derechos de los pueblos indigenas) el cual ayuda a todos indigenas, ahí conocí a los huicholes y coras. Aprendi mucho sobre su cultura, tradiciones, ceremonias y como viven. Quiero crear instalaciones de trabajo, para desarrollar su trabajo y llevarlo a todo el mundo, ademas de producir diseños modernos. Por el momento solo contamos con pocos diseños modernos, por no tenemos las licencias. Espero que en el transcurso de la recaudación se unan mas youtubers, Streamers, compañías.

Gracias Trick2g por apoyarnos.

With your contribution we will invest in

  • Raw material to create the products
  • Rent a place to store / produce
  • Make new designs

Con tu contribución invertiremos en 

  • Materia prima para crear los productos
  • Rentar un lugar para almacenar/producir
  • Hacer nuevos diseños

Goal that I would like to reach

  • I would like to buy a place for production and not have so many problems with remote communities, it would take about 50k.
  • Finding new communities and items, would take about 10k.

Meta que me gustaría alcanzar 

  • Quisiera comprar un establecimiento para la producción  y no tener tantos problemas con las comunidades alejadas, se necesitarían aproximadamente 50k
  • Buscar nuevas comunidades y articulos se necesitarían aproximadamente 10k

The impact

If this project were to happen

  • Communities would have well-paid jobs
  • Natives would not need to go to cities to work

  • With our modern designs you will support Streamer and youtubers with our partner program

El impacto

Si este proyecto llegara a suceder 

  • Las comunidades tendrían trabajos bien remunerados
  • Los indigenas no necesitarían ir a las ciudades para trabajar
  • Con nuestros diseños modernos apoyaras a los Streamer y youtubers con nuestro programa partner

Goals

  • At 15k. Bracelet production line
  • At 25k. Bags, necklaces, rings, earrings production lines
  • At 35k. Belts, clothes, backpacks production lines
  • At 50k. Experimental line sculptures, neckties and articles that I would like to produce
  • At 100k. Foundation of a warehouse / production
  • At 110k. Search for new communities and articles.

Metas

  • A los 15k. Linea para la producción de pulseras
  • A los 25k. Linea para la producción de bolsas, collares, anillos, aretes
  • A los 35k. Linea para la producción cinturones, ropa, mochilas
  • A los 50k. Linea experimental esculturas, corbatas y artículos que me gustaría producir
  • A los 100k. Creación de un almacén/producción
  • A los 110k. Buscar nuevas comunidades y artículos. 

Other ways you can help

  • Share this campaign with your friends.
  • If you know someone who might be interested in selling designs with us, share the project.
  • Help us companies like Nintendo, Riot, blizzard know us to bring them designs. Such as Link, Pokemon, Teemo, Lux, with a #Tatewari to their twitter account.
  • We help youtubers and Streamers know about our project. They may be interested in our partner program.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

  • Comparte esta campaña con tus amigos.
  • Si conoces alguien que pudiera estar interesado en vender diseños con nosotros, compartele el  proyecto.
  • Ayudanos a que las compañias como Nintendo, Riot, blizzard nos conozcan para traerles diseños de Link, Pokemon, Teemo, Lux,  con un #Tatewari a su cuenta de twitter.
  • Ayudamos a que los youtubers y Streamers conozcan nuestro proyecto tal vez les interese nuestro programa de partner.


Possible designs

story:
OUR STORY... 

THE WHY
After visiting several shops, looking into a couple of brands and shopping in different outlets, we've discovered that there are very few real attractive and cool WALLETS at a good price. So we decided to develop our own brand. We are convinced that we can offer much better WALLETS than what's on the market today!

THE FACTS
We can almost guarantee that one of this two things has happened to you.  Either you find an amazing really fancy brand WALLET that you love that costs $ 200 USD or you actually find a $ 20 USD ordinary black of brown WALLET with absolutely no design. 

Having said that  we proudly present the…… BARTOLOMÉ & BELMONTE WALLET COLLECTION!

THE VISION
Our purpose is to have a completely new approach to the world of WALLETS. We want to change the rules and make wallets suitable for every occasion. 

WE NEED YOUR HELP
We hope you liked our project, we invite you to support us! The money we are asking for is needed to start producing the first model of the BARTOLOMÉ & BELMONTE WALLET Collection in mass volume!

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR WATCHING & SHARING!

story:
Whether you’re ordering online or off the rack, finding your perfect size is always stressful. When the length fits, the sleeves are too wide; when the collar fits, then the fit is too loose. Every body type is unique and here at MOFIT we understand that. You should never settle with sizing, so, we make clothes that fit you every time.

From no fit to MOFIT.

 

- WHAT IS MOFIT? 

  MOFIT is an online clothing company that takes away the guessing work that comes with sizing. We want to do away with standard sizes that force customers into broad boxes. Tailoring can not only be expensive but it can also be a hassle. Instead, we are hoping to make custom fit clothes at affordable prices shipped right to your door. 

  First, we will collect size dimensions from our customers and from there we will create subgroups of those with similar dimensions. Instead of just small, medium, and large, we are hoping to create even more size groups. 

  The more people that sign up, the more exact the fit becomes. In other words, as groups get bigger, then smaller subgroups can split off into more exact measurements. As you continue to order, we will store your information based on your past style and fit preferences so we can recommend the best items for you.

 Our company designs casual, custom fit clothing for everyday wear.

 

HOW IT WORKS? _ CROWD SIZING

  At MOFIT, sizing is a mathematical equation that will solve all fit problems. Sparing you the complicated mathematical equations, and the clustering method that would you bore you out, once sizes are collected from backers, we will analyze the measurement and carefully allocate backers into an appropriate sub size group.  

  Instead of just S, M and L, we will be able to create an expanded group of sizes based on sizing characteristics. To date, we have collected over 3000 sets of sizing measurements from participants and processed the data the MOFIT way. The more backers that back up, the more exact the fit becomes. As groups get bigger, smaller subgroups can be further divided which would increase the chance of a better fit.

 

*CROWD SIZING

Crowd sizing is very similar concept to Crowd Funding which is a method of raising capital through the collective effort of friends, family, customers, and individual investors. On the other hand, Crowd Sizing is collecting various SIZES from backers not to gain some money, but to construct new organizations of sizes.

 

 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION
 Currently we are living in the unfit sizing world. With your participation, you can not only get your fitted shirts but also can give others chance to have one. Each one of us has no power to change the world, but if we get together, we can change it. LET’S HEAL THE WORLD AND MAKE IT A BETTER FIT!

 

YOUR HELP
 After successful funding, we will send you an email with tutorial video about how to measure your body. All you have to do is to measure your body according to this video and send your measures to us.

story:
Elefant Apparel was started by three friends with a passion for giving back and wanting to make a change. After brainstorming a way to reach as many people as possible to help us, we decided that creating a brand people can be proud to wear and a logo that is simple yet stands out for a cause was the perfect opportunity to bring the two worlds together.

Many fashion brands have used animals as a part of their materials to add prestige and value to clothing, we wanted to do the opposite. We think the living animal is the most important and prestigious aspect and decided to use fashion to help save them instead. We landed on the Elephant because of what it stands for and the situation it is in. Elephant numbers have dropped 62% over the past decade and it is estimated 100 are killed each day in Africa by poachers leaving only 400,000 in the wild.

Our company is looking to source $7500 to cover the costs of inventory. We need to acquire a few of every size for every piece on our website so we can cut delivery times from 21 days to 2, Thus allowing us to use the profit generated to restock inventory, cover the costs to further market our product and donate to savetheelephants.org as well as other charitable organizations.

Locally we are working with the Hera Mission Of Canada by designing a limited edition ELE shirt for them in which 25% of all proceeds will be donated towards their amazing cause which you can read about at www.heramission.org

On a worldwide scale and back to our passion we will be donating 10% of all sales from our webstore to savetheelephants.org an amazing organization dedicated to protecting this beautiful animal from poachers and sustaining its natural habitat so it can be admired for generations to come. We urge you to go to their website and educate yourself on just how much all of our help is needed.

story:
Bienvenue dans l’univers Fool Monks !

Nous lançons la première plateforme communautaire en Europe de textile 2.0.

Notre concept est de permettre à TOUT LE MONDE de gagner de l'argent en partageant des créations sur vos réseaux sociaux ou tout simplement en créant des designs que d'autres partageront !

 

Pour financer notre projet de plateforme web, nous lançons la collection de T-Shirts NAINCONNU d'un designer qui a fait confiance au concept Fool Monks.

 

Depuis que le textile existe, il a permis de véhiculer des émotions et des messages positifs. C’est un support universel et libre qui, en transmettant des messages forts, peut contribuer à une « positive attitude » dont le monde a réellement besoin aujourd’hui !

Nous souhaitons devenir un nouveau modèle économique, social et éthique sans frontières.

Fool Monks a développé un concept dans la mode et le textile de plateforme unique qui automatise l’ensemble des processus pour tous, en partant d’une idée jusqu’au produit final porté par le consommateur.

Qu’ils soient créés par nous, par de célèbres créateurs ou par vous, la grande innovation est que nous savons fabriquer et livrer en 10 jours et à l’unité !

PAS BESOIN DE STOCK, DE LOGISTIQUE OU DE CREUSER SON PORTE-MONNAIE. FOOL MONKS S'OCCUPENT DE TOUT.

Les communicActeurs Fool Monks, c'est qui ?

  • DEVENEZ UN COMMUNICANT !

 

Partagez tous les designs de T-Shirts proposés par FOOL MONKS sur vos réseaux sociaux et vous bénéficierez de 18% sur le montant des ventes générées grâce à vous !

En s’inscrivant gratuitement sur la plateforme, n’importe qui peut, simplement, partager tous les produits actuels et à venir proposés et ainsi bénéficier de 18 % sur le montant des ventes générées sur le web.

« Facebookeurs/euses, Instagrameurs/euses, Slasheurs/euses, Youtubeurs/euses, Booktubeurs/euses, Bloggeurs/euses, Influenceurs/euses, Revelateurs/trices, Twitteurs/euses.... tout le monde peut contribuer a véhiculer des messages tout en gagnant leur vie.

ÇA NE VOUS COUTE RIEN ! ou presque…1 MINUTE pour s’inscrire et pour poster !

Par exemple, si Lucie vend 100 t-shirts à€ 24.90, elle gagne près de € 450.-. Et le concept ne s’arrête pas là, grâce aux amis de Lucie qui s’inscrivent comme communicants et qui partagent également son post, elle recevra en plus des 18 % de son réseau, 3 % venant du réseau de ses amis.

  • VOUS ÊTES UN CRÉATEUR ?!

Devenez créateur / designer sur Fool Monks !

Créez votre propre design ou une collection que nous fabriquerons à l’unité ou par centaines…. Vous devenez acteur du concept Fool Monks et bénéficiez de 3% de la somme de chaque T-Shirt vendu.

Vous passez par notre plateforme web et toutes vos ventes seront générées par Fool Monks, via les communicants, ces derniers vont générer un effet boule de neige commercial à votre place. Concentrez-vous seulement sur votre passion : la création.

Par exemple, 50 communicants vendent chacun 100 T-Shirts à€ 24.90 du design posté de René, cela fait 5'000 T-Shirts. Il gagnera plus de € 3’700.- sans s’occuper du financement, de la production, de la logistique ou des encaissements.

LIBÉREZ VOTRE CRÉATIVITÉ AVEC FOOL MONKS !!!!

 

Un créateur Suisse d’envergure internationale fait confiance à notre nouveau modèle: lancement de la collection de T-Shirts « NAINCONNU ».

Jacques Vallotton ou "Valott", designer Suisse à la réputation mondiale, a accepté de participer activement à notre vision positive de la vie. Il a notamment créé la marque MUMU COW qui s’est vendue à plus de 3'500'000 d’articles sur nos 5 continents. Fort des mêmes valeurs et d’un formidable enthousiasme, la collaboration était parfaite. La collection de T-Shirts NAINCONNU était en adéquation avec l'écosystème social, éthique et la positivité que l’équipe Fool Monks souhaite créer.

 

Notre mission ?

Un concept simple, novateur et qui vous permets de faire partie d’une communauté qui véhicule des valeurs…

  • de liberté - permettre à chacun de gagner sa vie en tant qu'indépendant ;
  • d’éthique - en fabriquant à l’unité, nous contribuons au bien-être de notre environnement avec moins de gaspillage de matières premières et d’énergie ;
  • de plaisir - véhiculer des messages positifs partout et pour tous ;
  • et de partage - participer à un nouvel écosystème participatif, social et économique.

Le modèle économique en résumé :


n.b. nous ne produirons pas de designs qui ne correspondent pas au respect des valeurs de Fool Monks.

A quoi servira la collecte ?

Vos contributions vont nous permettre de :

  • finaliser le développement informatique de notre plateforme web actuellement en phase de test ;
  • développer une application mobile iOS et Android ;
  • découvrir de nouveaux talents créateurs en Europe motivés par les énergies positives de notre projet ;
  • permettre à notre nouveau concept économique, social et éthique de se déployer grâce à vous en tant que communicant et/ou créateur.

 

Qui sommes-nous ?

Didier | Co-fondateur

Je m’appelle Didier et je suis passionné par la vie, l’humain, l’environnement, la musique (et oui je suis aussi chanteur), ma famille, la pétanque et la nature…

Mon parcours de vie ? c’est plus de 30 ans d’accompagnement dans le développement personnel et la création d’entreprises dont le nouveau-né : Fool Monks.

Ma mission est de contribuer à donner : Sérénité, Positivité, Liberté dans ce monde qui en a tant besoin.

didier@foolmonks.com

Jean-Philippe | Co-fondateur

Je m’appelle Jean-Philippe et je suis passionné par les infinis, la musique et le tennis, je suis Jean-Philippe ! Attiré depuis toujours pas la simplification et l’innovation, je contribue depuis une vingtaine d’années à l’accompagnement des organisations et à leur transformation digitale. Co-artisan de Fool Monks, j’apporte ma vision, mes idées et ma passion pour mettre en place une plateforme d’échange collaborative basée sur l’équité et le partage !

jp@foolmonks.com

Benjamin | Direction de projet crowdfunding

Il adore le projet, il aime les nains et le monde du digital. T’es qui Benjamin ?

Moi ? Je suis tout simplement un amoureux de la vie et passionné par l’innovation, notre monde qui se réinvente, les nouveaux modèles économiques et les nouvelles technologies. Spécialiste en marketing et communication depuis plus de quinze ans, je trouve mon bonheur dans la créativité, le partage, le plaisir dans le travail et ma famille. Et avec Fool Monks, j'ai un réel plaisir au travail. J’accompagne l’équipe fondatrice dans cette mission positive, éthique et sociale !

benjamin@foolmonks.com

Questions les plus fréquentes concernant notre projet.

Je crée un T-Shirt, dois-je l’envoyer moi-même ?

- Bien sûr que non ! Nous nous occupons de tout, de la fabrication à la livraison.

Comment en tant que CRÉATEUR/DESIGNER m'assurer que toutes les ventes générées de ma collection seront honorées financièrement ?

- C'est très simple, toutes vos créations seront suivies avec un lien (URL), et donc toutes ventes liées à votre marque seront honorées directement sur votre compte.

Comment en tant que COMMUNICANT mes ventes seront suivies ?

- Le suivi est très simple. En tant que communicant, vous recevrez un Bon (code), que vous transmettrez à tout votre réseau (p.ex. Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Blogs, etc) . Chaque commande déclenchera votre commission (18%).

Et si mon client désire devenir COMMUNICANT à son tour ?

- C'est également simple, vous lui fournirez un lien (URL) qui le reliera à votre compte, donc toutes ses ventes vous rapporteront également 3%.

Est-ce que le client a avantage à passer par le COMMUNICANT ?

- Oui ! Car il bénéficiera de 3% sur tous ses achats.

Quand vais-je recevoir mon ou mes T-Shirts NAINCONNU ?

- Les premiers T-Shirts seront expédiés dans les 10 jours après la campagne de crowdfunding. C’est aussi ça le défi ! Le tricotage est fait avec amour, produit à l’unité.

Quelle est votre politique d'échange ?
- Si vous souhaitez échanger le ou les article(s) commandé(s) par ce qu'une erreur de taille(s), couleur(s), défaut(s), ne correspond(ent) pas à votre commande initiale, les dites seront remplacées. Nous acceptons les articles en retour avec les étiquettes d'origine attachées, non lavés et dans un délai de 15 jours.

Dans quel pays livrez-vous ?
- Nous proposons une livraison dans toute l’Europe. Les envois internationaux peuvent parfois être soumis à des taxes d'importation, et des droits de douane, qui sont à la charge du destinataire.
 
Quelle est la politique de remboursement d'Indiegogo ?
- Indiegogo honorera un remboursement selon ses conditions générales.

Pour toute autre question, envoyez-nous avec plaisir un message à info@foolmonks.com.

Visitez notre site internet : www.foolmonks.com

 

Communicateur, créateur, vendeur : partagez vos émotions et devenez consommActeur Fool Monks pour gagner votre vie, liberté, sérénité, plaisir et contribuer à un monde meilleur.

Participez avec nous à construire cette belle aventure...

Elle est belle la vie !

Welcome to the Flock

 

Mallard Co. was founded by a few young people committed to finding a true need within our culture with the hopes of proactively meeting it. We don’t want to just speak about change, but our hope is to be an instrument of it. We are creating a brand of clothing and merchandise for the purpose of influencing culture in a positive way by propelling those that are blessing and serving others. As college students, we found that clothing was the best option for this! Our plan is to grant 35% of our proceeds every three months to a new social organization of our "flock's" choosing. Our goal is to provide these grants as tangible resources to organizations that share our faith and are committed to serving people through social action.

We believe that everyone holds true value and WE WANT & NEED YOUR HELP TOO. NOW THAT WE ARE SOMEWHAT FRIENDS, WE INVITE YOU INTO OUR FLOCK.

Collectively, we are thrilled to see so many people buying into our ideas while coming alongside our dreams with a desire to help and serve. We do NOT want to build a brand to simply drive a profit while simultaneously making our customers "feel good". Yes, we do want to collectively find a sustainable purpose while creating satisfaction within our work, but we simply want others to be blessed by the work that we do with results-oriented and sustainable social action.

Our goal is to raise $15,000 in support to help us finance inventory purchases, invest in marketing efforts, and further develop our product lines. If we meet our goal and by chance exceed our expectations, 35% of the overage funds we raise in this campaign will be donated to the Alexander Wayne Earles Legacy Scholarship at Dallas Baptist University in memory of Alexander Wayne Earles, a fallen United States Air Force Airman and the brother of Mallard Co.'s founder, John Austin Earles. Listed below are the various options to help fund this campaign.

 

Product Pre-Order Options

*ENDS APRIL 13, 2018 at 11:59 P.M. CST*

 

  • The Bill - Early Bird Discount
    • 20% off hat $18 (price reflects discount)
      • This product is not named after anyone; it was simply fitting and clever.
  • The Hunter & The Eleanor - Early Bird Discount
    • 20% off unisex short-sleeve shirt $22 (price reflects discount)
      • This product is named after Hunter Bolling & Ellie Barnes; two incredibly talented models that were willing to sacrifice their time and energy to help build our brand.
  • The Aidan - Early Bird Discount
    • 20% off unisex long-sleeve shirt $26 (price reflects discount)
      • This product is named after Aidan McCall; the Mallard Co. photographer that fought through many sleepless nights and too many long days to make this dream come alive.

 

Pledge Amounts & Incentives:

 

  • $1: The Recently Drafted
    • Thank You Letter, & Flock Access
      • A thank you letter from our founder and exclusive access to updates on our project.

 

  • $25: The Team Player
    • 10% Discount on First Ten Purchases, Thank You Letter, & Flock Access
      • 10% discount on first ten purchases, a thank you letter from our founder and exclusive access to updates on our project.

 

  • $49: The Frequent Flyer
    • 10% Discount on First Ten Purchases, Thank You Letter, 1 HAT, & Flock Access
      • 10% discount on first ten purchases, a thank you letter from our founder, 1 Mallard Co. hat, and exclusive access to updates on our project.

 

  • $97: The Long Hauler
    • 10% Discount on First Ten Purchases, Thank You Letter, 2 HATS, 1 SHIRT, & Flock Access
      • 10% discount on first ten purchases, a thank you letter from our founder, 2 Mallard Co. hats, 1 Mallard Co. short-sleeve shirt and exclusive access to updates on our project.

 

  • $189: The Full Bird Colonel
    • 10% Discount on ALL Future Purchases, Thank You Letter, 2 HATS, 2 SHIRTS, 1 Long-Sleeve Shirt, & Flock Access
      • 10% discount on ALL future purchases, a thank you letter from our founder, 2 Mallard Co. hats, 2 Mallard Co. short-sleeve shirts, 1 Mallard Co. long-sleeve shirt, and exclusive access to updates on our project.

 

  • $314: The Commander in Chief
    •  10% Discount on ALL Future Purchases & Mallard Co. "VERY IMPORTANT DUCK" Box
      • 10% discount off ALL future purchases, a thank you letter from our founder, 4 Mallard Co. hats, 2 Mallard Co. short-sleeve shirts, 2 Mallard Co. long-sleeve shirts, and exclusive access to updates on our project.

 

Think You Have Something To Contribute?

Well,,, YOU CAN! WE ARE A COMMUNITY AND WANT EVERYONE INVOLVED:

If you hold a talent that the world must see, we ask you to become our champion. If you are an artist, we ask that you use us as an art-board. If you are a model, collaborate with us and show the world what true and definitive beauty looks like. If you are a videographer, photographer, blogger, social media influencer, etc... We would love to connect with you to expand our platform. The greater the number of talents we possess as a flock, the greater the potential of impact we hold. If you are interested in joining our flock by becoming a rep, model, branding, networking, etc... please contact us and we will let you know what it looks like to become a part of the Mallard Co. Family.

 

Finally... Some Quick Side Comments From J.A. Earles:

 

Dear Friend,

Welcome to our Family, Welcome to our Flock, & Welcome to our Migration of Change.

Thank you for taking a true interest in Mallard Co. To explain a bit more of our dream, you must first know this: as an organization, we are committed to impacting culture. We believe that God alone grants us talents and we simply want to build this project to serve others using ours. As an organization, we commit to following the greatest example of servant leadership, Jesus Christ. He came to serve rather than to be served and we hope to do the same. 

Our hope is to engage our generation like a wildfire. We are confident that with your help, this social project will expand, change, and exceed our greatest hopes and dreams.

Whether we fail or succeed, we are simply grateful for the opportunity to try. We are thankful for your friendship and hope that Mallard Co. blesses you. If there is ever any way that we can personally serve you, please let us know.

We are excited to serve alongside you and build change together.

 

Welcome to the Flock,

John Austin Earles, Founder

Mallard Co.

P.S. We ask that you tell your friends about us. The greater this idea grows, the more opportunity we will have to bless the lives of others.

story:
Hand Design

  • Thomas Felice watch hands are carefully crafted to reflect character without compromising class.
  • We want to preserve the classic look while providing you with a small secret.
  • Each watch design is like a tattoo -- it will mean something different to each owner.

 

Personality Extension

  • A watch does more than tell time.
  •  It preserves memories, of milestones and of people.
  • It makes a statement. It starts conversation.
  • Most of all, a watch is an extension of your personality.

 

Overall Aesthetic

  • Overall, Thomas Felice strives to inspire confidence.
  • We want you to have a time piece that means something to you.
  • By wearing a Thomas Felice watch, you elevate your style at an affordable price.

 

Watch Specs

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BECAUSE ITS TIME™

story:
Here at LMTS we strive for excellence. Our watches have been created with the vision of portraying ultimate high quality and supremacy. 

Through countless hours of designing and perfecting the Push Your Limits Collection, we have constructed 5 sleek and sophisticated watches designed specifically for men.

We are confident that with the rich quality and suave appearance of our watches, confidence will implode on any man who wears it. So the question is, are you ready to push your boundaries? Are you ready to Push Your LMTS?  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Over the past year here at LMTS we have pushed the boundaries and created and designed the most supreme collection of Men's watches. As each watch has been designed by world renown artists and craftsmen, we have worked tirelessly to create what we believe is perfection in a Men's watch.

 

 

Inspired with the vision of a fast pace and hard working lifestyle, we have designed a watch collection in which presents an incredibly firm and daring appearance.  Each colour and design in our collection portray a sturdy and masculine look that has the ability to evoke confidence in anyone. With our assortment of styles and designs, we are certain you will find one to suit you best!

 

 

 

 

 

It is our prerogative that each watch is hand crafted and expertly stitched with Italian leather and 316L stainless steel. We are certain that you will receive superb quality all for the fraction of the price.

 

It is our priority here at LMTS that our watches are manufactured by the absolute best of the best. We have partnered with world renown manufactures, and are certainly comfortable with all aspects of manufacturing, quality control, production and the delivery process. 

 

When purchasing a watch we strongly believe that not only should the watch itself surpass your standards, but the box it comes in should as well. We designed our collection's box to represent the watch in the best way, as we understand that the box the watch comes in will essentially be your first impression. We designed a stunning jet black case in which moves on silver hinges, and a clasp to close. Surrounding the watch inside is luxurious hand stitched material, and our LMTS logo printed inside. We have designed the box to showcase the exact luxury our watches encompass.

So start your own LTMS collection! Our Collection Box offers all five watches shipped together easily for your convenience.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

LIFE TIME WARRANTY

As each watch has been hand crafted to have extreme durability and the most premium grade stainless steel and Italian leather, we are certain you will love your watch. In fact, we are so confident in our timepieces that they are backed with a lifetime warranty. So, for any reason your watch should stop working due to any internal malfunctions, no need to worry! Simply contact us, and we will fix or replace the watch you have in no time!

 

 

 

 

Your satisfaction means more to us than anything. And although we are confident that you will be pleased with any watch of our collection, under the circumstances that you are not, we offer full refund. NO QUESTIONS ASKED! 

Check out our Website for more details here!

 

 

 

CHECK US OUT ON INSTAGRAM & FACEBOOK

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

With every new project there are bound to be obstacles and difficulties along the way.  However, a main factor of how we differentiate ourselves from our competitors here on Indiegogo, is at LMTS our company does not run from challenges, we welcome them with open arms.

It is our main priority that we continue to create, design, and manufacture the utmost superb quality watches.  Therefore, as challenges appear along the way, we take them as an opportunity to better our company as a whole and build on our weaknesses.

For starters, we have partnered with world leading watch manufactures, and worked countless hours to ensure that each watch will continue to be created with careful attention and quality diligence. 

We are extremely excited to be a part of the Indiegogo community, and genuinely grateful to take this next step with you!

It is our main priority that we continue to create, design, and manufacture the utmost superb quality watches.  Therefore, as challenges appear along the way, we take them as an opportunity to better our company as a whole and build on our weaknesses.
For starters, we have partnered with world leading watch manufactures, and worked countless hours to ensure that each watch will continue to be created with careful attention and quality diligence. 
We are extremely excited to be a part of the Indiegogo community, and genuinely grateful to take this next step with you!

story:
Specs are smart glasses that use computer vision and heart rate biosensors to track your productivity and alert you in real time when you’re going off task. Using a system of strategies created under the advisement of expert neuroscientists, psychiatrists, and psychologists, Specs help make procrastination a thing of the past.
 


 

Here at Auctify, we understand that everyone’s goals are different, we made our companion app fully customizable. Whether you’re looking to move up at work, ace an exam, or learn a new skill, Specs will help you stay on track for your specific goals.

        

Specs are built to accommodate both prescription and non-prescription wearers, that’s why we’re providing the following lens options:

Specs are unlike any other productivity manager available. Traditional apps have notifications that can be easily ignored or swept away. Some try to shame you for getting distracted or guilt-trip you about your focus dwindling. Specs don’t rely on those—we use clinically proven psychological methodologies that motivate you to stay productive.

Procrastination can lead people to develop unhealthy coping mechanisms just to get by. Surveys have found that 25% of students rely on drugs like Adderall or Ritalin to keep them focused on their projects, and this trend is also found in high-stress workplaces. Others depend on a system of caffeine and alcohol to manage their productivity and sleep schedules. It’s time to stop these harmful habits and start using technology to help manage your life.
 

Specs are slim, stylish glasses that are indistinguishable from regular glasses. Our lightweight, compact frames are designed for everyday wear. What’s more, they’re made to accommodate your prescription, if you have one.

The sensors inside a pair of Specs are small enough to be unnoticable, but robust enough to track your heart rate, activities and focus level.

When combined with the computer vision technology in the frames, your Specs can tell exactly what you’re focused on—and whether or not it’s what you should be focused on, based on your personalized settings.

Productivity apps that limit screen time can be helpful, but the technology in Specs takes it to a whole new level by providing activity tracking both on and off screen. Most distractionsdon’t occur on one device alone, and Specs were built to give you control over your entire day, whether you’re looking to spend more time reading, or cut down the amount of time you spend socializing in person. Specs can even detect subcategories of activities, so you’ll have no problem focusing on reading an article on your computer while keeping away from Facebook.

You’re in complete control of your data privacy and encryption with Specs. Unlike other hardware products (ie. phones), all of the sensor data captured by Specs is securely processed on your phone’s hardware, and discarded immediately after processing. No external servers are needed for data processing, so your sensor data never actually leaves your device.
 

In fact, it would be physically impossible for anyone else to access your data without physically breaking into your phone and decrypting it

Specs uses proven psychological methodologies, such as mindfulness training, positive reinforcement, gamification, and mental conditioning, to ensure that you're always getting the most out of your day.

The Auctify Specs companion app lets you set your own preferences for each of these strategies, so that you get a truly personalized experience. If you need to cut out specific sites like Netflix or Facebook to keep you on track, you can. If you work best when you plan your day ahead of time, you can. If you need to spend half the day in meetings, then a few hours researching online, and then some more time writing, you can. You can set the app up to your unique specifications and preferences, making it a tool that’s tailored to your needs in every way.

Specs aren’t just for work. Specs are there to help you get the most out of your day, whether that means spending more time reading the book you’ve been meaning to get to, engaging your creative spirit in ways you couldn’t before, or even allocating more time for the exercise that you previously couldn’t fit into your day.

Improve your quality of work by eliminating procrastination. When you get distracted, it takes over 23 minutes to get fully back on task. If you get distracted multiple times a day, your work ends up getting rushed so you can complete it on time. People rarely do their best work under that kind of stress, but with Specs to help you get into a flow, you’ll get things done faster and better than ever before.

Whether it’s spending time with your family, watching a movie with friends, or going on vacation, Specs will help you finish your work so you can do the things you really want to do. What’s keeping your productivity high means that your stress will be lower, so you’ll be able to more fully enjoy the important things in your life.


Our version zero prototype could track your focus & activities, measure your heart rate, and play music. But we've come a long way since then. We've taken all this hardware, and packed it into a sleek frame that looks completely indistinguishable from a regular pair of glasses.

Here, you'll see just how far we've come with our machine learning models. Specs can track most common activities such as eating, reading, socializing, using your phone, and a lot more. As we continue training our machine learning models in the coming months, we'll be able to improve our accuracy even further, and add more activities to our database.

 

Mindfulness Training in Improving Athletic Performance
T. Vanhaitsma, “An Examination of Short-Term Mental Conditioning or Mindfulness Training on Physiological, Psychological, and Performance Outcomes during a Cycling Task,” [Online]. Available: https://www.academia.edu/40424839/An_Examinatio....

Mindfulness Training in Reducing Substance Abuse
J. A. Brewer, S. Mallik, T. A. Babuscio, C. Nich, H. E. Johnson, C. M. Deleone, C. A. Minnix-Cotton, S. A. Byrne, H. Kober, A. J. Weinstein, K. M. Carroll, and B. J. Rounsaville, “Mindfulness training for smoking cessation: Results from a randomized controlled trial,” Drug and Alcohol Dependence, vol. 119, no. 1-2, pp. 72–80, 2011.

J. S. Harris, D. G. Stewart, and B. C. Stanton, “Urge Surfing as Aftercare in Adolescent Alcohol Use: a Randomized Control Trial,” Mindfulness, vol. 8, no. 1, pp. 144–149, 2016.

Mindfulness Training Disrupts Neurologically Conditioned Habits

A. W. Hanley and E. L. Garland, “Mindfulness training disrupts Pavlovian conditioning,” Physiology & Behavior, vol. 204, pp. 151–154, 2019.

Mindfulness Training in Reducing Stress
M. D. Vibe, I. Solhaug, R. Tyssen, O. Friborg, J. H. Rosenvinge, T. Sørlie, and A. Bjørndal, “Mindfulness training for stress management: a randomised controlled study of medical and psychology students,” BMC Medical Education, vol. 13, no. 1, 2013.

Self-Awareness is a Major Factor in Predicting Academic Success
S. Exner, “An Examination of the Relationship Among Learning Disability, Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, Academic Self-Efficacy, Effort, Self-Awareness and Academic Achievement in Post-Secondary Students,” [Online]. Available: https://aura.alfred.edu/bitstream/handle/10829/...

Gamification Enhances Motivation and Academic Achievement
I. Yildirim, “The effects of gamification-based teaching practices on student achievement and students attitudes toward lessons,” The Internet and Higher Education, vol. 33, pp. 86–92, 2017.

Positive Reinforcement and Self-Awareness Enhances Motivation and Achievement in Student
T. Kobus, “Increasing Motivation of Elementary and Middle School Students through Positive Reinforcement, Student Self-Assessment, and Creative Engagement,”  [Online]. Available: https://eric.ed.gov/?id=ED498971

Positive Reinforcement Enhances Productivity and Motivation in the Workplace
A. J. Martin, “The Role of Positive Psychology in Enhancing Satisfaction, Motivation, and Productivity in the Workplace,” Journal of Organizational Behavior Management, vol. 24, no. 1-2, pp. 113–133, 2005.

Here at Auctify, our goal is to help everyone achieve their full potential. As professionals of highly technical fields, our team is well aware of how much time people spend distracted when they should be doing other things, and we’ve come together to help others tackle the issue. Auctify is dedicated to helping people reduce unhealthy and unnecessary activities so there’s more time in life for the things that really matter.
