story:
​

 

Glow & Grow is the world’s first smart makeup remover.

Thousands of women are wearing makeup everyday.  And after a busy day of work and an evening out with friends, we understand the last thing you want to do when you get home late is washing your face and remove your makeup!  And it’s a pain to scrub and scrub to make sure it’s all off!

No more tedious routines that take 20 minutes.  Your makeup will be gone, and your face will be fresh and clean in no time at all!

 

 

Glow & Grow is a lifesaver when you feel too tired to wash your face before bed.  In 5 simple steps you’ll have your face clean and feeling great

 

 

How many times have you come home from a party drunk and just gone to sleep because it was too much effort to take off your makeup?  Wish there was a fast way to get your makeup off? Now you can use Glow & Grow!  It’s easy and fast.

 

 

Many cleaning brushes are just hurting your skin. With Glow & Grow you get a gentle and effective cleansing effect without damaging the keratin. Glow & Grow offers a gentle cleansing method for different sensitive areas and different types of skin through two different antibacterial cleaning heads.

The soft silicone head is unique in that the 8-shaped brush head is designed deep into your pores to give you a professional cleaning effect.  Glow & Grow can quickly remove any makeup from your face and then clear your pores and remove excess body oils.  After you use it, your face will not only feel clean, it will feel softer and less oily!

Make-up residue, after cleaning, touch the entire face, you will feel more even and tender skin. After each workout, you can help deep cleansing oily face.

 

 

Many women damage their skin when they clean their faces!  Often when you push too hard with your fingers, it can cause wrinkles and even permanently damage sensitive facial muscles.

Glow & Grow will intelligently identify in 360° rotation mode. When the force is too much, it will stop automatically. When the power is light, it will work harder. The smart pressure technology helps to protect your skin.

 

 

At the bottom of Glow & Grow is a beauty spa applicator with hot & cold mode. Simply use this to evenly apply skin cream and other nutrients to every corner of your face.

Heating mode: 5S is heated to about 42°, which can effectively relax the skin and help the nutrient solution to reach deep into the skin.

Cold mode: Reduce to 3 °C - 8 °C in 5S (15 °C -25 °C lower than room temperature), help to quickly shrink pores and lock in the nutrient solution, block dust and dirt from getting into the pores.

Then the final step of makeup removal,  system is to use the larger metal head design for muscle care treatment.  This cold facial spa treatment is perfect after a long day!


 

Glow & Grow is a three-in-one smart makeup removal tool that gives a professional makeup removal experience and spa-quality skin care solution in 90 seconds, with almost no effort.  And the best part is it’s small enough to fit in the palm of your hand.  Take it to the gym, work, vacation or on a business trip.  You’ll always look great!

 

 

The best thing about Glow & Grow is that it’s made of ultra-hygienic silicone that lasts for life! Other cleaning heads inevitably age, breed bacteria and causes health problems over time. Our replaceable brush head provides an unparalleled ultra-hygienic cleansing experience.

The silicone head is made of food-grade silicone, safe and soft, anti-allergy, anti-bacteria.

The natural rubber head is not irritating, elastic and 2.5 times milder than other brush heads.

 

 

Make-up is the nature of beauty, and scientific makeup remover is also our responsibility for a clean and transparent skin. We are a group of scientific madmen and beauty darlings who are dedicated to bringing effective and deep cleaning methods to the beauty lovers of makeup.

We have assembled an aesthetics expert, mechanical engineer, electronic engineer, beauty painter, and to work together to develop this epoch-making makeup remover system. Behind us, there are strong R&D, production teams, factories. Support us.

Our steps have not stopped, and now our team is reviewing small batches of samples and quality control, we expect to start shipping in November. At the same time, we also consider the need for manufacturing and products to be revised.

story:
We started New Movements with one simple goal: walk with impact Our first fashion collection: Model NM is made to last a long time. 

These sneakers remove ocean waste equal to 80 plastic bottles for every pair. We use natural & recycled materials and the best part, you don’t compromise on comfort or design. 

Model NM comes in 7 colors and fit both men and women. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The footwear industry often overlooks natural and recycled materials for cheaper synthetic options. We do not think this way is neither responsible or sustainable so we set out to make better shoes in a different way. 

There is more micro-plastic in the ocean than there are stars in the Milky Way and If nothing is done, there will be more plastic than fish in the oceans by 2050.

The team cleaning up ocean plastic waste in Hoddevik and Bali.  

In New Movements, we are aware of this massive problem that our planet is suffering. That is the reason why we collaborate with the plastic waste movement Empower. For every pair of shoes you pre-order, we clean 1 kg (equal to 80 plastic bottles) of ocean plastic around the world. Together we help local communities, providing jobs and save the environment.

Currently, 90% of the sneakers made today are produced in Asia, often under poor working conditions and with a fast fashion approach.  Model NM is ethically made in Portugal which is considered to have the best shoemakers in the world. 

We want to push the limits by offering you high-end sneakers and contribute positively to the environment.
story_txt:
Sustainable Sneakers - Walk With Impact
We started New Movements with one simple goal: walk with impact Our first fashion collection: Model NM is made to last a long time. These sneakers remove ocean waste equal to 80 plastic bottles for every pair. We use natural & recycled materials and the best part, you don’t compromise on comfort or design. Model NM comes in 7 colors and fit both men and women.         The footwear industry often overlooks natural and recycled materials for cheaper synthetic options. We do not think this way is neither responsible or sustainable so we set out to make better shoes in a different way. 
 


There is more micro-plastic in the ocean than there are stars in the Milky Way and If nothing is done, there will be more plastic than fish in the oceans by 2050.

The team cleaning up ocean plastic waste in Hoddevik and Bali.  
In New Movements, we are aware of this massive problem that our planet is suffering. That is the reason why we collaborate with the plastic waste movement Empower. For every pair of shoes you pre-order, we clean 1 kg (equal to 80 plastic bottles) of ocean plastic around the world. Together we help local communities, providing jobs and save the environment.

Currently, 90% of the sneakers made today are produced in Asia, often under poor working conditions and with a fast fashion approach.  Model NM is ethically made in Portugal which is considered to have the best shoemakers in the world. 

We want to push the limits by offering you high-end sneakers and contribute positively to the environment. 





Hi, we are the team behind New Movements and we are on a mission to accelerate the transition to sustainable and ethical products for the benefit of the earth and humanity. We are super excited to see people walk with impact.  Join our mission because your choice matters :)

Team New Movements: Nils Wiiburg, Martin Evensen, Laney Haviland, Alexander Windquist 




Between two sizes? | If you have same cm as the maximum size, for example 27.2 cm (EU 42-43) we recommend sizing up for a more relaxed fit or sizing down for a snug fit, up to you.

story:
Introducing 22seven ORION Backpack

The 22seven ORION backpack system is designed so that you can securely personalize it to look the way you like and work the way you need.

Completely customizable to ensure your professional gear is organized and easily accessible. Fully configurable to create a backpack that is personalized and uniquely yours. 

And because everyone has a different style, apart from Stealth Black in ballistic nylon, we also offer Urban Heather in high weave polyester.

Choose the color option AFTER you have selected your perk.

 

Quick And Secure Attachment

The 22seven ORION backpack utilizes patented FIDLOCK® fasteners which are magnetic so that you can quickly attach a stylish FacePak or a wide selection of functional StylePak accessories to your BasePak.

These ultra-reliable FIDLOCK® fasteners have mechanical snaps to prevent accidental detachment of FacePak or StylePak accessories. 

These fasteners are magnetic for easy attachment but the strong directional snaps are what hold the FacePak or StylePak accessories securely to keep your belongings safe! 

 

Customizable StylePak Accessories

Configure your backpack with the multi dimensional StylePak accessories so that you have flexibility to adapt it for work, travel, gym, leisure or personalize it for your lifestyle needs.

Simply choose your Perk then select any of these StylePak accessories as Add-Ons before check-out!

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (available in 2 colors)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (available in 2 colors)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (PU in carbon fiber finish)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (available in 4 colors, water bottle not included)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (available in 2 colors)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (available in 2 colors)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (made of genuine leather)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (made of genuine leather)

 

Select this as an Add-On before check-out (available in 2 colors)

Some of our StylePak accessories are designed to work with each other too. Mix and match them the way you like and keep your day organized!

Laptop Sleeve with Utility Twin Pouch and Water Bottle Holder shown here:

Select these StylePak accessories as an Add-On before checkout. 

 

How To Order

Three easy steps:

STEP 1 – Select a Perk (either BasePak alone or BasePak + FacePak) on the top right of this page then click ‘GET THIS PERK’.

STEP 2 – Select the color for your Basepak or BasePak + FacePak in the drop-down menu then click ‘CONTINUE TO PAYMENT’.

STEP 3 – Choose any StylePak accessory as Add-On (you can select one of each Add-On) and add to Perk then click ‘PROCEED TO CHECKOUT’.  

The total amount for Perk plus Add-Ons and shipping cost will be shown before credit card payment details are required at checkout. 

 

Customize It For Your Lifestyle

The 22seven ORION is the only backpack you need. Customize it for your professional needs or personalize it for your evolving lifestyle activities. 

There are so many ways to configure your very own backpack. Choose a perk that suits your style then select the StylePak accessories you like and create your very own personal backpack. 

 

Backpack Features And Benefits

We know that practical functionality and ergonomics are the cornerstones of user experience. So we aim to maximize your convenience and satisfaction!

We designed it so that you have quick access to all your documents and gear. We want to help you keep your day organized.

 

BasePak External Specs

 

Quality And Craftsmanship

Beyond just clever design and complete customization, we have selected top-grade fabrics and quality components for a premium look and feel on all 22seven products.

 

Shipping Cost

 

Our Story

After years of designing and making products for major brands in the sporting and lifestyle markets, we have seen many great products brought to market but the unique “you” is still missing in the product. 

So we put our brains together and founded a different kind of brand, focused on designing and engineering products of great value that truly make a difference to the way you live.

With our experienced developers and direct access to material suppliers and factories, it means we only invest in what truly makes the product better for YOU. 

By creating and delivering premium products made of the best materials, modern manufacturing technologies and true craftsmanship, the result is a range of ever-evolving products that live up to your lifestyle needs. 

At 22seven, we are dedicated to creating premium products that are timeless in design and adaptable to your changing needs for years to come so that you can live your lifestyle, personalized!

 

Risks And Challenges

Unexpected issues with deliveries may arise in light of shipping disruption during the current pandemic. However, we have robust logistics plans in place and work with leading global freight providers. We will keep everyone updated if there are any delays in shipping and will do our best to ship on time. 

All production will be subject to supply chain risks (eg. production or material delays etc.) or destination risks (eg. tax jurisdiction in some countries may collect taxes/duties). Our production plans have already been put into action and production have been progressing smoothly.

We have teams in place on the production floor and our goal is to make sure you receive the product to the highest of quality and on time.

story:
Nine21 is a new and upcoming online retailer catering to both men and women. The store will carry trendy, contemporary apparel and accessories from some of the top designers in the fashion industry as well as new designers looking to showcase their brand. We will have apparel that is moderately-priced to reach people at all levels and desires.

Nine21 was created on the foundation of living out a dream and leaving a legacy.  Nine21 has a regal meaning for the both of us. Several years ago we lost two individuals who have inspired us to become a union and design a brand which will inspire others. Jenae Pickering, born 9/21/1976 was taken from this world at the early age of 16 and Demetrice Harper born 9/1/1979 departed 2 months prior to her 21st birthday.  Since neither of them were able to live out their dreams, we felt this was a way to do it. As you can see, starting the Nine21 brand will keep their memory alive for years to come.  Fashion has always been on the forefront of our destination, but more so now than ever due to the urgency of wanting to help others reach their goals and also to influence our young daughters who are currently aspiring to become fashion designers one day (or icons of The Arts). Supporting the Nine21 brand doesn’t just afford an opportunity to provide quality clothing but also to instigate a life change for many of those who are seeking to see their own beauty and dreams come to life.

Nine 21’s mission is to be able to tap into a person’s individuality and help them create who they want to be. A simple dress or suit and tie can be transformed into a “Statement” of who you are. Nine 21 will help you to be creative, to look outside of what’s trending and become the trend.

                   


As you know, starting any business can be very expensive, from lease space to inventory to store supplies. Our first thoughts were to open an actual storefront but we knew this was not the way to go. In this day and age it’s just not necessary, online shopping is the new way to shop but it still takes a lot to make this happen. We have put everything we have into this endeavor but we still need a little help. We have acquired office space for inventory, business licensing, a basic website as well as some apparel, but to make this a success, we need a good starting inventory for both men and women and to upgrade the website.

With your help and support, we will be able to do the following:

$10,000 

Inventory for men and women and upgrades to the website.

 This is the minimum amount needed for the campaign.  Anything above and beyond this level will push the store to the next level.

$15,000  

Add a private label brand for women’s and plus-size clothing

One of the main risks with opening the store is that online retailing is everywhere.  To be perfectly honest, there is nothing new and exciting about it, however our plan is to create a site you can shop at and find unique pieces and looks that you may find in a local boutique and make that experience accessible from the comfort of your home. Our goal is to make this a one-stop shop for everyone, especially in the men’s market as well as plus-size, since this area in the industry is lacking freshness and newness. This journey won’t be easy but with your help and support, we believe that it is possible. Once this campaign funds, we will be able to start the ball rolling and never look back and you will all be along for the ride. Thank you all in advance for being there for us and seeing us through it all!! 

Ways to Support the Campaign

1. Donate. Select one of the reward levels to the right.

2. Share on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram and via word of mouth. The more people who know about this campaign, the closer we get to making this dream a reality.



HOW IS MONEY BEING COLLECTED FOR THIS?

Nine21 is proud to be powered by Indiegogo and is using their Flexible Funding program. This means that you will be charged even if we hit don't meet our initial funding goal however we will be charged a higher Indiegogo fee. 

WHAT FORMS OF PAYMENT DO YOU TAKE?

Most major credit cards are taken (Visa, Mastercard, Discovery, Amex). You can also choose to pay through Paypal. Please note that if you choose to contribute, you will be taken to a Paypal portal. 

DO YOU SHIP TO P.O. BOXES?

We unfortunately cannot ship to a P.O. Box.

WHAT IS THE SHIPPING COST?

Shipping is $5 for US orders and $10 for International orders. 

HOW DO I ADD THE SHIPPING COST TO A PERK?

Once you have picked a perk, you will run through the registration process if you are not already an Indiegogo member. You will then be given an option to add an additional amount. Please click custom to add the shipping cost and if you'd like to contribute more, any additional funds.

story:
I’m Emily Bell, clothing designer and founder of EMILY VS BEAR, a luxury women’s wear company based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.  I started this line because I wanted to make it easier for fashion-conscious women to be more responsible consumers. We strive for quality over quantity and slow fashion mentalities with a hope to create a new consumer mindset. 

EMILY VS BEAR was founded and structured around my belief that we need to become better consumers. Companies need to be held accountable and we all need to start taking a closer look at where, how and by whom the products in our lives are being made. This is why EMILY VS BEAR strives to bring you American made clothing using natural and sustainable fibers that can be returned to the environment once they have lived out their lives as luxury staple items in your closet.  

WHY SUSTAINABLE?

We live in a consumer driven society with very little regard for what is actually happening behind the scenes. What chemicals go into the product, where those chemicals end up, who is making the product and under what conditions and what overall impact these practices have on our well-being and health of the planet. 



WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET 

This is all a good start, but we want more. Up until now we have done small production runs, learning the ropes along the way. We’ve finally decided to launch a full line.  

That's where you come in:
Funding this campaign will make it possible for us to move forward with production.  Not just this season, but for many seasons to come. It will give us the freedom to create our coming collections while sourcing the best materials and craftsmanship. 

Giving to this campaign will support small business, artisan craftsmanship, the slow fashion mindset, and the American economy. 

Production alone is expensive and when you add in marketing, wholesaling, and a web store, those expenses get out of control very quickly. 

As a benefit for funding this project you'll have the opportunity to get some awesome incentives like signature pieces, exclusive IndieGoGo items and even a few one-of-a-kind pieces! 

THE PERKS

EVB Tote


GMO T-shirt


EVB T-Shirt  
Sizing is as follows and based on a chest measurement in inches. Please note that these are UNISEX sizes and may vary from your regular size. 
XXS - 29-31    
XS - 30-32    
S - 34-36
M - 38-40
L - 42-44
XL - 46-48
2XL - 48-50


EVB 5 Panel Hat 




EVB Crewneck Sweatshirt 
Sizing is as follows and based on a chest measurement in inches. Please note that these are UNISEX sizes and may vary from your regular size. 
XXS - 29-31    
XS - 30-32    
S - 34-36
M - 38-40
L - 42-44
XL - 46-48
2XL - 48-50

*unfortunately this product has some polyester in it 





The following limited edition pieces size at:
S (2-4)
M (6-8)
L (10-12)

Basic T-shirt in Cream (100% wool)



Basic T-shirt in Taupe (100% wool) 



Basic Long Sleeve in Cream (100% wool)  



Basic Long Sleeve in Taupe (100% wool)  




Wool Pullover T-Shirt (100% wool)  



Peplum Pullover (100% wool) 



Wool Pants (100% wool)  



Pencil Skirt in Mustard (100% wool) 



Pencil Skirt in Charcoal (100% wool) 



Drop Waist Dress (100% wool)  




RISKS & CHALLENGES 


I have formed a quality production team based out of New York's garment district that is reliable and professional. 

I am giving the lead time on this project an extremely generous amount of time. Six months is a long time, and in most cases one should recieve their perk in a fraction of the time. I wanted to make sure that there would be no falling behind schedule and hopefully everything will come much sooner. The only problems I forsee may be if products are sold out and even then, six months should be enough time to remedy such a situation. 


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We totally understand if you aren't feeling up to contribute right now. We plan on continuing our mission to create sustainable clothing while maintaining the dedication to using environmentally friendly materials and socially responsible practices. 

If you can't contribute, but still love the product, please tell your friends and post the campaign link on your social media pages. We thank you in advance! 

**PHOTOGRAPHY: THANK YOU TO SARAH C. WILSON www.sarahcwilson.com**
**VIDEO: THANK YOU ALEXANDER HAYES avz.hayes@gmail.com**

story:
Summary

    Hi, my name is Daniel and I’m an architect who can’t efficiently work on architecture due the problems that construction industry encountered in my country. So I temporarily abandoned the architecture and decided to implement my old product design ideas. The idea that I will introduce to you now is the one I wanted to create since the time I was a kid.

    So, the sunglasses. For me, as for many others, wearing the sunglasses has always been associated with problems such as: their constant slipping down the nose, painful red marks left by the bridge and nose pads. And I asked myself: why the sunglasses can’t exist without the bridge and nose pads in a first place? And an obvious solution for design of the EyeCrabs appeared. Headband that pushes structure of sunglasses to the temples. And the pressure from the headband to the temples turned out to be not so great because of large size of the EyeCrabs temporal pads.

    At this point the design could be completed. But wait. In fact the lenses now have no role to keep the sunglasses on a head and this means that now I can do anything with them. That’s how the function of hiding the lenses appeared.

    And these are the main features of EyeCrabs.

    Which provide many opportunities of how they can be used.

    As well as many possibilities for further development of their design: the feature of replacing the rims (already included) , supplementing the EyeCrabs with various accessories in the future, etc. 

What We Need & What You Get

    At the moment, the development of schemes for the first edition design of EyeCrabs called “Totally Crab” completed by 99%. And now I need funds primarily for the production of EyeCrabs sunglasses, their packaging and some bureaucracy stuff. Fund balances will be invested in creating the new models and supplements to the EyeCrabs (In the future, I am planning complement them with various electronic devices).

    For now, I am planning produce the first edition limited to 2000 pieces by this summer(*):  1000 in color “Cloud” and 1000 in color “Patriot”. Most of them or even ALL will go to my contributors and will never be produced in this “Totally Crab” design again (it is compatible with all future models, so don’t worry). Each pair of the first edition EyeCrabs will have its exclusive ID number that will be assigned to the contributor.

    The most active contributors will receive 3D model and schemes of the basic design of EyeCrabs. So that they will be able to 3D print spare parts as well as develop their own design for rims and lenses  which they can use themselves or send to us (If the design will be good enough good and comfortable to wear - we will produce EyeCrabs on the base of your design, and the author will receive a percentage of profit from the sales as well as will be listed as a EyeCrabs co-designer on the EyeCrabs website and as "designed by" on specific model EyeCrabs package).

   If the campaign attains at least three times more funds than planned - each set of EyeCrabs will be supplemented by two pairs of replaceable rims with lenses of alternative design.

(* - read Risks & Challenges)

The Impact

    Impact of the EyeCrabs - is to give the world a comfortable alternative to the traditional sunglasses. In some sense EyeCrabs are not glasses at all - they are something different, as a smoking pipe compared with cigars.

   I hope that with Your help EyeCrabs will take their place in the world as the traditional and recognizable accessory. And if it happens - I will not stop on the EyeCrabs, and will continue to create comfortable alternatives to other casual accessories.

Risks & Challenges

    It may sound cynical - but only real obstacles for me are money and time. I can't control the speed of the production of parts and delays in logistics. As well as I can't start the production without your contribution. 

    I will say honestly - the main risk is that if this campaign will not achieve the goal  I will not be able to start production in time. In that case, I can only promise that you will get your perks but later than planned. And I'm very sorry for that. Flexible funding - is  not my decision, it's just the only possible opportunity for me due to the PayPal limits.

    Any other possible production problems are not so complicated for me. After my experience in construction management - production of accessories is not so big deal.

Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't fund EyeCrabs, but you would like to see them become a reality - please just show them to your friends. It is important for me. 

    EyeCrabs is a good idea, and it deserves to take its place in the world of accessories. 
    Thank you. And may the crab be with you.

active contributors will receive 3D model and schemes of the basic design of EyeCrabs.
So that they will be able to 3D print spare parts as well as develop their own
design for rims and lenses  which they
can use themselves or send to us (If the design will be good enough good and
comfortable to wear - we will produce EyeCrabs on the base of your design, and the author will receive a
percentage of profit from the sales as well as will be listed as a EyeCrabs co-designer on the EyeCrabs website and as "designed by" on specific model EyeCrabs package).




   If the campaign attains at least three times more funds than
planned - each set of EyeCrabs will be supplemented by two pairs of replaceable
rims with lenses of alternative design.
(* - read Risks & Challenges)
   The Impact 
    Impact of
the EyeCrabs - is to give the world a comfortable alternative to the
traditional sunglasses. In some
sense EyeCrabs are not glasses at all - they are something different, as a smoking
pipe compared with cigars.

   I hope that with Your help EyeCrabs will
take their place in the world as the traditional and recognizable
accessory. And
if it happens - I will not stop on the EyeCrabs, and will continue to create comfortable
alternatives to other casual accessories.   Risks & Challenges  
    It may
sound cynical - but only real obstacles for me are money and time. I can't control the speed of the production of parts and delays in logistics. As well as I can't start the production without your contribution. 
    I will say honestly - the main risk is that if this campaign will not achieve the goal  I will not be able to start production in time. In that case, I can only promise that you will get your perks but later than planned. And I'm very sorry for that. Flexible funding - is  not my decision, it's just the only possible opportunity for me due to the PayPal limits.
    Any other
possible production problems are not so complicated for me. After my experience in
construction management - production of accessories is not so big deal.   Other Ways You Can Help 
    If you can't fund EyeCrabs, but you would like to see them become a reality - please just show them to your friends. It is important for me. 
    EyeCrabs is a good idea, and it deserves to take its place in the world of accessories. 
    Thank you. And may the crab be with you.

story:
Short Summary

WE ARE MAKING MEAL PLANNING SIMPLE AND EFFECTIVE FOR AMATEUR ATHLETES; BRINGING SPORTS NUTRITIONIST TO YOUR HOME, AFFORDABLE AND EASY! 

    THERE ARE 19 MILLION MOMS AND DADS THAT TRAVEL ACROSS AMERICA TAKING 7.8 MILLION ATHLETES TO DIFFERENT SPORTING EVENTS IN HIGH SCHOOL.   

    • My name is Kharis Stallworth Pop Warner football coach, father, catering company owner and technology specialist.  
    • Every season before and after practice, I have players ask me, 
    1. "Coach K, I want to play in College and then play in the pros, what do I eat to get bigger, stronger, and faster?"  
    • Parents ask similar questions,  they don't have the time or resources to easily research and meal plan for a day, a week, or a season.  But now they need to meal plan for a growing teenage athlete. Its is tough on Moms and Dads, so parents always ask me and other coaches:
    1. "Coach or Coach K, do you have any suggestions on what to feed my athlete to get them safely to College or even the Pros, is there a meal plan to follow just for my kids? I can't find exactly what I'm looking for online!"
    • I'm a child athlete of the 80's, and my favorite athletes nutritional secrets are still a secret in 2015. Michael Jordan has written many books, but not one on his diet? 
    • Does Lebron really only eat McDonald's? Did Micheal Jordan grow to 6'6" by just eating Big Mac's? Does RG III really only eat at Subway? ........NO of course they don't! Because it is not what a nutritional specialist would recommend!
    • So why are we as parents, coaches, and administrators not demanding a better solution, who is going to build an app to help? 
    • We are... and we are listening to every parent out there!
    • We will start with high school athletes and soon move into the neighborhoods and assist entire communities with nutritional education and meal planning that is quick and simple to use. 
    • I am a serial entrepreneur that finds life more exciting when I can make things that other people can use.  And this will help MILLIONS!  

    What We Need & What You Get

    USE OF FUNDS:

    We are raising $60,000 to start our fundraising for the company.

    • $6000-$10,000 to relocate the business into Orange County
    • $30,000 to start the prototype build for the APP
    • $5,000 in business expenses (office/utilities/legal)
    • $10,000 in marketing setup cost
    • $3,000-$4,000 CRM and Database setups

    PERKS

    For Moms Dads Coaches and Fans

    • $1 - Good Karma - you are helping millions of athletes. 
    • $25 - Wall of Fame mention - our developers are going to build a graphics inset to place on the Website similar to "Honorable Mention" bricks on a new building.  It will look amazing, just our way of saying thanks publicly. 
    • $50 - Credit for one subscription season of Gold level membership. (Premiere)
    • $100 - 1 season of Gold level membership plus 1 Future Fan Tee Shirt
    1. *Future Fan - We are launching our BETA app on iOS and Android in July during ESPY Weekend here in LA.  During that weekend there are multiple STAR ATHLETES in town.  We are having 100 MAX MY BODY tee shirts signed by High School, College and Professional star athletes.  We will take a photo of the athlete and include it for reference.  We will then box it and ship it to your house.  


    Our Global Impact

    • Global nutrition is and has been a serious problem for as long as man can remember.  But now there are tools available to help fight this epidemic on a community, National, and Global scale.  We think that we have an answer, and while it is not perfect, it is a start.  Giving homes, neighborhoods and schools the power to meal plan in the palm of the hand with a fast, accurate, and simple tool to use is key to fighting obesity, under nourishment, physical limitations due to nutrition. All while allowing families to save money, because the grocery shopping list is completely focused.  This company is going to have an impact. 
    • I started a family catering business in 2012 that services the elderly and medically challenged individuals in the Southern California area.  Our company started as a neighborhood catering delivery service working on a local neighborhood effort that quickly scaled to include 20 surrounding communities.  We know the catering business and have worked for some amazing clients from the Film and Entertainment industry in California. 
    • With our key knowledge of food, technology, and caloric science we feel that we are correctly aligned to actually produce a great company.  Now at the beginning we will not have any food manufacturing in our products and services.  But our co founder and Director of Nutrition believes that we can soon produce balanced food items for retail for our clients. This is going to be an amazing journey and I want you to help us get started, and more importantly stay involved. 

    Risks & Challenges

    We are obviously competing in the Global Sports Nutrition market which is estimated to be $37.7 Billion by 2019.  So there are going to be some shark infested waters to navigate. Under Armor purchased our competitor MY FITNESS PAL for $475 Million just last month. The other big sports companies are going to quickly get into the space and do 1 or 2 things:

    • Acquire companies like ours and put millions of dollars in R&D into building something that can scale Globally "it happens :o)
    • Acquire companies like our and bury us in the back of the company and take our idea and re-purpose it, "it happens :o(
    • We are planning on a "positive" Merger or Acquisition, so we are building the "Strongest Board of Directors and Advisors possible."  Real been there done that alpha types that can quickly spot the trouble and help us course correct.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Talk about us to your closest friends and family and get them involved.  Let's make this a National push from Parents that just want to know, 

    "WHAT DO I FEED MY ATHLETE COACH?"
